Name: Eurostars Universal Lisboa
Description:
Set in Lisbon, 600 metres from Lisbon Oceanarium, Eurostars Universal Lisboa offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a business centre and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. Every room includes a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Eurostars Universal Lisboa have a city view.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Gare do Oriente is 700 metres from Eurostars Universal Lisboa, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 7.9 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Locke de Santa Joana
Description:
Locke de Santa Joana features accommodation located 300 metres from the centre of Lisbon and offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The aparthotel provides rooms with air conditioning, available on site private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

At the aparthotel, units are equipped with a wardrobe. Every unit includes a kettle, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. The units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

The aparthotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast. The restaurant at Locke de Santa Joana serves Mediterranean cuisine, and is open for dinner and lunch.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Universo Romantico
Description:
Universo Romantico features accommodation situated 200 metres from the centre of Lisbon and offers a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

Some accommodation includes a terrace and a satellite flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and heating. At the guest house, some units are allergy-free and soundproof.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and cheese are available each morning. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available. Dining options are available close to the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Universo Romantico include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Bica FLH Suites
Description:
Bica FLH Suites is located in the historical centre of Lisbon, within the famed Bica neighbourhood. The building which was an art gallery since the fifties, was refurbished in the beginning of 2017.

The comfortable rooms feature a rainfall shower, free toiletries, hair dryer, air conditioning, desk and a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is available and the cosy terrace outside is ideal for warm evenings. Some of the rooms offer a view overlooking the garden.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, also there is a wide range of restaurants and bars in the surroundings. This Bed and Breakfast is located halfway between Chiado and Bairro Alto.

The Baixa-Chiado metro station is within 300 metres. Cais do Sodr√© station is at a 10-minute walk and connects with Bel√©m and Cascais. The Rossio train station is an 8-minute walk and connects with scenic Sintra. The nearest airport is Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Bica FLH Suites.

Name: Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Liberdade NE
Description:
Located 400 metres from Marques de Pombal Square and Metro Station, Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Liberdade NE has stylish, modern rooms.

Featuring free WiFi, the air-conditioned rooms are brightly decorated, with designer furniture. Each has a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and desk. With lots of natural light, the bathrooms provide free toiletries, large showers and a hairdryer.

The 24-hour reception staff can provide luggage storage and assist with car hire. Avenida da Liberdade, Lisbon‚Äôs trendy main street and home to many exclusive shops, is 400 m away.

Eduardo VII Park is 7 minutes‚Äô walk away and Saldanha Metro Station, offering direct access to Lisbon International Airport is within a 15-minute walk. Underground parking is available on site.

Name: Lisbon 5 Hotel
Description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Lisbon, Lisbon 5 Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is around 1.4 km from St. George's Castle, 7.7 km from Luz Football Stadium and 7.8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at Lisbon 5 Hotel also offer a city view.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Varandas de Lisboa - Tejo River Apartments & Rooms
Description:
Varandas de Lisboa - Tejo River Apartments & Rooms has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Lisbon, less than 1 km from St. George's Castle, a 12-minute walk from Rossio and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property features garden and city views, and is 1.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is 2 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Commerce Square.

At the apartment complex, units have a wardrobe. Units are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have river views. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Jeronimos Monastery is 7.3 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 7.8 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: WHome Alfama Spacious 2-Bed near Feira da Ladra
Description:
WHome Alfama Spacious 2-Bed near Feira da Ladra has a balcony and is set in Lisbon, within just 2 km of Commerce Square and 1.9 km of Rossio. The property is located 2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 6.3 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Gare do Oriente is 7.2 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from WHome Alfama Spacious 2-Bed near Feira da Ladra, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Apartment Yellow Bica
Description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Apartment Yellow Bica is an accommodation located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.2 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio. It is set 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and provides a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from St. George's Castle.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with river views. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.4 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Apartment Yellow Bica.

Name: Hotel Botanico
Description:
Hotel Bot√¢nico is situated in between Avenida da Liberdade and the university‚Äôs Botanical Gardens, just a 5-minute walk from the Avenida Metro Station.

Bot√¢nico‚Äòs guest rooms have air conditioning, minibars and flat-screen TVs. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with bath or shower.

Guests can enjoy a wholesome breakfast in the breakfast room in the morning. It includes different types of bread, cereals, yoghurt and fruits.

After a busy day of sightseeing, guests can have some Portuguese wine in the lounge or read international newspapers to catch up on the news. It is also possible to make free use of Wi-Fi here.

Hotel Bot√¢nico is located just 8 km from Lisbon Airport.

Name: We Love F Tourists
Description:
We Love F Tourists features free WiFi. The hostel is located near central Lisbon, at just a 7-minute drive from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and a 3-minute walk from Rossio Metro Station.

All rooms at the hostel feature access to shared bathroom facilities. The unit‚Äôs accommodation is divided into private double rooms and dormitory rooms, all with scenic Lisbon views. Daily cleaning service is provided.

Guests can make full use of the shared kitchen in order to prepare their own meals. An on site snack-bar is also available for lighter meals and Portuguese snacks.

The communal living area features comfortable sofas in a tranquil ambiance and has a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player, as well as an iPad. There is also a bar, where refreshing cocktails and drinks are served.

The Rossio historical area is a 3-minute walk away, while the Chiado is a 9-minute walk away. It is a 7-minute walk from Coliseu dos Recreios. Bairro Alto, Lisbon‚Äôs main bar area, is a 20-minute walk. Airport shuttle is available, at a surcharge. We Love F Tourists is a 12-minute drive from the Lisbon International Airport.

Name: Madalena Hermitage
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, Madalena Hermitage is an 18th-century building offering modern, design apartments. It is only a 2-minute walk to Pra√ßa do Comercio and has views of Lisbon Cathedral.

The apartments are decorated in pastel colours and have modern kitchens with a dining area. Each apartment has one private bathrooms which is stocked with free toiletries. Each is air conditioned and has a satellite TV and free WiFi.

Guests can buy groceries for self-catering at the supermarket 150 metres away. Local restaurants and bars are available within a 2-minute walk.

The ferry across the River Tagus leaves from Terreiro do Pa√ßo Square, 300-metres away, which also has a metro station. The Cais do Sodr√©‚Äé Train Station offers connections with Sintra and Cascais and is only 1 km away from the Madalena Hermitage.

Name: Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa
Description:
In a prime location in the centre of Lisbon, Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa provides continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 7.9 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Commerce Square.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, all units at Tempo FLH Hotels Lisboa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a balcony. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: GuestHouse Pena
Description:
Boasting a terrace, GuestHouse Pena is situated in Lisbon, 800 metres from Liberty Avenue. Popular points of interest around the property include Rossio and Chiado. The property is located in the Arroios district.

The units at the guest house come with access to either a communal bathroom or to a private bathroom. Rooms at GuestHouse Pena also have free WiFi, a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

Bairro Alto is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Amoreiras is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from GuestHouse Pena.

Name: Ibis Styles Lisboa Centro Marqu√™s de Pombal
Description:
Located next to the Eduardo VII Park, ibis Styles Lisboa Marqu√™s De Pombal offers comfortable rooms with a contemporary d√©cor. Free WiFi and laundry facilities are available and the property was renovated in December 2018. There is a public parking in 50 meters from the hotel.

Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, minibar, safe and private bathrooms. There is a 24-hour front desk as well as accessibility for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is not included in rate and the modern restaurant, which opens for lunch and dinner, serves Portuguese and international cuisine as well as a children's menu. In addition guests can relax at the on-site bar.

ibis Styles Lisboa Marqu√™s De Pombal is centrally located, a 2-minute walk from the metro and bus stop to the airport. The unit is a 5-minute walk to the shopping centre El Corte Ingles and a 5-minute walk to Avenida da Liberdade, one of Lisbon's most iconic streets.

Name: Hotel Do Chile
Description:
Hotel Do Chile is situated in Lisbon. It offers free WiFi and a living room for breakfast.

Guest rooms of the Hotel Do Chile include TVs with 50 channels, air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests can benefit from a bike rental service, a 24-hour reception and a hotel bar. There are also vending machines with drinks and snacks.

The Arroios Metro Station is situated 50 metres from Hotel Do Chile, and offers direct access to Lisbon‚Äôs city centre in 3 stops. Lisbon Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

Name: Star inn Lisbon Airport
Description:
Located 100 meters from Lisbon Airport Humberto Delgado, Star inn Lisbon Airport features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Private indoor and outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy snacks during the day at the Stars Caff√© from 11h00 until 02h00, as well as continental breakfast buffet from 02h00 until 05h00 and full breakfast buffett from 05h00 until 11h00.

Nations Park is 2.8 km from Star inn Lisbon Airport, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 2.9 km away.

Guests have easy access to all Lisbon through the Airport Metro Station, located a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, a few steps from Star inn Lisbon Airport.

Please note that the baby cot/crib can only be provided after a confirmation from the hotel. Any supplements such as extra beds are not included in the room rate automatically. Therefore, it will be paid directly to the property separately from the reservation price.

Please note that reservations of 9 rooms or more are subject to different policies and extra charges. The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property.

For reservations made with a third party credit card, any previous charges will be reimbursed and the full payment will be requested upon check-in.

Please note that a maximum of 2 pets up to 20kg per accommodation are allowed, at a cost of 25‚Ç¨ per pet, per night. Pets are permitted at the restaurant and bar. When travelling with pets, please note that a refundable damage deposit of 100‚Ç¨ per stay, applies.

Name: Alfama - Lisbon Lounge Suites
Description:
Alfama - Lisbon Lounge Suites offers modern and elegant apartments and rooms in Lisbon‚Äôs Alfama district. Located less than 10 minutes walking distance from S√£o Jorge Castle, some have Tagus River views.

All apartments and rooms at Lisbon Lounge are modern and spacious. The apartments include a fully equipped kitchen and a living room with sofa bed. Rooms and apartments include free WiFi and each has its own private bathroom.

Guests staying in the apartments can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen. The surrounding area is filled with restaurants and bars, within 500 metres.

Guests can relax in the living area of the lobby, equipped with plush sofas, and there is luggage storage available for extra comfort.

The front desk can arrange a shuttle service to Lisbon Airport, located 7 km away. Traditional Lisbon trams run right in front of Lounge Suites and can take guests to Chiado district. Portas do Sol viewpoint is a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Casa Belmonte
Description:
The recently-renovated Casa Belmonte has comfortable accommodation just a 3-minute walk from the Marqu√™s de Pombal Metro Station. It is located in the Portuguese capital, just 300 metres from the central Marqu√™s do Pombal Square.

All the soundproofed rooms at the Belmonte feature air conditioning, private bathroom, flat-screen cable TV, free WiFi and a mini-fridge. Some rooms also feature balconies and a view. Daily cleaning service is provided.

Guests can try the local cuisine in one of the many restaurants available within 300 metres of the property.

The El Corte Ingl√©s shopping centre and the Amoreiras shopping centre are a 3-minute drive and have a number of shops, boutiques, supermarkets and food courts. The Bairro Alto is Lisbon‚Äôs foremost nighttime hotspot and is an 8-minute drive away. There, guests can find a wide variety of bars and caf√©s. The Chiado and the Rossio historical areas are an 8-minute and a 4-minute drive, respectively.

The Lisbon International Airport is a 15-minute drive from the guest house.

Name: Pensao Praca Da Figueira
Description:
Housed in a listed baroque building with Rossio Metro Station on its doorstep, this entirely non-smoking guesthouse offers great value-accommodation in Lisbon's historic Baixa Pombalina. It features free WiFi access.

Some rooms are air conditioned and provide en suite bathrooms with hairdryer; others offer views of Pra√ßa Da Figueira Square.

Pens√£o Pra√ßa Da Figueira also offers 24-hour reception services to its guests. There is a laundry and ironing service available, as well as bicycle rental and luggage storage.

Situated among traditional restaurants and Fado houses, Pens√£o Pra√ßa Da Figueira is 2 metro stops away from Cais Do Sodr√© Train Station, linking directly to the seaside resort town of Cascais.

Name: F√©rias no Bairro
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, F√©rias no Bairro is situated in the Avenidas Novas district of Lisbon, 5 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 5.2 km from Rossio. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Luz Football Stadium is 3.5 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 5.3 km from the apartment, while Commerce Square is 5.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Hotel Gat Rossio
Description:
Providing ultra modern rooms with total-white designer furnishings, Gat Rossio is centrally located on a quiet street behind Restauradores Square and metro stop. It features an outdoor terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms are air conditioned and include flat-screen TV sets with cable channels. Some rooms open out onto balconies, while all come with a work desk and en suite bathroom facilities.

Guests at Hotel Gat Rossio can benefit from the location and discover many nearby eateries, serving traditional dishes from Lisbon‚Äôs rich gastronomy.

The iconic St George‚Äôs Castle is within a 10-minute walk, and Rossio Train Station is 50 meters from the Gat Rossio hotel. The Aerobus Shuttle from Portela Airport stops just a few metres from the property‚Äôs doorstep. It is only 4 minutes‚Äô walk to the Av. da Liberdade.

Name: Moov Hotel Lisboa Oriente
Description:
Set in Lisbon, 1.4 km from Lisbon Oceanarium, Moov Hotel Lisboa Oriente offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Gare do Oriente.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms feature a desk.

Guests at Moov Hotel Lisboa Oriente can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

With staff speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, around-the-clock information is available at the reception.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 7.7 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 8.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km from the property.

Name: B&B HOTEL Lisboa Aeroporto
Description:
Located in Lisbon, 3.4 km from Gare do Oriente, B&B HOTEL Lisboa Aeroporto provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.5 km from Lisbon Oceanarium.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. At B&B HOTEL Lisboa Aeroporto each room comes with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese, staff are always on hand to help at the reception.

Rossio is 10 km from B&B HOTEL Lisboa Aeroporto, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 1 km from the hotel.

Name: Castilho House
Description:
Castilho House‚Äôs modern accommodations are located in Rua Castilho, right in Lisbon‚Äôs city centre, 450 metres from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and 100 metres from Eduardo VII Park.

Rooms at House Castilho feature earthy tones and a trendy style. Each air-conditioned room offers free Wi-Fi, LED TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A breakfast buffet is served daily, and room service is available with drinks, snacks, and sandwiches.

The reception offers luggage storage.

Marqu√™s de Pombal Metro Station is just 200 metres away, giving access to all the city‚Äôs sights. Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Light of Lisbon Apartments II
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.2 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio, Light of Lisbon Apartments II offers accommodation with city views and free WiFi. It is located 1.7 km from St. George's Castle and features a minimarket. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a balcony with river views. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.1 km from Light of Lisbon Apartments II, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

Name: TryLisbon Alc√¢ntara
Description:
Set within 3.9 km of Jeronimos Monastery and 4.8 km of Commerce Square in Lisbon, TryLisbon Alc√¢ntara offers accommodation with seating area. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The apartment has family rooms.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an oven, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Units are fitted with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a terrace and some have river views. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Rossio is 4.8 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 4.9 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Alma Moura Residences
Description:
Featuring inner courtyard views, Alma Moura Residences features accommodation with patio, around 1.3 km from Commerce Square. Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, and within 1.8 km of the city centre.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Each unit includes a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms include a balcony and some have garden views. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Anjos 44 Lisbon Apartments
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and a 18-minute walk from Rossio, Anjos 44 Lisbon Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is situated 1.5 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and offers a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Some of the units feature a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a bidet and bathrobes. At the apartment complex, some units are soundproof.

Commerce Square is 2.7 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 5 km from Anjos 44 Lisbon Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Lisbon Best Choice Apartments Alfama
Description:
Located in 4 typical Portuguese buildings, these modern apartments are in Lisbon‚Äôs traditional Alfama district. The property is a short walk from the Tagus River and a 2-minute walk from the Fado Museum.

Each unit at Lisbon Best Choice Apartments Alfama has free WiFi and a flat-screen cable TV. Some apartments offer views over the rooftops towards the Tagus River. Each apartment includes a kitchenette with a washing machine, microwave and kitchenware.

A supermarket is found in Santa Apol√≥nia Station, a 7-minute walk from the apartments. Lots of restaurants, bars and fado taverns are under 5 minutes on foot.

Set in the oldest part of Lisbon, the Lisbon Best Choice Apartments Alfama offers access to central Lisbon in 10-15 minutes from the Metro stop at the nearby station. Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away.

Name: O El√©trico Guesthouse
Description:
Offering city views, O El√©trico Guesthouse is an accommodation located in Lisbon, 1.1 km from Rossio and 500 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The units at the guest house feature private entrance and soundproofing so guests can enjoy a peaceful stay. All units are fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the guest house have a balcony. At the guest house, all units have bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at the guest house, while cycling and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near O El√©trico Guesthouse include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Apartamento Gra√ßa 2 quartos com as melhores vistas de Lisboa
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.1 km from Rossio and 1.1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Apartamento Gra√ßa 2 quartos com as melhores vistas de Lisboa offers air conditioning. It is located 1.8 km from Commerce Square and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 200 metres away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

St. George's Castle is 1.3 km from Apartamento Gra√ßa 2 quartos com as melhores vistas de Lisboa, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.1 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: The Leaf Boutique Hotel Lisbon - Adults Only
Description:
Featuring a fitness centre, a garden as well as a shared lounge, The Leaf Boutique Hotel Lisbon - Adults Only is located in the centre of Lisbon, 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is situated 2.4 km from Rossio, 1.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3 km from Commerce Square. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a business centre and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

An √† la carte, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property.

St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from The Leaf Boutique Hotel Lisbon - Adults Only, while Luz Football Stadium is 5.9 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Travel Park Lisboa
Description:
This hotel in the East of Lisbon is just 100 metres from Anjos Metro Station and 15 minutes‚Äô walk from the bustling Pra√ßa Dom Pedro IV. It has a bar with terrace.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Travel Park Lisboa have wooden furnishings. They include a seating area with satellite TV and a private bathroom with signature amenities.

Guests of the Hotel Park can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast. The hotel serves snacks and light meals in the bar and offers room service. On warm days, meals can be enjoyed on the spacious terrace.

A 24-hour front desk and car rental services are among the useful facilities offered at Hotel Travel Park Lisboa.

Name: America Diamonds Hotel
Description:
Housed in a restored historical building, the America Diamonds Hotel is located in Lisbon, a 10-minute walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square. Picoas Metro Station is located right opposite the hotel.

Renovated in 2020, the modernly designed guest rooms of the America Diamonds Hotel offer free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. They are decorated in deep blue and burgundy, and furniture with clean lines. Some rooms include a hydro-massage bathtub.

A buffet breakfast is offered daily at the restaurant of the hotel. In the evening, guests may also request room service or try out the fine restaurants in the neighbourhood.

The America Diamonds Hotel is less than a 10-minute walk from Eduardo VII Park and the El Corte Ingl√©s. Lisbon‚Äôs main tourist sites are easily accessible by public transport. Guests can also explore the city by rental bike.

Name: Home Out Rooms & Apartments
Description:
Home Out has bedrooms, suites and 3 studios, all located in the Areeiro district in Lisbon, just 2.1 km from Liberty Avenue and a 3-minute walk from Alameda Metro Station.

Some units include a balcony. Each comes with a kitchen or kitchenette, as well as a living area. Exclusive studios with a private bathroom are also available. The 4-bedroom apartment features 4 en suite bathrooms.

Guests are able to cook their own meals in the kitchen or kitchenette at their disposal, which comes fully equipped and includes a dishwasher. A variety of restaurants is available within a 5-minute walk, most serving traditional Portuguese cuisine.

Rossio is 2.7 km from Home Out, while Amoreiras is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 4 km from Home Out. A shuttle service to the property is available, upon request and at an extra fee.

Name: Hotel Principe Lisboa
Description:
Hotel Pr√≠ncipe Lisboa provides contemporary rooms with LED TV's and minibar, just 500 metres from the Museu Calouste Gulbenkian. It is conveniently situated in front of S√£o Sebasti√£o Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Our Hot Buffet Breakfast is served daily from 7:15 am to 10h30 am.

The modern rooms of the Hotel Pr√≠ncipe feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and light oak furniture. The private bathrooms come with complimentary bathroom amenities.

Set in an area with many cafes and restaurants nearby, Pr√≠ncipe Lisboa is situated 15 minutes by metro from the city centre. Guests can also walk to the centre through the picturesque Park Edward VII.

Lisbon Portela Airport is 25 minutes away by public transport and around 15 minutes by car. The hotel also provides laundry services and car rental facilities.

Name: Bairro House Lisbon Charming Suites
Description:
The Bairro House Charming Lisbon Suites provides accommodation conveniently set in Lisbon, Chiado / Bairro Alto within a short distance of Ribeira Market, Rossio and Commerce Square.

Fitted with a balcony, we provide 8 suits - feature a flat-screen TV and free WiFi, a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. For added convenience, the property provide towels and bed linen.

Bairro Alto is the Bohemian heart of Lisbon. Have a Strong Nightlife.
A typical neighborhood that offers a variety of nice Bars, coffee-shops, restaurants, Fado houses, terraces, cultural places and shops during the day.

Bairro Alto Lisbon is an old area, with historic architecture. these are buildings with a maximum of 4 floors. and no elevator.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 0,7 km from the Bairro alto while St. George's Castle is 1.5 km away.

The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Bairro House lisbon charming Suites.

Name: Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel
Description:
Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel is situated in central Lisbon, just 800 metres from Amoreiras Shopping and a 14-minute walk from the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade. The hotel is within a mere 170 metres from the Rato Metro Station.

Featuring double rooms, twin rooms and junior suites, the Sao Bento Hotel has accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi access. Every room or suite is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, with some featuring views of the river or city. Guests will find a private bathroom in their accommodation, which includes free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the comfortable breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast option is also available, upon previous request. Guests will be able to find a variety of restaurant and caf√© options in the vicinity. Several restaurants are available within a 5-minute walk and Avenida da Liberdade has assorted eateries, where guests can discover the famed Portuguese cuisine.

Those wishing to stay in, or just relaxing after a day of getting to know the city, can enjoy a refreshing drink or cocktail at the hotel's on site bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property, for guests' convenience.

At 1.8 km is the historic Rossio Square, reachable via metro ride and just a short walk away from the Tagus River. Bairro Alto is 1.4 km from Lisbon Sao Bento Hotel and is renowned for its lively atmosphere and multiple bars. Chiado is at 2 km from the property. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 8.1 km away and can also be reached via metro.

Name: Independente Pr√≠ncipe Real
Description:
This Art Deco hostel is within a renovated palace and overlooks S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara and Tagus River. Set on the border of Lisbon's trendy Bairro Alto district, it provides free WiFi and a restaurant with a secluded beer garden.

The Independente provides modern dormitory rooms and private suites with classical Portuguese architecture and a distinct d√©cor and feel. All rooms have seating areas and high ceilings. Some offer balconies with river views. Guests have access to communal kitchen facilities and to a shared lounge area.

Modern Portuguese cuisine can be enjoyed in the Art Deco setting of the Decadente Restaurante & Bar. All meals and cocktails are prepared with locally sourced produce.

Elevador da Gloria Tram Stop is situated right opposite Independente Pr√≠ncipe Real. Pink Street, a renowned nightlife hotspot near Cais do Sodr√©, is 900 metres away. The Portela Airport is 8 km away, while the Caparica beaches can be found 20 km from the hostel. Lisbon International Airport is at a 25-minute drive from the property.

Name: Safira
Description:
Safira is guesthouse located in the centre of Lisbon, a 5-minute walk from the Liberty Avenue and 800 metres from the lively Bairro Alto area. It offers accommodation with a 24-hour front desk.

The rooms are spread across four floors and feature private and shared bathroom facilities.  Safira offers luggage storage free of charge and free WiFi is available throughout.

Safira is 300 metres from the Avenida Metro Station. Within a few hundred metres there are numerous restaurants and clubs. Lisbon International Airport is 6.4 km away.

Name: Chiado 44
Description:
Offering city views, Chiado 44 is an accommodation set in Lisbon, less than 1 km from Rossio and a 18-minute walk from St. George's Castle. There is a private entrance at the guest house for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 1.1 km from Commerce Square, and within 1.6 km of the city centre.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. The units come with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms come with a balcony and some have river views. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is less than 1 km from the guest house, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Meli√° Lisboa Aeroporto
Description:
Located 100 metres from Lisbon International Airport, the new Meli√° Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel offers a lounge bar and a restaurant on site

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a sober d√©cor with bold accents. All rooms come with a mini-bar, a cable flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

Guests can wake up to a wholesome breakfast buffet each morning. At Restaurante Colinas de Lisboa , lunch and dinner are served √† la carte and include regional and international cuisine. For a pre-dinner drink head to the lounge bar located on the reception floor.

At the hotel guests will find the El Spa, a space where guests can break from routine and recharge their batteries in the swimming pools, the hot tub, hydromassage facilities, waterfalls, sauna and Turkish bath. At the gym guests have a full specialist support. The hotel features indoor and outdoor parking, with paid electrical vehicle charging stations.

Parque das Na√ß√µes business district is down the avenue, less than 3 km away from Meli√° Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel. The Aeroporto Metro Station is within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Hotel Mundial
Description:
Set in Lisbon‚Äôs historic Baixa Pombalina district, this 4-star hotel features a terrace with stunning panoramic city and S√£o Jorge Castle views. Private parking at the hotel is possible on site (reservation is not possible) and has a daily cost. The property is a 2-minute walk from Rossio Square.

Renovated in March 2016, rooms at the Hotel Mundial have air conditioning and traditional-style furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a bathrobe and hairdryer.

The bright Varanda de Lisboa Restaurant offers local cuisine in an √† la carte style. Both the restaurant and the rooftop bar offer sweeping views over Lisbon. The newly-opened Adega Premium Winehouse Bar & Shop has an extensive wine list, as well as a d√©cor inspired by traditional wine cellars. the Adega is ideal for lovers of tasty cheeses, local chorizos and Portuguese snacks.

Bairro Alto, the city's famed bar area, is a 10-minute walk, as are the shops and caf√©s of Chiado. There is a stop of the famous Tram 28 and City Tours Hop on Hop off in front of the property. Hotel Mundial is a 5-minute drive from the iconic St. George's Castle, and is a 10-minute walk from various shops and restaurants. It offers 24-hour front desk service, and can assist in car hire. The Mundial is 6.5 km from Lisbon International Airport.

Name: Hotel Alif Campo Pequeno
Description:
Located only 200 metres from Campo Pequeno Metro Station in central Lisbon, Hotel Alif Campo Pequeno offers modern rooms, some with a private balcony. Facilities include a 24-hour reception.

The air-conditioned rooms of Hotel Alif are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. All rooms have cable TV, a work desk, and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers laundry services, fax and photocopying services, and car rental.

The Calouste Gulbenkian Museum is a 15-minute walk away. Hotel Alif Campo Pequeno is a 10-minute drive from Lisbon‚Äôs Portela Airport and the Rossio Train Station.

Name: Novotel Lisboa
Description:
Offering an extensive breakfast buffet and free Wi-Fi, Novotel Lisboa is situated 500 metres from Lisbon Zoo and a 5-minute walk from the Pra√ßa de Espanha Metro Station and Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation.

The spacious rooms of Novotel Lisboa feature modern design and include flat-screen TVs and coffee&tea facilities. Up to 2 children (under 16 years) stay free when sharing with parents.

Guests can enjoy international and Portuguese cuisine at the Bicicleta Restaurant until 23:00 which serves snacks as well.

After training in the fitness centre, guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor seasonal swimming pool. Free WiFi access is available.

The El Corte Ingl√©s Mall is situated a 12 minutes away from Novotel Lisboa. Lisbon International Airport is easily accessible through the Aerobus.

Name: room00 Lisboa Hostel
Description:
Set in Lisbon, room00 Lisboa Hostel is 200 metres from Liberty Avenue and offers facilities like terrace. The property is located 900 metres from Rossio. Situated in the Santo Antonio district, the hostel is within 900 metres of Dona Maria II National Theatre.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Staff at reception can provide assistance around the clock with advice on the area.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Chiado, Bairro Alto and Amoreiras. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from room00 Lisboa Hostel.

Name: Loving Chiado
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Loving Chiado is located in the heart of Lisbon, in the Chiado area. Rossio and Baixa/chiado metro stations are a 5-minute walk.

The 6 air-conditioned apartments are all modernly decorated and include a dining and seating area with a flat-screen TV. In the private bathrooms guests will find free toiletries.

In each unit, there is also a kitchen where guests can prepare their own meals. It is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, a microwave and a coffee machine. All apartments feature a washing machine and some include dishwasher.

Rossio is 300 meters from the property and Carmo Square is 180 meters away. Lively Bairro Alto is a 7-minute walk from the Loving Chiado, while Liberty Avenue and its high-end shops is a 10-minute walk. Lisbon International Aiport is 8 km from Loving Chiado and is easily accessed by metro.

Name: Hotel 3K Madrid
Description:
Hotel 3K Madrid is located 500 metres from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and the Avenida da Liberdade in Lisbon. The nearest Metro Station is Picoas, at 400 metres, while Marqu√™s de Pombal Metro Station is 500 metres away.

The Hotel 3K Madrid offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and minibar. The air-conditioned accommodations are decorated with warm colours, wooden furniture and parquet floors. All rooms have a hairdryer and a private bathroom, in addition to a laptop-size safe.

Every morning guests can enjoy a local and international breakfast buffet, prepared with fresh seasonal ingredients. The 24-hour Honesty Bar is located at the lobby and  bar serves a variety of drinks and refreshments. A safety deposit box is available with the front desk.

The 24-hour front desk staff can advise guests on the best spots in Lisbon, arrange a restaurant, car rental and currency exchange as well as flight details. The property features a small rooftop pool with sun loungers.

Lisbon‚Äôs historical city centre is a 20-minute walk away. Due to its location, the 3K Hotel Madrid offers multiple choice of restaurants, brand stores and museums, along Avenida da Liberdade Avenue.

Name: MIDIS - Local Accommodation
Description:
MIDIS - Local Accommodation is set in the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, and is 700 metres from Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is also 1.8 km away from Chiado and 2.1 km from Liberty Avenue.

The units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. MIDIS - Local Accommodation offers some units with city views, and the rooms include a shared bathroom. Guest rooms feature a desk.

Staff are available to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Commerce Square is 2.8 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from MIDIS - Local Accommodation.

Name: HF Fenix Music
Description:
Located at the centre of Lisbon, HF Fenix Music is a charming themed hotel, with a rooftop swimming pool and far-reaching city views from its terrace. The brand-new hotel is a 4-minute walk from posh Avenida da Liberdade.

All the elegant rooms at the HF Fenix feature a musical theme, visible in its furnishings, colour patterns, decorated walls and even in its architecture. Each air-conditioned room is soundproofed and comes equipped with a Bluetooth sound system, multicoloured dynamic lightning, a wall-mounted flat-screen cable TV, safe and a desk. Also included are a private bathroom with free toiletries, as well as free WiFi access.

The lobby bar and the rooftop lounge bar have a variety of refreshments and snacks on offer. Some of Lisbon‚Äôs restaurants are within easy reach, at a 5-minute walk.

Marqu√™s de Pombal Metro Station is just 110 metres away and provides connections with most of the city. Eduardo VII Park is 400 metres away. Nearby Avenida da Liberdade is filled with high-end shops and boutiques. Chiado and Rossio are historical areas which guests may reach through a 15-minute Metro ride. Lisbon‚Äôs Portela International Airport is 7.7 km away from the HF Fenix Music.

Name: EXE Liberdade
Description:
EXE Liberdade is set in Lisbon, 500 meters from Liberty Avenue. The property is 1.3 km from Amoreiras and 1.6 km from Rossio square. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can also enjoy a drink in the on-site bar. The 24-hour front desk can help with tickets to attractions in the area.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Bairro Alto is 1.8 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Casa da Maria Alfama
Description:
Offering a terrace, Casa da Maria Alfama is located in Lisbon, not far from Dona Maria II National Theatre. Free WiFi is featured.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower while the kitchenette has a microwave. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Rossio is 900 metres from the apartment. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Casa da Maria Alfama.

Name: Exe Saldanha
Description:
Attractively set in the centre of Lisbon, Exe Saldanha is within 2.6 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.1 km of Rossio. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Exe Saldanha rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 3.2 km from Exe Saldanha, while Commerce Square is 3.8 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Hotel ibis Lisboa Saldanha
Description:
The Hotel ibis Lisboa Saldanha welcomes you to the heart of Lisbon. Enjoy maximum comfort thanks to our modern and completely renovated rooms, ideal for your tourist or professional stays. Accessible via a lift, all renovated rooms are air-conditioned and include a TV with cable/satellite channels. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A hearty all-you-can-eat breakfast is available as well as a bar open 24 hours a day with a snack offer. For ease of travel, Saldanha Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the property. The 24-hour reception is also at your disposal.

The spacious breakfast room adjoins Ibis Lisboa Saldanha‚Äôs bar, where a variety of international drinks are served. Portuguese eateries and intercontinental restaurants are situated within a 5-minute walk.

Guests can make use of the free Wi-Fi connection in public areas. With private covered parking, guests also have easy access to the A1 highway, 4 km away, and to the nearest beaches, 20 km away.

The hotel is situated a 15-minute walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and Avenida da Liberdade. Lisbon Airport can be reached in a 15-minute drive.

Name: Ikonik Lisboa
Description:
Ideally situated in the Parque das Nacoes district of Lisbon, Ikonik Lisboa is situated 800 metres from Gare do Oriente, 600 metres from Lisbon Oceanarium and 7.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ikonik Lisboa the rooms have bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Commerce Square is 8.6 km from Ikonik Lisboa, while Rossio is 8.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km away.

Name: Moxy Lisboa Oriente
Description:
Located in Lisbon, 300 metres from Gare do Oriente, Moxy Lisboa Oriente provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.3 km from Lisbon Oceanarium.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 8.4 km from Moxy Lisboa Oriente, while Commerce Square is 9.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km from the property.

Name: Avenue Hostel & Suites
Description:
Avenue Hostel & Suites offers comfortable accommodation in Lisbon‚Äôs centre, 100 metres from Liberty Avenue. The property is a 5-minute walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and from the nearest Metro Station.

This unit features dormitories, rooms, suites and studios. The rooms all have access to shared bathroom facilities, while the suites and studio each have their own private bathroom. The studio also has a small kitchenette. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

Breakfast is not included. Guests are welcome to visit the surroundings and discover many Portuguese-style and international restaurants. Many establishments are reachable within a 5-minute walk.

Historic Rossio is a 6-minute Metro ride away, as is the equally renowned Chiado. Bairro Alto is a popular nightlife area and is 1.5 km from the B&B. Portela International Airport is 6.6 km away from the Avenue Hostel & Suites. The airport is reachable via metro and a shuttle service is alos available, upon request and at an extra fee.

Name: Charming Apartment in Alfama
Description:
Set in Lisbon, near St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Charming Apartment in Alfama features free WiFi. The property is situated 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7.1 km from Lisbon Oceanarium and 7.9 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is 1 km from Commerce Square, and within 2 km of the city centre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher and an oven. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Gare do Oriente is 8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Charming Apartment in Alfama.

Name: The 8 - Downtown Suites
Description:
Located in the heart of Lisbon city centre, The 8 - Downtown Suites is set in a refurbished 18th-century building in the Pombaline quarter. Sao Jorge Castle is within a 10-minute walk.

The elegant rooms at the 8 are modern and include unique design pieces, such as paintings, Portuguese pottery, vintage furniture and design chairs. All air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have a private bathroom, equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi, safe and a minibar.

Each floor has a Nespresso coffee machine, and there is also a bar, where light meals are served. Guests are 700 metres from Bairro Alto, featuring a wide selection of restaurants and a vibrant nightlife.

Staff at The 8 - Downtown Suites can organise tours, and car and bike rentals. Rossio is within a 5-minute walk, while the famed S√£o Jorge Castle is at 400 metres. Popular Chiado is a 5-minute walk, while the nightlife of lively Bairro Alto is within an 8-minute walk. Guests arriving at Rossio Train Station are 8 minutes‚Äô walking from The 8 Downtown Suites. Lisbon International Airport is around 7 km away.

Name: Internacional Design Hotel
Description:
Occupying a fantastic position on the south side of Rossio Square in Lisbon city centre, the Internacional Design Hotel is a modern and trendy hotel, which offers a welcome drink to all its guests. The property houses the famed Bastardo Restaurant and has views over the historic city centre.

The rooms at this design hotel are spread over 4 floors, with each floor having its own theme and character. With a very unique flavor, all of the accommodation is arty or contemporary in style and offers en suite facilities. Corridors have unique colours, scents and have hanging pictures and paintings depicting famous personalities. Free WiFi is provided and room service is available, upon request.

Breakfast is served each morning, with a view to Rossio Square. The Bastardo Restaurant specializes in refined interpretations of classic Portuguese dishes and delicacies, while also featuring some Asian influences. Internacional Design Hotel has a comfortable and modern bar, which specializes in signature cocktails and beverages. Chiado and Bairro Alto are both within a 5-minute walk, featuring various options in restaurants, caf√©s and assorted eateries.

The Internacional Design Hotel overlooks Rossio Square, a lively piazza with many restaurants, bars and shopping opportunities. Just across from the hotel is a stop for the famed Lisbon Trams. From here, guests can catch a tram to explore the city's historic areas, going as far as Bel√©m, home of the delicious Past√©is de Bel√©m. The hotel is also right by Rua Augusta, Lisbon‚Äôs main pedestrian street.

Name: Lisbon Cheese & Wine Suites
Description:
Located in the trendy Santos district in Lisbon, Lisbon Cheese & Wine Suites offers a unique experience in elegant and carefully decorated accommodation. Free WiFi is available at this guest house.

Each of the guest house's rooms includes an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and high quality amenities.

A delicious breakfast is included in some rates and is served every morning. In the vicinity guests will find a variety of traditional Portuguese restaurants. There is also plenty of bars where guests can relax and enjoy a beverage in the evening.

Major city attractions like Chiado, Bairro Alto, Principe Real and Cais do Sodr√© are within 1.5 km. Private sightseeing tours are available with special conditions.

Lisbon International Airport is 12 km away and a shuttle may be arranged upon request.

Name: Lisbon Best Choice Prime Apartments Alfama
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 1.1 km from Commerce Square and 800 metres from St. George's Castle, Lisbon Best Choice Prime Apartments Alfama offers free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from Lisbon Best Choice Prime Apartments Alfama, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Holiday Inn Express - Lisbon - Plaza Saldanha, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Well set in the centre of Lisbon, Holiday Inn Express - Lisbon - Plaza Saldanha, an IHG Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. Private parking is available on site.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The units at the hotel come with a private bathroom and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at Holiday Inn Express - Lisbon - Plaza Saldanha, an IHG Hotel.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 3.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Be Lisbon Hostel Intendente
Description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Lisbon, Be Lisbon Hostel Intendente features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is situated 1.8 km from Commerce Square, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 7.5 km from Luz Football Stadium. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

Guests at the hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Be Lisbon Hostel Intendente include Rossio, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km from the property.

Name: Residencial Florescente
Description:
Located in the historic centre of Lisbon, Baixa Pombalina, this hotel is near the Restauradores and Rossio Squares. It has a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at the Residencial Florescente include satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a seating area.

In the mornings, guests can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast prepared with fresh ingredients. Local dishes are served for lunch and dinner at the restaurant.

Other convenient facilities at the Residencial include a bar, gift shop and a business centre.

The Florescente is located near Lisbon restaurants, shops and bars.

Name: Casa do Mercado Lisboa
Description:
Offering city views and a bar, Casa do Mercado Lisboa offers accommodation conveniently located in Lisbon, within a short distance of Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. It is set 3.9 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and provides luggage storage space. The property is 1.8 km from the city centre and 1.1 km from Commerce Square.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, units at the bed and breakfast also have free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, the units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, pancakes and fruits are available every morning at the bed and breakfast.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Jeronimos Monastery is 5.7 km from Casa do Mercado Lisboa, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 10 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Lisboa - Av. Liberdade, an IHG Hotel
Description:
The Holiday Inn Express Lisboa - Av. Liberdade is a comfortable accommodation choice set in Lisbon's centre. Liberdade Avenue is a 4-minute walk and is home to some of the trendiest shops and fashion houses in the city.

All air-conditioned rooms are non-smoking and include free WiFi access, flat-screen cable TV, private bathroom and an electric kettle. Complementary coffee and tea is provided.

A varied breakfast buffet is available each day at the Holiday Inn Express. For more meal options, guests can stroll through the Liberdade Avenue, which features a variety of restaurants and caf√©s serving traditional Portuguese meals and international dishes. Guests are welcome to relax in the lounge bar, where refreshing drinks are served.

The Marqu√™s de Pombal Square is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon‚Äôs nightlife in the Bairro Alto is a 5-minute drive away, with all its bars and caf√©s. The Chiado is a 7-minute drive and features plenty of local caf√©s and shops for guests to browse. Another nearby historical area is the Rossio, just a 4-minute drive away.

The Marqu√™s de Pombal Metro Station is 350 metres from the property and connects with most of the Lisbon area. Other nearby stations include the Rato, at 500 metres and Avenida, at 600 metres‚Äô distance. Lisbon International Airport is a 13-minute drive from the Holiday Inn Express Lisboa - Av. Liberdade. An airport shuttle is available, at a surcharge.

Name: Alfama Dream Apartments
Description:
Alfama Dream Apartments provides accommodation within 1.8 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. The property features garden and city views, and is less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The apartment has private entrance.

At the apartment complex, all units have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units are fitted with air conditioning, and certain units at the apartment complex have a balcony. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Rossio. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Boutique Chiado Suites
Description:
Built in 2018, is located in the heart of Lisbon in Chiado, just a 2-minute walk from Bairro Alto. Featuring free WiFi, the property is within a 10-minute walk from Commerce Square and Rossio.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, while some rooms have a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.8 km from Boutique Chiado Suites, while Liberty Avenue is 2.2 km from the property.

Name: Exclusive Top Floor 2BD by the TimeOut market
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.3 km from Rossio and 1.8 km from St. George's Castle, Exclusive Top Floor 2BD by the TimeOut market offers air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and offers a lift. The property is 2 km from the city centre and 1 km from Commerce Square.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment features a cable flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 11 km from Exclusive Top Floor 2BD by the TimeOut market, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: DuMont Lisbon Guesthouse
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, DuMont Lisbon Guesthouse is situated in Lisbon. The property is located 2.2 km from Rossio, 2.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.8 km from Commerce Square.

DuMont Lisbon Guesthouse offers a terrace and 2 shared kitchens where guests can prepare their meals.

Chiado is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Liberty Avenue is 3.5 km from the property.

Name: Dinya Lisbon Hotel
Description:
Dinya Lisbon Hotel is situated in central Lisbon, just 220 metres from Saldanha Metro and 100 metres from the closest bus stop. It features a bar, 24-hour reception desk and free WiFi.

All guest bedrooms at Dinya Lisbon Hotel are equipped with an en-suite bathroom. In addition, every room features cableTV and air conditioning.

Continental breakfast is served each morning in the hotel‚Äôs spacious breakfast area.

The Dinya is situated 2.5 km from Castelo de S√£o Jorge and 3 km from the Tagus River. Lisbon International Airport is only 5 km away.

The hotel offers a car rental service on site (upon request and upon availability).

Name: Chiado Arty Flats
Description:
Located at just a 5-minute walk from Cam√µes Square, Chiado Arty Flats offers accommodation in a prime location within historic Lisbon. It is next to the lively streets of trendy Bairro Alto and features a unique industrial-style d√©cor from an award-winning architect, within a building that once housed the Rep√∫blica newspaper.

Featuring apartments and studios, Chiado Arty Flats has air-conditioned units some featuring balconies and/or city views. Each comes with a bathroom, which has a shower with metal plates. There is a comfortable living area, complete a satellite flat-screen TV and sofas made out of large tubings. All are self-catering, with either a full kitchen or an equipped kitchenette. There are pictures of Bairro Alto's grafittis on the walls and metal barrels are fashioned as washbasins and as tables. A Nespresso coffee machine is featured in all accommodation types. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the studio or apartment, using the kitchen or the kitchenette at their disposal. Alternatively, guests can visit the many restaurants on offer within a 5-minute walk and try out the famed Portuguese cuisine. Both Chiado and Bairro Alto are filled with popular restaurants, bars, caf√©s and eateries.

Rossio is just 600 metres away, while the high end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are within a 10-minute walk. At 500 metres is Baixa-Chiado Metro Station, which provides connection to most of the city's more renowned areas. The S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara Belvedere is at a 3-minute walk, providing sweeping views over Lisbon's rooftops and monuments. The nearest airport is Lisbon Portela Airport, 7 km from the property. The airport is reachable via metro ride.

Name: Portas do Teatro Apartments
Description:
Portas do Teatro Apartament is located in the historical neighborhood of Castelo on a 19th century building next to Lisbon's Roman Theater. Some of the property's apartments overlook the Tagus River and the city. It is within a quiet street in Lisbon's historic center and features free WiFi access.

Blending old and modern d√©cor and featuring parquet floors, these 5 different self catering apartments come with a double and a twin bedroom, a dining room and a living room with flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each has fans and heating. The kitchens are equipped with all modern appliances.

Guests can taste local specialties and classic Portuguese food at the several cafes and restaurants within a 3-minute walk.

The Castle of S. Jorge is a 2-minute walk from Portas do Teatro Apartments, while the Lisbon Cathedral is a 4-minute walk away. Terreiro do Pa√ßo Square, with a metro station and bus stops, is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Lisbon Wine House - Rooms & Suites
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just 800 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.4 km from Rossio, Lisbon Wine House - Rooms & Suites provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. This recently renovated bed and breakfast is located 1.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.1 km from Commerce Square. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the bed and breakfast have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a seating area. At the bed and breakfast, all units come with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.5 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: M√†House GuestHouse
Description:
Set in Lisbon and with Lisbon Oceanarium reachable within 2.4 km, M√†House GuestHouse offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property features garden and city views, and is 2.5 km from Gare do Oriente. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services.

Certain units in the guest house have private entrance and are equipped with desk and outdoor furniture. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in some units, along with bathrobes, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the guest house, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Bike hire and car hire are available at this guest house and the area is popular for hiking. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 6.6 km from the guest house, while Rossio is 7.5 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 3 km from the property.

Name: Travessa Houses
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, Travessa Houses provides accommodation with balcony, around 1.4 km from Rossio. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 500 metres away.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, inner courtyard views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Next Level Premium Hotels
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, Next Level Premium Hotels is located 1.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.9 km from Rossio. The property is situated 1.8 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.2 km from Commerce Square and 3.4 km from St. George's Castle. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving American and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Luz Football Stadium is 5.8 km from Next Level Premium Hotels, while Jeronimos Monastery is 7.3 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: HF Fenix Lisboa
Description:
Located on the central Marqu√™s de Pombal, this non-smoking hotel features soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and picturesque views of the city. At just 10 metres from a metro stop, the property offers free WiFi access, car rental services and organizes citywide tours.

All rooms at HF F√©nix Lisboa offer a well-lit work desk and have access to cable channels. Each air-conditioned room has its own safety deposit box.

Espa√ßo Jardim Restaurant serves Portuguese and European dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Coffee from a Nespresso machine is available in the mornings, while drinks or ap√©ritif can be enjoyed on in the garden‚Äôs furnished terrace.

The staff at F√©nix Lisboa can arrange laundry pick-up and delivery services. Guests can also make use of the indoor parking facilities, which is open throughout the day (surcharges apply).

HF F√©nix Lisboa is a 10-minute drive from Bairro Alto‚Äôs entertainment venues. It is less than 100 metres away from Avenida da Liberdade‚Äôs designer shops and historic buildings.Parque Eduardo VII is across the street from the property. Reachable via metro, Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7.7 km from the hotel.

Name: Home Lisbon Hostel
Description:
Located within a 4-minute walk from Baixa/Chiado area and its‚Äô metro station, Home Lisbon Hotel offers accommodation in the heart of Lisbon. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each of the 4 dorm rooms at Home Lisbon Hotel features air conditioning, a shared bathroom with a shower and, in the female dormitories, guests will find a hairdryer.

There is a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen at the property and home cooked meals can be served. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants and caf√©s can be found in the vicinity.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a library and a living area, where guests can relax or watch a film.

Rossio is 400 metres from the property, while the S√£o Jorge Castle is 800 metres away and the lively Bairro Alto area is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Portela Airport, 7 km from Home Lisbon Hostel, and can be easily accessed by metro.

We do not accept groups larger than 8.

Name: Flores Guest House
Description:
Flores Guest House offers accommodation in central Lisbon, 800 metres from Bairro Alto and 1.5 km from Baixa/Chiado. It features free WiFi and has accommodation in room, studios and apartments.

Each unit has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and guests will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the accommodation. All feature a private bathroom, fitted with a shower. The apartments and studios are self-catering.

Within a 1-minute walk, restaurants, bars and shops can be find in the neighborhood.

You will find dry cleaning services at the property. Flores Guest House only features access via staircase and has no lift access.

The nearest bus stop is within 70 metres from the property. Cascais is 23 km from Flores Guest House, while Troia is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Portela Airport, 6 km from Flores Guest House.

Name: Esqina Urban Lodge
Description:
Set in Lisbon's historic centre, Esqina Urban Lodge is a short 3-minute walk from Chiado and a 2-minute walk from Rossio Square. The Tagus riverside area and Commerce Square are at a 6-minute walk, while Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is within 80 metres.

The property features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. and include a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and a hairdryer.

The surrounding area offers a wide range of restaurants, caf√©s and shops, many within a short walk from the accommodation.

At a 10-minute walk is Bairro Alto, while Avenida da Liberdade is within a 15-minute walk. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Esqina Urban Lodge. The airport is accessible via metro.

Name: Residentas Arco do Bandeira
Description:
Featuring city views, Residentas Arco do Bandeira is situated in the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, less than 1 km from St. George's Castle and a 2-minute walk from Rossio. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Commerce Square, and within 1.4 km of the city centre.

All units at the aparthotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 300 metres from the aparthotel, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.3 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Ambiente Hostel
Description:
Ambiente Hostel is located in Lisbon's well known Almirante Reis Street, at a 5-minute walk from Arroios and Anjos metro stations. Rossio is an 8-minute metro ride from the property, while Chiado is at a 10-minute ride.

The hostel's building dates back to 1900 and the property was fully renovated in 2015. Featuring a lift, it has 4 private rooms and an 8-bed dormitory. Every room is fitted with a shared bathroom. Ambiente Hostel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchen at their disposal, which has free coffee and some snacks throughout the day. Alternatively, Lisbon's historic dowtown has a wide range of popular restaurants, caf√©s and pastry shops for guests to discover.

Avenida da Liberdade is a 20-minute walk from Ambiente Hostel. Alfama, the city's famed Fado district, is 2.3 km away.  The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is 2.5 km away. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 5.4 km km from the property and is accessible via metro.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Lisbon Airport, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Just a 5-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport, this 3-star hotel offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV. Facilities include a 24-hour reception.

The air-conditioned rooms of Holiday Inn Express Lisbon Airport are decorated with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have a work desk, tea and coffee making facilities, and an en suite bathroom.
