Continental buffet breakfast is served daily and includes Portuguese pastries. An express menu is available daily from 19:00 till 22:00 in the hotel's Great Hall.

Express Lisbon Airport is a 5-minute walk from many restaurants. The Vasco da Gama shopping centre is just a 7-minute drive away. Lisbon‚Äôs historic centre is 9.7 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

Name: Casas S√£o Juli√£o
Description:
Casas S√£o Juli√£o offers accommodation within 1.8 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property offers soundproof units and is set 300 metres from Commerce Square.

All units at the apartment complex come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a bath. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Casas S√£o Juli√£o.

Name: Hotel Dom Sancho I
Description:
Hotel Dom Sancho I is located on the tree-lined Avenida Da Liberdade, close to Lisbon‚Äôs shopping and entertainment districts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The hotel offers spacious rooms with dark wood furnishings and each room is equipped with air conditioning and a work desk. Some rooms at the Dom Sancho are fitted with flat-screen TVs.

A varied buffet breakfast is served each morning.

Dom Sancho Hotel provides a 24-hour front desk and a car rental service. Laundry and ironing services are also available.

The hotel is close to the historic Parque Eduardo VII, and is less than 10-minutes by car to Portela Airport.

Name: Alfama Terrace
Description:
Featuring equipped terraces with seating-dining areas and a barbecue, Alfama Terrace is located in one of Lisbon's oldest and quaintest neighbourhoods, Alfama, a 12-minute walk from S. Jorge Castle. It offers a 24-hour reception.

With antique wood or original stone floors, the modern, self-contained apartments at Alfama Terrace offer all of today's modern conveniences including free Wi-Fi access and flat-screen TVs with over 100 international cable channels.

Guests can prepare their meals in the fully equipped kitchen, complete with all the necessary utensils, or outdoors on the shared terrace, at the stone barbecue.

All the air-conditioned apartments overlook the private terraces, where guests can relax with a book, enjoy a drink or simply admire the peaceful views of the Pantheon. The streets surrounding Alfama Terrace offer a wide variety of restaurants, bars, caf√©s and shops.

The Santa Apol√≥nia Train, Metro and Bus Station is a 3-minute walk away, and the Lisbon International Airport is only 15 minutes away by taxi.

Name: Zenit Lisboa
Description:
Located on a leafy avenue in central Lisbon, Zenit offers contemporary accommodation with attention to details. It provides direct access to the Baixa via Saldana Metro Stop and includes a well-equipped gym.

Fitted with designer furnishings, rooms at Zenit Lisboa feature free Wi-Fi and a cable TV. There is also a work desk and en suite bathrooms with hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy modern international cuisine in a casual setting at the at Traste Restaurant. The on-site lobby bar serves renowned Portuguese wines and local spirits until late in the evening.

Popular nearby attractions include the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum, 1 km away and Parque Eduardo VII, a 10-minute walk from the Zenit Lisboa hotel. The reception is open 24/7 and can arrange car rental services.

Name: Rita & Marino Apartment
Description:
Offering city views, Rita & Marino Apartment is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.2 km from Rossio and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is situated 1.9 km from Commerce Square, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 90 metres away.

The 3-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Luz Football Stadium is 8.1 km from the apartment, while Gare do Oriente is 8.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Rita & Marino Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Urbano FLH Hotels Lisboa
Description:
Conveniently located in Lisbon, Urbano FLH Hotels Lisboa offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 7.3 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 7.8 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from St. George's Castle.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Urbano FLH Hotels Lisboa include Commerce Square, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Alif Avenidas
Description:
The Alif Avenidas is located in Lisbon, opposite the S√£o Sebasti√£o Subway Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with LCD TV, and provides 24-hour front desk service.

Alif‚Äôs spacious rooms have parquet floors and trendy furnishings. They come equipped with a laptop safe box, and minibar. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.

Hotel Alif Avenidas also offers a concierge service, and provides luggage storage and a laundry service.

Alif Avenidas is less than a 12-minute ride from the centre of Lisbon. Museu Calouste Gulbenkian is an 8-minute walk away.

Name: Lisbon Top Hostel
Description:
Lisbon Top Hostel is well set in the centre of Lisbon, and provides a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is around 2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.3 km from Commerce Square. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Rossio.

All rooms at the hostel are equipped with a seating area. Lisbon Top Hostel features certain rooms with city views, and every room is equipped with a coffee machine. All units will provide guests with a fridge.

St. George's Castle is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Luz Football Stadium is 4.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: A Better Place by Lisbon II
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout, this accommodation is situated in Lisbon, 2.5 km from Liberty Avenue and 3.5 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and Rossio. The property is located 4 km from Chiado and 3 km from Amoreiras. A Better Place by Lisbon II is close to popular attractions like Bairro Alto, Lisbon Oceanarium and Lisbon Casino, all reachable within 7.5 km.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a shared bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries. Some rooms at A Better Place by Lisbon II also feature a balcony. Guests have access to a shared kitchen.

Nations Park is 7 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 4.5 km from A Better Place by Lisbon II.

Name: Hotel Alicante Lisboa
Description:
Situated 250 metres from Picoas Metro Station, this hotel features air-conditioned rooms and a bar. Avenida da Liberdade and Marqu√™s de Pombal Square are a 10-minute walk away.

Accessible by elevator, all rooms at Hotel Alicante come with cable TV, a safe and private bathroom with hairdryer. The rooms have a light d√©cor and wooden furniture.

A breakfast buffet is available daily in Alicante‚Äôs sunny breakfast room. A number of local taverns and eateries are just a 5-minute walk away.

The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals. A laundry service is available as well.

Name: Portas do C√©u
Description:
Portas do C√©u offers accommodation within 1.6 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The apartment has family rooms.

The units at the apartment complex come with a seating area. Units come with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a terrace and some have sea views. All units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Rossio. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Palacio das Especiarias
Description:
Enjoying a privileged location in the historic center of Lisbon, the property is a former palace whose construction dates back to the 16th century. This boutique hotel combines modern comfort with a classic atmosphere.

The accommodation has air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. In the range of rooms available, there are 3 exclusive royal suites and 2 superior suites with views over the Tagus River or over the old town.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served with live music, piano or violin.
Popular points of interest near Pal√°cio das Especiarias are the picturesque Chiado and Bairro-Alto districts, Commerce Square, Rossio and S√£o Jorge Castle.

The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the property.

Name: Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels
Description:
Located in Lisbon and with Miradouro da Senhora do Monte reachable within 700 metres, Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The property is 1.3 km from Rossio, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at Dos Reis by The Beautique Hotels can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 2.3 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km from the property.

Name: Dom Jo√£o Glamour Hotel
Description:
Dom Jo√£o is a 15-minute walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square. This air-conditioned unit is a 5-minute walk from Anjos Metro Station.

Each room comes with a flat-screen cable TV, telephone and a private bathroom. All rooms also come with an iron and an ironing board. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

Rossio, with its shops, public transports and restaurants, is reached in a 16-minute metro ride. Rossio Train Station has connections to Sintra in a 30-minute train ride, and S√£o Jorge Castle is 10 minutes‚Äô driving from Dom Jo√£o.

Lisbon International Airport is less than a 30-minute bus ride from this guest house.

Name: Hotel Lisboa
Description:
Located alongside Avenida Liberdade, Hotel Lisboa is an entirely non-smoking hotel with fine dining options. 300 meters from Avenida Metro Station, guests can reach Rossio Square in 2 stops. Free WiFi is available.

Decorated with wooden floors and contemporary furnishings, rooms at Lisboa convey a modern atmosphere. They are soundproofed and include a lounge with couch and flat-screen cable TVs. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub.

Gutsy Restaurant offers a variety of flavourful traditional hamburgers. Many local eateries are also available, located just around the corner from the property.

Popular nearby attractions include Pra√ßa dos Restauradores and the Elevador de Santa Justa, both within a 5-minute walk from the Lisboa Hotel. A shuttle to/from Portela Airport can be provided upon request.

Name: Typical Portuguese Apartment in S√£o Bento
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 2.7 km from Commerce Square and 1.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Typical Portuguese Apartment in S√£o Bento offers air conditioning. The property has city views and is 3.3 km from St. George's Castle and 3.9 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Rossio is 1.8 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Jeronimos Monastery is 6.2 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 6.5 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: LX51 Studios & Suites by APT IIN - Lisbon Center
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 700 metres from Liberty Avenue and Marqu√™s de Pombal Square, LX51 Studios & Suites by APT IIN - Lisbon center is situated conveniently in the Santo Antonio district, 1.5 km from Amoreiras.

LX51 Studios & Suites by APT IIN - Lisbon Center has available rooms, suites and studios, each them including air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

There is a Grab & Bistro service, with snacks and drinks. Breakfast is included. All guest can enjoy a common living room and the lounge patio.

Staff can help organise airport transfers, and there is an interactive city guide. Daily housekeeping is provided as well.

The nearby metro station provides access to the whole city. Rossio is 1.6 km from LX51 Studios & Suites by APT IIN and Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet
Description:
Located in the Lisbon centre, Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet offers private and shared accommodations in Bairro Alto, 300 metres from Baixa/Chiado Metro Station. It offers free WiFi access.

Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet features studios, double rooms, twin rooms, superior rooms and premium rooms.

Guests can enjoy a common living and dining room with other guests. The restaurants nearby feature Portuguese cuisine, as well as Fado music.

S√£o Jorge Castle, offering the best panoramic views of Lisbon, is a 25-minute walk away, and Chiado shopping area is around 500 metres away.

Staff at the reception can organise guided tours. Lisbon International Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Inn Bairro Alto BA Sweet.

Name: HF Fenix Garden
Description:
The stylish Hotel Fenix Garden is situated on the Marqu√™s de Pombal Square in the centre of Lisbon. Eduardo VII Park and Marques Pombal Metro Station are just steps away, while the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are at a short walk..

The HF F√©nix Garden offers bright accommodation with wooden floors. Each air-conditioned room offers free WiFi, a work desk, cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The caf√© serves a variety of snacks and drinks. Guests can enjoy a freshly-made breakfast each morning and drink coffee brews from a machine.

With a subway station right around the corner, there is easy access to all the city's sights. Plenty of cultural attractions and shopping venues are found nearby. Rossio is at a 7-minute metro ride, while Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 13.2 km away.

Name: GoodTime Marqu√™s Suites
Description:
Situated within 1.9 km of Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.6 km of Commerce Square, GoodTime Marqu√™s Suites features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. It is set 3.2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and offers a lift. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 1.9 km from Rossio.

At the guest house, each unit comes with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also feature free WiFi. At the guest house, units include bed linen and towels.

St. George's Castle is 3.3 km from the guest house, while Luz Football Stadium is 5.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Portugal here I Come - Alfama-Castelo
Description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Portugal here I Come - Alfama-Castelo is an accommodation set in the heart of Lisbon, just 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and less than 1 km from Commerce Square. The property features quiet street views and is 1 km from Rossio and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 100 metres from St. George's Castle.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and toaster, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.8 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 7.9 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Holiday Inn Lisbon, an IHG Hotel
Description:
This 4-star Lisbon centre hotel offers spacious guest rooms just 10 minutes‚Äô walk from Saldanha, Alameda and Campo Pequeno Metro Stations.  Amenities include a rooftop pool with terrace, a health club and cocktail bar.

Guest rooms at Holiday Inn Lisbon have a work area and wooden floor. In-room amenities include coffee facilities, air conditioning and cable TV.  Some feature a lounge area with sofa bed.

Lounge28 offers a variety of Portuguese and Mediterranean dishes, while our bar serves local wine and a selection of beer.  Room service is available to all of Lisboa Holiday Inn‚Äôs guests.

Holiday Inn Lisbon‚Äôs public areas include a marble lobby with plenty of seating.  A business centre, express check-out service and currency exchange are also available.

Museu Calouste Gulbenkian is approximately 10 minutes‚Äô walk.  Lisbon International Airport is a 10 minutes‚Äô drive from the Holiday Inn.

Name: Alecrim ao Chiado
Description:
Situated in the centre of Lisbon, less than 1 km from Commerce Square, the historic Alecrim ao Chiado features accommodation with free WiFi and a bar. The property has river and city views, and is 800 metres from Rossio. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the guest house, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

A car rental service is available at the guest house.

St. George's Castle is 1.5 km from Alecrim ao Chiado, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is less than 1 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Lisbon City Center
Description:
Featuring accommodation with a terrace, Lisbon City Center is located in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

Rossio is 2 km from Lisbon City Center, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 2.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Prime Lisbon - Boavista 44
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, 1.2 km from Commerce Square and 1.2 km from Rossio, Prime Lisbon - Boavista 44 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is situated 2 km from St. George's Castle and offers a lift. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.4 km from the apartment, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Prime Lisbon - Boavista 44.

Name: Hotel Acores Lisboa
Description:
Situated in in a prime location in Pra√ßa de Espanha, a short stroll to the Metro Station, 4-star Hotel A√ßores Lisboa has a 24-hour reception and provides quick access to Lisbon city centre. It features a permanent exhibition of Azorean photographer Cristina Ata√≠de.

The air-conditioned rooms at the A√ßores Lisboa Hotel are decorated in a contemporary style and come with a minibar, cable TV and safety deposit box. The private bathrooms include wooden floors and free toiletries. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the hotel.

Modern Atl√¢ntida Restaurant serves a range of international and regional Portuguese dishes and room service can be ordered. A variety of beverages are available at the bar, which is decorated with stools and sofas.

Lisbon‚Äôs New University, the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum and El Corte Ingl√©s Mall are a 10-minute walk away from the hotel. Lisbon Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

Name: Moxy Lisbon City
Description:
Ideally located in the centre of Lisbon, Moxy Lisbon City offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a bar. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At Moxy Lisbon City the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 2.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: TM Luxury Apartments Lisbon
Description:
TM Luxury Apartments Lisbon provides accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This aparthotel offers free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. The property is equipped with an outdoor swimming pool and is located 700 metres from Rossio. Facilities for disabled guests are also available.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a wardrobe. All units are equipped with a private bathroom with slippers, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer pool views. At the aparthotel, the units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity. Guests can also relax in the garden.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 9 km from TM Luxury Apartments Lisbon.

Name: Be Poet Baixa Hotel
Description:
With a prime location is Lisbon's historic downtown, Be Poet Baixa Hotel is just 600 metres from Chiado and 300 metres from Rossio Square. At just 140 metres from the Santa Justa Lift, the hotel is also 450 metres from Commerce Square and the Tagus River.

All of the elegant units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and free WiFi. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. There is an on site restaurant, where guests will be able to taste Portuguese delicacies. The surrounding area is also filled with a variety of caf√©s, eateries and bars.

Multilingual staff at the 24-hour front desk will be able to assist guests in booking an airport shuttle service, at an extra fee.

Bairro Alto, the city's most popular nightlife hotspot, is 1.1 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.4 km from Be Poet Baixa Hotel and is reachable via metro.

Name: samesame living
Description:
Samesame living provides accommodation within 1.4 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a toaster. It is located 400 metres from Rossio and features a lift. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.1 km away and Luz Football Stadium is 7.1 km from the apartment.

Accessible via private entrance, all units have air conditioning, soundproofing, desk and a private bathroom with a shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from samesame living.

Name: Majesticlara Lisbon Guest House
Description:
Offering quiet street views, Majesticlara Lisbon Guest House is an accommodation situated in Lisbon, 4.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 4.9 km from Rossio. The property is located 5 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 5.4 km from Commerce Square and 6.1 km from St. George's Castle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Luz Football Stadium is 3.9 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a shared bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the bed and breakfast.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 6.6 km from the bed and breakfast, while Gare do Oriente is 6.9 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Centrally located between Avenida Rep√∫blica and Avenida Berna, this hotel is located 10-minutes metro ride or drive away from downtown Lisbon. Its modern rooms feature a flat-screen TV. Facilities include a fitness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental are decorated with warm colours and parquet floors. All rooms have an electric kettle, a work desk, and an en suite bathroom.

Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental‚Äôs staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide guests with packed lunches and car rental. Fitness salon access is free of charge.

Holiday Inn Lisbon-Continental‚Äôs restaurant serves a rich American breakfast, international dishes, and traditional Portuguese dishes. Room service is available.

Guests can walk to Museu Calouste Gulbenkian and Campo Pequeno Metro Station. The International Fair of Lisbon and the Lisbon Congress Centre are just 15 minutes away by metro.

Name: Prime Lisbon - Sao Paulo 5
Description:
Prime Lisbon - Sao Paulo 5 is set in the Misericordia district of Lisbon, 1.7 km from St. George's Castle, 1.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. It is located 1.1 km from Rossio and provides free WiFi plus a lift. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Commerce Square.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Jeronimos Monastery is 5.9 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.3 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 11 km from Prime Lisbon - Sao Paulo 5.

Name: Pens√£o Londres
Description:
Pens√£o Londres is perched at the top of the iconic Bairro Alto, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Lisbon. This charming guest house combines timeless elegance with modern comfort, featuring free Wi-Fi and tastefully furnished rooms equipped with satellite TV. Many rooms also include a private balcony, perfect for soaking in the city's unique atmosphere.

The top-floor rooms are particularly special, providing stunning vistas of Lisbon's skyline, the Tagus River, and the historic Castelo de S√£o Jorge. These landmarks, along with many of Lisbon's most famous attractions, are just a short walk from the guest house, making it an ideal base for exploring the city.

On the ground floor of Pens√£o Londres, guests will find a delightful caf√© and bakery serving freshly baked Portuguese bread and pastries‚Äîa perfect way to start the day or enjoy a mid-afternoon treat.

The surrounding Bairro Alto neighborhood is renowned for its vibrant character. By day, it offers family-friendly restaurants, traditional markets, and charming cobbled streets. By night, it transforms into one of Lisbon's liveliest areas, filled with music and energy. Just around the corner, guests can visit the Miradouro de S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara, a scenic viewpoint offering spectacular views of Lisbon's historic center.

Whether you're here to explore Lisbon's rich history or immerse yourself in its dynamic culture, Pens√£o Londres provides a welcoming retreat in the heart of it all.

Name: H10 Duque de Loule
Description:
Offering a restaurant, H10 Duque de Loule is located in Lisbon. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. There is also a coffee machine. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box and bed linen.

At H10 Duque de Loule you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a ticket service and a tour desk.

The hotel is 500 metres from Liberty Avenue, 1.3 km from Amoreiras and 1.6 km from Rossio. Lisbon Portela Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Lutecia Smart Design Hotel
Description:
Set in the residential area of Avenida de Roma, this 4-star design hotel was recently renovated and features 9 themed floors, as well as a fusion restaurant serving Portuguese cuisine. The Roma-Areeiro Metro Station is about 200 meters away.

The guest rooms of Lutecia Smart Design Hotel include high-tech furniture, such as design chairs and Smart TVs. All rooms come with an espresso coffee machine and most offer panoramic city views. The suites include a comfortable living area and a luxurious bathroom with a spa bath.

InFusion restaurant offers √† la carte dining in a modern atmosphere. The menu includes several vegetarian alternatives. Lutecia‚Äôs room service enables guests to enjoy their meals privately.

In the morning, you can enjoy an expansive buffet breakfast featuring hot dishes, fresh fruit and cakes. A selection of beverages and light snacks is available at the lobby bar, together with several large flat-screen TVs.

Lutecia Smart Design Hotel is located close to the lively Avenida de Roma. Rossio Square and the Baixa are a short ride on the Green Metro Line.

Name: Stay Hotel Lisboa Aeroporto
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 3.3 km from Gare do Oriente, Stay Hotel Lisboa Aeroporto features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at the hotel also boast a city view. The units have a wardrobe.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Stay Hotel Lisboa Aeroporto.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 10 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 1 km away.

Name: HF Fenix Urban
Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the HF F√©nix Urban is a modern 4-star non-smoking hotel offering free Wi-Fi and contemporary guestrooms with flat screen TVs.

HF F√©nix Urban‚Äôs Parque Restaurant serves a wide range of international cuisine and regional dishes.  There is also a hotel bar, where guests can enjoy the relaxed atmosphere while having a drink.

The bright, airy rooms have a minibar stocked with drink and refreshments. HF F√©nix Urban offers breakfast in the room for those who wish to stay in the comfort of their room.

Lisbon‚Äôs famous Parque Eduardo VII is just a few minutes‚Äô walk from HF F√©nix Urban.  The city's historical centre and Avenida de Liberdade is a short drive away.

Name: Bairro Alto Bronze of Art Apartments
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.8 km from Commerce Square and 1.5 km from Rossio, Bairro Alto Bronze of Art Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

St. George's Castle is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel White Lisboa
Description:
Located in Saldanha, within Lisbon's centre, the elegant Hotel White Lisboa is in front of Saldanha Metro Station. It is 1.8 km from the high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade. Hotel White Lisboa features an outdoor swimming pool and views of the city.

With a predominantly clean and light d√©cor, the rooms and suites at the hotel include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units include a seating area where guests can relax. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, with slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel White Lisboa features free WiFi throughout the property.

A daily breakfast is provided and is served in the property's breakfast room. Guests of the hotel can discover the traditionally rich Portuguese cuisine in of the many restaurants in the surrounding area, many at a 5-minute walk. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Amoreiras is 1.9 km from Hotel White Lisboa, while the Atrium Saldanha shopping centre is just 750 metres away. The popular historic downtown area of the city is accessible within a 15 to 20-minute metro ride and includes areas like Rossio, Chiado, Commerce Square and lively Bairro Alto. S√£o Jorge Castle, an iconic city landmark, is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.2 km from Hotel White Lisboa and is accessible via metro.

Name: Light of Lisbon Apartments I
Description:
Offering free WiFi and river views, Light of Lisbon Apartments I is an accommodation located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.2 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio. The property features city views and is 1.7 km from St. George's Castle and 1.1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and fridge, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Casa Oliver Boutique B&B - Principe Real
Description:
Located in Pra√ßa do Pr√≠ncipe Real Square, Casa Oliver Pr√≠ncipe Real is set in a renovated historical complex with several buildings and offers rooms with modern designs with large windows and free WiFi. Rato Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

Casa Oliver provides individually decorated rooms with wooden floors and a retro d√©cor. They come with a flat-screen TV, open closet and a private bathroom.

A variety of restaurants can be found within a walking distance. Staff can arrange dinner reservations, car rentals, babysitting, laundry and many other services.

The Belvedere of S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara, which provides views over Lisbon, is within walking distance of Casa Oliver. The lively Bairro Alto district is just a 10-minutes walk away. The historical Chiado area, featuring a wide variety of shops and boutiques, is just a 12-minute walk from the property. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km from Casa Oliver and can be easily accessed by metro.

Name: Figueira by The Beautique Hotels & Spa
Description:
Figueira by The Beautique Hotels & SPA offers unique experiences and overlooks the S√£o Jorge Castle. Centrally located in Lisbon, this charm hotel is just 400 metres from the iconic Rossio Train Station.

Sophisticated rooms at The Beautique Hotels Figueira present an exclusive d√©cor with earthy tones and fig tree details. All rooms include an espresso machine and an iPod docking station. Bathrooms come with slippers and bathrobe. Enjoy a wide variety of treatments and relax in the SPA Figueira without leaving the comfort of the hotel.

A breakfast buffet is served daily and the restaurant serves traditional Portuguese delicacies. The award-winner Nini Andrade e Silva was in charge of the hotel‚Äôs interior design, including the restaurant.

Rua Augusta, Lisbon‚Äôs shopping street is a 1-minute walk.

This boutique hotel provides a 24-hour reception, where an airport shuttle can be organised to Lisbon International Airport, located a 12-minute drive. The nearby train station offers links to Sintra in a 30-minute ride. The lively Bairro Alto district is a 10-minute walk from The Beautique Hotels Figueira.

Name: Rossio Garden Hotel
Description:
Dating back to 1900, the 24-hour Rossio Garden Hotel is a newly refurbished boutique hotel located in the heart of Lisbon historic centre, a 1-minute walk from Rossio Train Station.

The rooms were designed by the Portuguese fashion designer, Jo√£o R√¥lo. They all include a flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a shower.

The location of the Garden Hotel offers guests the opportunity of walking to the nearby dining options either in Rossio, or Alfama, or Chiado. Bairro Alto is a 12-minute walk away.

Enjoy the sun on a summer terrace on your way to S√£o Jorge Castle, located a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Rua Augusta shopping street is 400 metres from the hotel, as well as Chiado district.

Shuttle service is available to Lisbon International Airport. Restauradores Metro Station is within 1-minute walk.

Name: Lisboa Central Hostel
Description:
Located just off lofty Avenida da Liberdade, this hostel offers shared and private accommodation and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. It hosts daily cultural events.

Bright colours and parquet floors provide an airy feel to the rooms. Shared rooms offer bunk beds, while private rooms come with 2 single beds and a wardrobe for storing clothes.

Each morning a continental breakfast is served in the hostel‚Äôs dining area. Guests can sample free tasty milkshakes on Milkshake Monday and drinks are available from the bar as well as from vending machines.

Lisboa Central Hostel features a lounge area with flat-screen TV, perfect for relaxing after a day of city exploration. It also offers a laundry service, luggage storage room and a 24-hour reception desk.

Marques de Pombal Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from Lisboa Hostel, linking directly to the inner city.

Name: Zurin Charm Hotel
Description:
Well set in the Campolide district of Lisbon, Zurin Charm Hotel is set 3.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.7 km from Commerce Square and 4.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.1 km from Rossio.

The units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Zurin Charm Hotel have a TV and air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a balcony. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

St. George's Castle is 4.3 km from Zurin Charm Hotel, while Luz Football Stadium is 4.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Mercure Lisboa
Description:
With a top-floor pool featuring glass walls and roof, Mercure Lisboa offers spacious accommodation, a 5-minute walk from Lisbon Zoo. It features free Wi-Fi access and provides child services.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Mercure Lisboa all come with large double-glazed windows and a seating area. They include a TV, radio and a private bathroom with bath.

Guests can enjoy traditional specialities and some continental classics at the restaurant. The on-site lobby bar serves fresh drinks, renowned Portuguese wines and local spirits.

Popular nearby attractions include the Gulbenkian Museum, a 5-minute walk from the Mercure Lisboa Hotel. Sete Rios Metro Station is 300 metres away and has direct links to central Rossio Square.

Name: Hotel Principe Avila
Description:
Attractively situated in Lisbon, Hotel Principe Avila features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Guests can make use of a bar.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer, while some rooms at the hotel also boast a balcony. The units have a safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is available at Hotel Principe Avila.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 3.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Porta do Mar Deluxe Central Apartments
Description:
Porta do Mar Deluxe Central Apartments offers accommodation within 1.9 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is set 400 metres from Commerce Square and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, a hair dryer and a desk. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: TURIM Av. Liberdade Hotel
Description:
Situated at Avenida da Liberdade, Hotel Turim Av. Liberdade is a modern 4-star hotel. It is completely non-smoking and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a minibar. Facilities include a 24-hour reception and room service.

The rooms at Turim Av. Liberdade Hotel are decorated with contemporary furnishings and natural colours. All rooms have internet TV and an en suite bathroom with oversized mirrors.

Guests can enjoy Portuguese dishes and international fare at Turim Av. Liberdade's restaurant. The bar offers a variety of drinks and snacks.

This Turim Hotel offers a laundry service along with a car rental. There is also a business centre with computer terminals.

Lisbon‚Äôs city centre is 2 km away, where guests can visit the Castle of S√£o Jorge and the Lisbon Cathedral. Marques De Pombal Metro Station is just 2 minutes‚Äô walk away.

Name: Melia Lisboa Oriente Hotel
Description:
This renovated hotel in the heart of Lisbon‚Äôs Parque das Na√ßoes is surrounded by trendy restaurants. It offers free Wi-Fi, a brand new restaurant and renovated spacious rooms. Private indoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

Rooms at Melia Lisboa Oriente Hotel are bright and airy and have satellite TV, a seating area and a tea/coffee maker. They overlook the former EXPO 98 site and its many innovative buildings. Some rooms also look out over the water.

The brand new restaurant serves international breakfasts and offers an √† la carte service and a dish of the day, based on the Bistr√¥ & Tapas concept.

The famous Oceanarium and the Lisbon Casino are also close by. Lisbon city centre can be reached within 15 minutes using public transport.

The Meli√° Lisboa Oriente is a short walk from the Gare do Oriente station and is only 3 km from Lisbon International Airport. The area is well-served by Lisbon‚Äôs Metro as well as trains and buses.

Name: My Suite Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real
Description:
My Suite Lisbon features accommodation in suites and studios in Lisbon‚Äôs historical centre. The units are just 700 metres from historical Chiado and are in the lively Bairro Alto area.

All come with a living area with sofas, flat-screen cable TV and an iPod docking station. Each includes a kitchenette, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries. One of the suites enjoys views over the garden.

The kitchenette allows guests the freedom to cook their own meals in comfort. Bairro Alto has a wide range of restaurants eateries and bars, many within a 5-minute walk.

Chiado is Lisbon‚Äôs historical downtown and has several typical caf√©s and shops. Alfama is 3.8 km away and features many Fado houses. Portela International Airport is 9.2 km from the My Suite Lisbon.

Name: WC by The Beautique Hotels
Description:
Located in Lisbon's famed Almirante Reis Street, 900 metres from the historic downtown, WC by The Beautique Hotels is a uniquely decorated hotel. The property's d√©cor was carefully designed to express the cleanliness and comfort of a modern bathroom.

All of the comfortable and soundproofed rooms are elegantly furnished and come equipped with a Smart TV. Each also includes a coffee machine, with complimentary capsules. The rooms also features a private bathroom, with free toiletries. WC by The Beautique Hotels has free WiFi throughout the property.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning at the restaurant area. The surrounding area features a wide range of restaurants, many within a 5 to 10-minute walk.

Intendente Metro Station is at the doorstep. Historic Rossio is 1.4 km from WC by The Beautique Hotels, while Chiado is 1 km away. Bairro Alto is at 2 km and the property is 1.3 km from Liberty Avenue‚Äôs high-end shops and boutiques. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 6.5 km from the property.

Name: Radisson Blu Hotel Lisbon
Description:
Radisson Blu Lisbon is a 4-star hotel, conveniently located less than 2 km from Portela International Airport. At just 100 metres from Campo Grande Metro Station, the hotel has a 24-hour fitness centre, 12 conference rooms and high-speed WiFi access throughout.

The comfortable rooms and suites at the Radisson Blu have modern amenities and wooden flooring. They include cable TV, a tea/coffee maker and seating area, as well as a convenient trouser press, which guests can use on their suits after unpacking. Some rooms have a double sofa bed. The private marble bathrooms are equipped with quality amenities. Suites also feature an espresso machine, with complimentary coffee.

The Bordalo Pinheiro Restaurant serves a rich buffet for breakfast, starting at 06:30, including vegetarian and vegan options. Guests on a hurry in the early morning will find a Grab and Run counter in the lobby from 05:00 onward, with coffee and snacks. Lunch and dinner service is also available at the restaurant, with a focus on Mediterranean cuisine and √† la carte or buffet options.

The Malhoa Bar features cocktails, live piano music on select nights and also has a big screen TV, broadcasting football and other sports. An express laundry service is available, upon request and at an extra fee. The fitness centre is available to all guests at anytime, by using the room's keycard for access. The Radisson's lobby area features sofas. Indoor private parking is available.

The city's business district, Parque das Na√ß√µes, is at a 10-minute drive from the Radisson Blu Hotel Lisbon. The Alvalade XXI Stadium, home of Sporting C.P., is within a 5-minute walk, while Luz Stadium, home of S.L. Benfica, is within 3 km. The nearby metro station offers easy access to Lisbon's historic downtown area, including trendy Bairro Alto, Chiado, Rossio, Commerce Square and even Avenida da Liberdade.

Name: WHome | Luxury Chiado Prime Apartment
Description:
In the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, close to Dona Maria II National Theatre, WHome | Luxury Chiado Prime Apartment features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is situated less than 1 km from Commerce Square and features a lift. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Rossio.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

St. George's Castle is 1.3 km from the apartment, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from WHome | Luxury Chiado Prime Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Vila Olarias
Description:
Situated within 700 metres of Rossio and 700 metres of Dona Maria II National Theatre, Vila Olarias features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. It is located 500 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Commerce Square is 1.4 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is less than 1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Jupiter Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Located halfway between Saldanha and Campo Pequeno, Jupiter Lisboa is a newly built hotel featuring a panoramic rooftop with 2 outdoor swimming pools as well as a SPA, a Portuguese  restaurant and a lobby bar with food and drinks.

Preserving its original 1906 architecture, Jupiter Lisboa Hotel‚Äôs spacious rooms are decorated with images of Lisbon and are equipped with free WiFi, air conditioning, soundproofing, a flat-screen TV and a work desk. Each private bathroom comes with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The on-site restaurant serves a hot breakfast buffet every morning and includes a varied menu with international and traditional Portuguese dishes. The Lisboa Amada lobby bar has a variety of drinks and snacks. A 24-hour room service is available for guests‚Äô convenience. In the summer time there's also a rooftop bar, available for snacks and drinks.

Jupiter Lisboa Hotel‚Äôs 24-hour front desk can provide a variety of services including a shuttle service, bicycle and car rental, ticket service, luggage storage and a concierge service. Private underground parking is available, at an extra fee. The hotel has 3 fully equipped meeting rooms. There is a 24-hour fitness centre available, free of charge. The BluSpa at Jupiter Lisboa Hotel, features an indoor treatments pool, sauna, steam bath and a complete massages and treatments menu. These services are not included in the rate.

The Baixa Pombalina and Chiado shopping areas are just a 15-minute metro trip away and both Luz and Alvalade Football Stadiums are within 4 km. Lisbon International Airport is 4 km away.

Name: TURIM Luxe Hotel
Description:
The Luxe Hotel, located in Lisbon‚Äôs historical centre, is close to Anjos Metro Station and downtown Lisbon is within walking distance. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout the property.

Luxe Hotel By Turim Hoteis offers contemporary rooms decorated with chic furnishings and earthy colours. Each has satellite TV and modern bathrooms.

Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast at the Luxe Hotel By Turin Hoteis. The hotel also features a bar.

Eduardo VII Park and Liberty Avenue are both less than 2 km from Hotel Luxe. At the 24-hour front desk, guests can ask for more information about the local area.

Name: Alvalade II Airport Guest House
Description:
Located in a building, Alvalade II Airport Guest House features rooms with a romantic d√©cor, 7 minutes‚Äô walking from Lisbon‚Äôs Alvalade Metro Station and 15 minutes‚Äô walking from Campo Grande.
Guest House locate on a 3rd floor with no lift.

Guest House with shared bathrooms.
The guest house features private accommodation. Some rooms have a private bathroom, and others have their own private balcony.

The kitchen is shared and has all utensils for guests. There is a shared lounge area with a TV, as well as an outdoor terrace.

Alvalade II Airport Guest House provides free WiFi access, and guests are within a few steps from several shops and restaurants.

Rossio Train Station is a 23-minute metro ride from the Alvalade Guest House, and Lisbon International Airport is a 16-minute bus ride.

Name: LX SoHo Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels
Description:
Ideally set in the Arroios district of Lisbon, LX SoHo Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels is situated 1.7 km from Rossio, 1.7 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3 km from Commerce Square. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views.

A buffet, √† la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the hotel, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 6.9 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Studio 59 Lisboa
Description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Studio 59 Lisboa is an accommodation situated right in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.5 km from Rossio and 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is located less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 2.2 km from Commerce Square and 1.9 km from St. George's Castle. The accommodation features a lift, and luggage storage for guests.

Some units also have a well-fitted kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a fridge, and a stovetop.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.2 km from the guest house, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: The Hilltop Nest
Description:
Offering city views, The Hilltop Nest is an accommodation located in Lisbon, 1.4 km from Rossio and 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is around 2.5 km from Commerce Square, 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and 8.2 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 400 metres away.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and toaster, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Luz Football Stadium is 8.3 km from the apartment, while Gare do Oriente is 8.5 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from The Hilltop Nest.

Name: Casa Da Severa Apartments
Description:
Casa Da Severa Apartments provides accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property features quiet street views and is 600 metres from Rossio and 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre. Each room is equipped with a balcony with views of the city.

At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units will provide guests with a toaster.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Bairro Alto Guesthouse
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Bairro Alto Guesthouse is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.4 km from Commerce Square and 1.8 km from St. George's Castle. The property has garden and city views, and is 800 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is 700 metres from Rossio, and within 1 km of the city centre.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also have free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a balcony. At the guest house, the units include bed linen and towels.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.9 km from the guest house, while Luz Football Stadium is 6.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge
Description:
Conveniently set in Lisbon, Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Guests can make use of a bar.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge also provide guests with a city view. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, √† la carte or continental options.

Popular points of interest near Esqina Cosmopolitan Lodge include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Rossio Plaza Hotel
Description:
Attractively set in the centre of Lisbon, Rossio Plaza Hotel provides 3-star accommodation close to Commerce Square and Rossio. The property is around 7 km from Jeronimos Monastery, 7.9 km from Luz Football Stadium and 8.5 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near Rossio Plaza Hotel include St. George's Castle, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Industrial Lisbon Apartment
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, less than 1 km from Rossio and a 8-minute walk from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Industrial Lisbon Apartment offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is situated 1.5 km from Commerce Square and features an ATM. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.

At the guest house, the units are fitted with a wardrobe. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with garden or city views. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

A minimarket is available at the guest house.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.3 km from the guest house, while St. George's Castle is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Industrial Lisbon Apartment.

Name: BN GHouse
Description:
BN GHouse features accommodation situated 500 metres from the centre of Lisbon and offers a terrace and a shared lounge. The property is around 2.2 km from Commerce Square, 1.8 km from St. George's Castle and 6.5 km from Luz Football Stadium. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

Each unit is fitted with a private bathroom, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature a city view.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Vincci Liberdade
Description:
Primely set next to Lisbon‚Äôs poshest street, Avenida da Liberdade, this 4-star hotel is located in the city centre. Sited in a renovated historical building, Vincci Liberdade includes a restaurant, bar and private parking.

The hotel‚Äôs elegant and modern rooms all come with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned units also feature a private bathroom and most also have a small seating area.

Breakfast service is available and is served each morning at the hotel‚Äôs restaurant. Guests wishing to enjoy lunch or dinner at the hotel‚Äôs restaurant will be able to choose from a menu that includes various Portuguese specialities, as well as some international dishes.

The 24-hour front desk staff is always available to assist guests. Staff will be more than happy to help guests with suggestions of the best nearby spots and eateries. At the end of a day touring Lisbon, guests can relax in the lounge area with a drink or cocktail from the hotel‚Äôs bar.

The Vincci is just steps from trendy Avenida da Liberdade, famed for being the site for numerous high-end shops and boutiques. Avenida Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk and features connections with most of the city‚Äôs emblematic areas. Rossio is a 9-minute metro ride, while Chiado and Bairro Alto are a 12-minute metro ride away. Lisbon‚Äôs Portela International Airport is 8 km from Vincci Liberdade and is also accessible via metro.

Name: Luxury Apartment T2 - Saldanha
Description:
Set 2.5 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 2.9 km from Rossio in the centre of Lisbon, Luxury Apartment T2 - Saldanha offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. It is located 3.8 km from St. George's Castle and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property offers city views.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Commerce Square is 3.8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 5.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Luxury Apartment T2 - Saldanha.

Name: City Stays Cais do Sodre Apartments
Description:
Offering a central location in Cais do Sodr√©, these modern style apartments are a few steps from the train and metro station. City Stays Cais do Sodre Apartments includes free WiFi access.

These new units include a fully equipped kitchenette separated from the living room by a wooden frame. The living room features a flat-screen satellite TV and a sofa. Some apartments offer river views.

City Stays central location means restaurants, bars, caf√©s and public transports are just around the corner. Chiado district can be found within 800 metres, and Bairro Alto is less than a 10-minute walk up the street.

Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is a 5-minute walk and offers connections throughout the city. Guests can catch the train at the nearby Cais do Sodr√© Train Station and take the 20-minute train ride to Cascais and Estoril.

Lisbon International Airport is a 28-minute bus ride from the City Stays Apartments.

Name: Oriente DNA Studios
Description:
Located in Lisbon, Oriente DNA Studios are 8 apartments situated just 750 metres from the trendy Parque das Na√ß√µes district. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi and is 500 metres from the iconic Gare do Oriente Transport Hub.

The apartments include a living area with a sofa and a cable TV. The shared terrace has a seating area where guests can relax while enjoying a glass of wine. Each apartment features a private bathroom.

Guests can prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette available in each apartment. In the vicinity guests will find plenty of restaurants serving traditional Portuguese cuisine and international cuisine as well.

The Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre is 10-minute walk away and the MEO Arena is 900 metres away. Lisbon‚Äôs Oceanarium is 1.7 km away and Lisbon International Airport is 2.2 km away.

Please note that there is no reception on site.

Name: Hotel Luena
Description:
Set in Lisbon, Hotel Luena is at a 10-minute walk from Saldanha and is 400 metres from the Arroios Metro Station. A daily breakfast buffet is provided.

The hotel's rooms come with free WiFi, air conditioning, parquet floors and a flat-screen cable TV. Featuring a bath tub, the private bathroom in each room also comes with a hairdryer.

Guests can relax in the shared lounge and there is also an onsite bar.

Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and the gardens of Eduardo VII Park are at a 20-minute walk. Within a 25-minute walk are the high-end shops and boutiques at Avenida da Liberdade. Lisbon's historic downtown area is reachable through a 20-minute metro ride. Humberto Delgado International Airport is within 4.4 km from Hotel Luena.

Name: Portugal Here I Come Conde Redondo
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Rossio and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Portugal Here I Come Conde Redondo offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and kettle. This apartment features free private parking and a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Commerce Square is 2.7 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Lisbon Style
Description:
The Lisbon Style is a modern accommodation located in the Lisbon city centre. It is 170 metres from the Anjos Metro Station, which connects with most the city.

Featuring a unique d√©cor, the rooms feature walls painted with renowned Lisbon locations and monuments. All rooms feature a private bathroom. Guests of the apartments enjoy access to a private kitchen, living room with a sofas and a TV. The rooms are accessible via staircase.

Chiado, Lisbon‚Äôs downtown area is a 10-minute drive away. Rossio, a 7-minute drive, has various shops and caf√©s. 4 km away is Bairro Alto, the city‚Äôs main bar area. Lisbon International Airport is a 9-minute drive from Lisbon Style.

Name: Portas do Castelo Apartments
Description:
Located in the centre of the city a 2-minute walk from the panoramic S√£o Jorge Castle and S√© Cathedral, in a typical Lisbon district, the apartments of Portas do Sol Apartments offer city and Tagus River views.

The unit is sited in a renovated 19th century building. All apartments feature a terrace or garden and are located at one of Lisbon's most iconic staircases, providing guests the rare quietude of a street without traffic. Units blend classical elements and architecture with a contemporary d√©cor, creating an eclectic atmosphere. Each apartment has an iPod docking station, free WiFi and a satellite TV.

The apartment‚Äôs kitchens are fully equipped to prepare meals, which can be enjoyed al fresco. The apartments‚Äô restaurant, bar and lounge is located a few steps away, with fantastic views of the city and a summer terrace.

Portas do Sol features a meeting room located 200 metres from the apartments, which guests can use upon previous request and at an extra charge. Babysitting services are also available.

Santa Apol√≥nia Metro Station is 1 km away, and Lisbon International Airport is 10 km away from Portas do Sol. The quaint Alfama district, with its cobbled streets and restaurants with Fado music, is 500 metres away. The Lisbon Cathedral is a 1-minute walk away while the historical Chiado area is a 5-minute walk.

Name: room Select Liberdade
Description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Lisbon, room Select Liberdade features buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is allergy-free and is situated 700 metres from Rossio.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English, Spanish and Portuguese.

Popular points of interest near room Select Liberdade include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: Garcia Place
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just less than 1 km from Rossio and a 9-minute walk from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Garcia Place provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is situated 6.2 km from Luz Football Stadium, 7.4 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 8.8 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a walk-in shower. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Garcia Place include Commerce Square, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

Name: WOT Lisbon Nomad
Description:
WOT Lisbon Nomad features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 2.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The hostel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Rossio is 2.9 km from WOT Lisbon Nomad, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

Name: Portas da S√© Apartments
Description:
Set on a 19th century building next to the Cathedral, Portas da S√© Apartments features a blend of antique and modern decor. It is located between the Alfama and Baixa districts.

With free WiFi, the self-catering apartments come with a dining and living room with a sofa, flat-screen TV. The kitchen are fully equipped and both have a twin and a double room.

Guests can taste local specialities and classic Portuguese food at the cafes and restaurants in the immediate surroundings.

The Castle of S. Jorge is 600 metres from Portas da S√© Apartments. Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio, where guests can take any kind of public transportation, is a 6-minute walk away.

Name: Green Heart Hostel
Description:
Green Heart Hostel is a lively youth-oriented hostel located in the Portuguese capital, 500 metres from central Marqu√™s de Pombal Square. Featuring free WiFi, this property organizes regular dinner parties, has a shared lounge area and after-hours parties.

The property features accommodation in dormitories, as well as in private single and double rooms. All come with access to shared bathroom facilities.

Guests may make full use of the communal kitchen at their disposal. The comfortable shared lounge includes a dining area. Alternatively, several restaurants are available within a short 5-minute walk.

Avenida da Liberdade is 500 metres away and features several name brand boutiques and fashion stores. Historical Chiado is at a 9-minute drive and has several traditional caf√©s and shops. S√£o Jorge Castle is a 10-minute drive and Bairro Alto is 3 km away. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km from the Green Heart Hostel.

Name: Olissippo Oriente
Description:
Olissippo Oriente is located in Lisbon‚Äôs Parque das Na√ß√µes, just 300 metres from the Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre and at a 4-minute walk from the Oriente Station transport hub, which has connectios with the city's historic centre. Lisbon's popular Oceanarium is within 500 metres.

The rooms of Olissippo feature a modern interior decorated with wooden furniture. All rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV, soundproofing, a minibar, and a work desk. There's also the option of a spacious junior suite, complete with a comfortable seating area. Room service is available, at an extra fee.

The Olissippo Oriente‚Äôs Descobertas restaurant serves a combination of traditional Portuguese dishes and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a variety of snacks and light meals on the shaded terrace at Coffee Shop Oriente.

The reception of Olissippo Oriente is open 24/7. The hotel also offers car rental, fax and photocopying services, and laundry facilities.

The Lisbon Casino is a mere 3-minute walk from the hotel. Altice Arena, site of various concerts and entertainment events is at 500 metres. Feira Internacional de Lisboa is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is just 3 km away and is reachable via metro.

Name: House Sao Bento
Description:
House Sao Bento is a recovered historical building located in Lisbon. Set in a quiet and safe area, this guest house provides free WiFi access.

Featuring crafted ceilings and 1960‚Äôs frescoes, the rooms at House Sao Bento are equipped with desks. The suite includes a private bathroom and the remaining rooms have access to shared bathroom facilities. Linen and towels are provided.

Guests may use the shared kitchen to prepare their own meals and relax at the shared lounge available. Within 300 metres guests will find a great variety of restaurants serving traditional Portuguese cuisine. The lively Bairro Alto, situated a 12-minute walk, is the perfect place to end the evening since it is filled with plenty of bars to choose from.

Laundry, dry cleaning services as well as grocery deliveries are available for a surcharge. Staff can arrange a car rental service upon request.

The shopping area of Chiado is 1.4 k m away and the historic Alfama neighbourhood is 3 km away. The famous Tram 28 as well as the bus stops in front of the guest house entrance and the Santos Train Station is a 10-minute walk away. For an additional cost, an airport shuttle for the Lisbon Portela Airport, located 7 km away, can be provided.

Name: Amazing river view in historical Lisbon
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.1 km from Commerce Square, Amazing river view in historical Lisbon provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. With quiet street views, this accommodation offers a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from St. George's Castle.

The apartment with a balcony and river views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

Rossio is 1.3 km from Amazing river view in historical Lisbon, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Tivoli Oriente Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Tivoli Oriente Lisboa Hotel provides contemporary accommodation within Lisbon‚Äôs iconic Parque das Na√ß√µes, overlooking the Tagus River. It features an indoor pool with a hot tub, relaxation facilities and a refurbished fitness centre.

Renovated and soundproofed rooms at Tivoli Oriente Lisboa Hotel offer catchy interior decorations, most with designer furnishings and stunning views over Lisbon, the Tagus River or the business centre avenue. They all include satellite TV channels and en suite bathrooms with bathtub or shower.

Guests can enjoy enticing cocktails at the Sky Bar which provides panoramic views over Lisbon and the Tagus River.

Popular landmarks nearby the hotel Tivoli Oriente Lisboa include the adjacent Vasco da Gama Shopping Centre and Esta√ß√£o do Oriente Station. Lisbon International Airport is just a 5-minute drive away and 3 metro stops (10 minutes) away.

Name: Boutique Telhal 89
Description:
Ideally located in the Santo Antonio district of Lisbon, Boutique Telhal 89 is set 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.6 km from Commerce Square and 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is less than 1 km from Rossio, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with city or quiet street views. At the guest house, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.
