St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the guest house, while Luz Football Stadium is 6.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Boutique Telhal 89.

Name: behotelisboa
Description:
Behotelisboa offers accommodation in Lisbon‚Äôs historic Pombaline Downtown and is located just 50 metres away from Rua Augusta, Lisbon‚Äôs main shopping street. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each room at Behotelisboa has a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free toiletries. Breakfast is available and is served next door at Taberna 132 restaurant. Daily cleaning is provided and room service is also available.

Please note that when booking more than 7 rooms, different policies and conditions may apply.

Guests will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and bike hire and car hire are available.
There is a variety of restaurants available in the surroundings and Rossio and Chiado are a 5-minute walk from behotelisboa. Lively Bairro Alto is 1.1 km away while iconic Alfama is 1.2 km away and is renowned for its many Fado Houses, where guests can enjoy Portuguese food while watching Fado concerts.The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 7 km from the property.

Name: Grande Pensao Residencial Alcobia
Description:
Situated in Lisbon‚Äôs city centre, between Martim Moniz and Figueira Square, this hotel offers panoramic views of S. Jorge Castle. Facilities include car and bicycle rental.

The air-conditioned rooms of Grande Pens√£o Residencial Alcobia are decorated with warm colours, wooden furniture, and parquet floors. All rooms have satellite TV, a hairdryer, and a private bathroom.

Every morning, guests can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast in Grande Residencial Alcobia‚Äôs breakfast room.

It is possible to arrange Lisbon city tours at Grande Pens√£o Residencial Alcobia‚Äôs 24-hour reception. WiFi access is available at the lobby, as well as a computer for guests' use.

The Rossio metro station is just 280 metres from of Grande Pens√£o Residencial Alcobia, and the Lisbon Cathedral is 700 metres away.

Name: Apartment in Santos
Description:
Located near Commerce Square and Rossio, Apartment in Santos is in Lisbon and provides free private parking and a restaurant. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The apartment features family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. Some of the units include a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, some units are fitted with a coffee machine and wine or champagne.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Barbecue facilities are included at the apartment, and guests can also relax in the garden or go on a picnic in the picnic area.

St. George's Castle is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels
Description:
Well situated in Lisbon, Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. The property is set 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 600 metres from St. George's Castle and 7.7 km from Luz Football Stadium. Jeronimos Monastery is 8.6 km away and Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.7 km from the hotel.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, the units at Memoria Lisboa FLH Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms come with a balcony. All rooms feature a safety deposit box.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Casa Portuguesa Chiado 25
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 600 metres from Rossio and less than 1 km from Commerce Square, Casa Portuguesa Chiado 25 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 1.4 km from St. George's Castle. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, river views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Ramada by Wyndham Lisbon
Description:
Featuring breathtaking views of Lisbon and the Tagus River, this 4-star hotel is a 10-minute drive from Parque das Na√ß√µes and the riverside. The hotel's restaurant serves tasty Mediterranean cuisine. The nearest Metro Station is Olaias, just across the street from the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Ramada Lisbon are decorated with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have a minibar, satellite TV, and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a separate living area.

A daily breakfast buffet is served in the hotel's meal area. The Navegadores restaurant offers stunning views of the Tagus River, and a d√©cor featuring paintings by Luis Pinto Coelho.

Alameda Metro Station is at a 10-minute walk. The venue for Rock in Rio Lisbon, the Bela Vista Park, is 1.4 km from the hotel. Lisbon's historic centre is a 15-minute drive away and features historic areas like Rossio, Chiado and the lively Bairro Alto. The Ramada Lisbon is 4.7 km from Lisbon's Portela International Airport.

Name: Arroios Concept Apartments by Homing
Description:
Offering city views, Arroios Concept Apartments by Homing is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.2 km from Rossio. The property is around 3.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 4.1 km from St. George's Castle and 4.7 km from Commerce Square. Luz Football Stadium is 6.9 km away and Jeronimos Monastery is 10 km from the apartment.

All units are air-conditioned and some of them feature a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area. The units are fitted with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace and some have river views. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 6 km from the apartment, while Gare do Oriente is 6.3 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km from the property.

Name: The Hygge Lisbon Suites - Estrela
Description:
Offering a shared lounge and quiet street view, The Hygge Lisbon Suites - Estrela is situated in Lisbon, 2.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 3.3 km from Commerce Square. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.8 km from Rossio. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Units include a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also boast a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and fruits are available each morning.

St. George's Castle is 3.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Altis Grand Hotel
Description:
Featuring a free heated indoor pool, spa and a gym, this recently refurbished 5-star hotel is set in Lisbon‚Äôs business district. Altis Grand Hotel is a 2-minute walk from Avenida da Liberdade's fashionable boutiques, and 700 metres from Pr√≠ncipe Real.

With an elegant and stylish d√©cor of luxurious ebony wood and soft tones, all rooms are soundproofed and equipped with a well-lit working space. WiFi access is free at the Altis Grand Hotel ‚Äì Luxury Collection Hotels.

Boasting amazing views over Lisbon, Tagus River and S. Jorge Castle, Grill D. Fernando Restaurant offers a range of Portuguese dishes, with emphasis on fresh local fish. The wholesome breakfast features a selection of fresh pastries, including the well-known Pastel de Nata (traditional custard pie).

Avenida Metro Station is 400 metres away from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is at a 7.6 km distance from ‚Äì Luxury Collection Hotels. Chiado is within a 20-minute walk, as are the bars of Lisbon's trendy Bairro Alto.

Name: N√¥ma Living Pop Saldanha
Description:
N√¥ma Living Pop Saldanha provides accommodation within 1.3 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The apartment features family rooms.

At the apartment complex, every unit includes a outdoor furniture, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. At the apartment complex, all units are allergy-free and soundproof.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Rossio is 3.2 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Hotel 3K Europa
Description:
This design hotel is situated a 2-minute walk from both Pra√ßa de Entrecampos and the Campo Pequeno bullring in Lisbon. Hotel 3K Europa offers modern, stylishly decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TV.

All of the air-conditioned rooms have views of Lisbon city with some rooms overlooking Campo Pequeno. Each is decorated according to different themes of European cities.

A buffet breakfast is available for guests daily. 3K Europa includes an elegant bar with contemporary furniture and there are luggage storage facilities and safety deposit boxes.

An airport shuttle can be arranged upon request and at an additional charge at the 24-hour reception to Lisbon Portela International Airport, 4 km away. Campo Pequeno metro station is a 2-minute walk away.

Name: Water and Sun Studio
Description:
Offering garden views, Water and Sun Studio is an accommodation situated in Lisbon, 3.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 4.2 km from Rossio. Boasting pool views, a garden and a private pool, this apartment also includes free WiFi. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

Each unit features a terrace, a satellite flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 4.3 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 4 km from Water and Sun Studio.

Name: Central Lisbon Luxury Apartment
Description:
Situated in the centre of Lisbon, 2.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 2.8 km from Rossio, Central Lisbon Luxury Apartment offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 3.4 km from Commerce Square and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

St. George's Castle is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Central Lisbon Luxury Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: M'AR De AR Auria
Description:
Located in one of the main areas in the center of Lisbon, this is the ideal hotel for family holidays, business or leisure trips, and where you will have all kinds of shops and restaurants at your disposal. Our Hotel is just 4.5 Km from the nearest airport which is Humberto Delgado Airport, and has in its surroundings all types of transport to make your visit more comfortable. We are just 350 meters from the Arroios and Saldanha Metro Station and a few meters from the bus stop.
For maximum comfort, our reception is open 24 hours a day. Enjoy the maximum comfort thanks to the completely renovated rooms, with modern furniture and all accessible by elevator. All rooms at the hotel have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a safe, bed linen and towels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided for guests' comfort. Some rooms include a seating area with a sofa and others have a balcony. Wi-Fi access is available free of charge in all areas of the Hotel. Guests also have a place to store their luggage at their disposal.
Lisbon is synonymous with culture. Venture out on the centuries-old tram to Castelo de S√£o Jorge, where you will have the best view over the city. Cross the historic neighborhood of Alfama where you will find Fado and the most typical gastronomy of Lisbon. Stroll through Parque das Na√ß√µes or through Bel√©m and be sure to visit the Botanical Garden and the most varied shopping centers in the city where you can find all kinds of stores you are looking for. The beaches of Costa da Caparica, Estoril and Cascais are all within 28 km of Lisbon.
The reception staff can help arrange restaurant reservations, car hire, ticket bookings, sightseeing tours and will be happy to inform you of Lisbon's main attractions, entertainment and public transport.

Name: Bel√©m Design Apartments by Homing
Description:
Ideally set in the Belem district of Lisbon, Bel√©m Design Apartments by Homing is situated 1 km from Jeronimos Monastery, 8 km from Commerce Square and 8.5 km from Rossio. The property is set 8.5 km from St. George's Castle, 8.6 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 9 km from Luz Football Stadium. Gare do Oriente is 17 km away and Pena National Palace is 26 km from the apartment.

All units are equipped with a TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a toaster and coffee machine. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 10 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 17 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Fullest Apartments
Description:
Fullest Apartments is situated in Lisbon, 200 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre. Rossio is 200 metres from the property.

The accommodation has a TV with cable channels. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. A microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a fridge. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower in every unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Chiado is 600 metres from Fullest Apartments, while Liberty Avenue is 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from the property.

Name: Hygge House
Description:
Offering free WiFi, Hygge House offers accommodation in Lisbon, 1 km from Liberty Avenue and 1.6 km from Amoreiras. Conveniently situated in the Arroios district, the property is set 2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. Rossio is 2 km away and Chiado is 2.3 km from the Hygge House

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

Bairro Alto is 2.3 km from the economy hotel, while Lisbon Casino is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from the property.

Name: AlmaLusa Alfama
Description:
Ideally set in the centre of Lisbon, AlmaLusa Alfama features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Commerce Square.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some boast river views. All units have a safety deposit box.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the hotel.

Popular points of interest near AlmaLusa Alfama include St. George's Castle, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Dona Graca Lisbon Apartments
Description:
Set in Lisbon, Dona Graca Lisbon Apartments is situated in a renovated 19th century building within the historic Gra√ßa quarter. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and is at a 7-minute walk from Senhora do Monte Belvedere, as well as a 15-minute walk from Alfama.

With a total of 8 accommodations, divided into studios and apartments, all units include free WiFi, a kitchenette, balcony, air conditioning, private bathroom and a comfortable living area, with a flat-screen cable TV.

A daily breakfast is delivered each morning at the studio or apartment. Guest are also welcome to discover the surrounding area, which has a wide range of restaurants and eateries serving traditional Portuguese meals.

The property features a garden, where guests can relax, read a book or just enjoy the sun.

Avenida da Liberdade is 2.4 km from Dona Graca Lisbon Apartments, while Rossio is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 6.3 km from the accommodation.

Name: Castle Inn Lisbon Apartments
Description:
Set in a renovated traditional building in the heart of Lisbon, Castle Inn Lisbon offers accommodation in the Castelo de S√£o Jorge neighborhood. The property is located within the castle's walls.

It is because access is only for authorized vehicles such as local taxis, 737 buses and some transfers. Ask for more information to property before book transport on internet, to ensure car can access inside castle neighborhood.

The five apartments are decorated with local artists‚Äô works and all come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with towels and toiletries. Some apartments boast views of the Tagus River. Free WiFi access is provided.

There is a kitchenette in each unit where guests can prepare their meals, featuring a toaster, a kettle and an equipped dining area. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in the vicinity. A grocery store is within a 5 minute walk.

There is a bus stop within a 2-minute walk from the property, providing easy connections to different areas of the city. A lift connecting with Lisbon's downtown is a short walk away. The charming Alfama district, known for its traditional Fado music venues, is 750 meters away. Lisbon International Airport is 6.6 km from Castle Inn Lisbon.

Name: Duque 53
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Duque 53 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. It is set 1.4 km from St. George's Castle and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1 km from Commerce Square.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. This apartment also comes with a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Duque 53.

Name: Hotel Canada
Description:
Air-conditioned rooms with soundproofed windows are standard in each of the rooms in this city hotel in Lisbon, 350 metres from the Saldanha Metro Station. A breakfast buffet is available each morning. Our exterior lounge is the place to enjoy breakfast while enjoying the sun rays, open from 07:00 to 19:30.

Cable TV and a work desk are available in all rooms at Hotel Canada. Each one is simply furnished and has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

A number of fish taverns, international restaurant and caf√©s are situated within a 5-minute walk from Hotel Canada. Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and Avenida da Liberdade can be reached in a 15-minute walk.

The 24-hour reception desk has a laundry service. Lisbon Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

1924 provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. The property features city views and is 1.5 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.9 km from Rossio. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, and luggage storage for guests.

The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a coffee machine. Units come complete with a shared bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, while certain units at the bed and breakfast also offer a seating area. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the bed and breakfast.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.9 km from the bed and breakfast, while Commerce Square is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from 1924.

Name: NEYA Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Neya Lisboa Hotel is located in a quiet area in the city centre. The hotel is about 5 km away from the airport with various options of transportation. The hotel provides room services along with buffet breakfast. Free WiFi is available.
Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with shiatsu massage pillows and a spacious and fully equipped private bathroom.
The Lounge BAR, serves drinks and snacks menus.
Neya Lisboa Hotel offers bicycles to guests for trips around the city. Guest can also enjoy day spa with a hot tub, massage services and natural beauty treatments.
Neya Lisboa Hotel is situated about 15-minute walk away from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and the beginning of Avenida da Liberdade.

Name: Apartamentos Lux Dinastia
Description:
Offering city views, Apartamentos Lux Dinastia is an accommodation situated in Lisbon, 2 km from Rossio and 2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Some of the units have a cable TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer.

A continental breakfast is available at the apartment.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Apartamentos Lux Dinastia.

Commerce Square is 3 km from the accommodation, while St. George's Castle is 3.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels
Description:
The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels offers accommodation in Lisbon's historic downtown, just a 1-minute walk from the Santa Justa Lift. Commerce Square, with its iconic Augusta Street Arch and Tagus River views is at a 4-minute walk.

The 5 floors of the property each has a distinct d√©cor. Every room at this guest house is air conditioned and is equipped with a TV and a coffee machine. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom, with free Castelbel toiletries and a hairdryer. The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels features free WiFi throughout the property.

A daily breakfast is served at the property's breakfast room, which has views over √Åurea Street. A wide range of restaurants, caf√©s and pastry shops are at a short walk.

The Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is 160 metres away, while Rossio Square is a 3-minute walk away. The high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are at a 7-minute walk. Alfama is a 15-minute walk away and the S√£o Jorge Castle is at 1.2 km. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 8.7 km from The Lift Boutique Hotel by RIDAN Hotels. Airport shuttle is available, at an extra fee.

Name: Teatro Boutique Rooms & Suites
Description:
Located in the heart of historical Lisbon, Teatro Boutique Chiado is nestled in between the popular districts of Bairro Alto and Chiado. It offers air-conditioned rooms with contemporary, Parisian-style d√©cor and a private bathroom.

The modern designed rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV, minibar, sofa and a wardrobe. Each has an ultra-modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available.

Teatro Boutique Chiado is within a 5-minute walk away from boutique shops, theatres, museums, restaurants and bars. National Theatre D. Maria II is 8 minutes‚Äô walk away.

Guests can enjoy a day trip and enjoy the several historical sites that Lisbon has to offer, such as Igreja de S√£o Roque, the Church of S√£o Domingos and Castle of S√£o Jorge, within a 20-minute walk away.

Baixa-Chiado Subway Station is a 2-minute walk away. Lisbon Portela International Airport is a 16-minute drive away by car. An airport shuttle is available upon request.

Name: New Style Lisbon Hotel
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, New Style Lisbon Hotel is only 120 metres from the Anjos Metro Station which provides service to Cais do Sodr√©. It has a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and breakfast room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

All rooms are fitted with flat screen TV, cable channels, tea and coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a wardrobe and a work desk.

Guests can visit one of the traditional Portuguese restaurants in the area.

New Style Lisbon Hotel is located 1.4 km from the Hot Club of Portugal and less than a 20-minute walk from the Coliseu dos Recreios. The hotel can assist in car rentals.

Name: Portas De S√£o Bento Apartments
Description:
Featuring a patio with inner courtyard views, a garden and barbecue facilities, Portas De S√£o Bento Apartments can be found in Lisbon, close to Commerce Square and 1.5 km from Rossio. Among the facilities at this property are an ATM and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is set 2.5 km from St. George's Castle.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some fruits. The property has an outdoor dining area.

As an added convenience, the apartment offers packed lunches for guests to bring on excursions and other trips off-property.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km from Portas De S√£o Bento Apartments, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Sete Colinas
Description:
The charming Hotel Sete Colinas hotel is located in a historic building, just a few steps from the Anjo Metro Station. All rooms have air conditioning and there is free Wi-Fi.

Hotel Hotel Sete Colinas offers colourful rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. When weather is nice, breakfast is served on the small, outdoor terrace.

Hotel Sete Colinas is situated a 10-minute drive from Lisbon Airport. There is a 24-hour reception and an elevator.

Name: Legendary Lisboa Suites
Description:
Located in the heart of Lisbon, the stylish and contemporary Clarion Suites offers self-catering accommodation and an outdoor swimming pool. It is few-minutes' walk from Pra√ßa Marqu√™s de Pombal.

All of the spacious rooms and apartments at Clarion Suites Lisboa are decorated with designer furnishings and feature flat-screen TV‚Äôs with cable channels. Wi-Fi internet access is also available.

Guests can prepare their own meals in the fully-equipped kitchenettes, order room service or enjoy the daily breakfast buffet. Clarion Lobby Bar serves renowned Portuguese wines and local spirits until late in the evenings.

Rato Metro Station is 400 meters from the hotel and 4 stops away from the focal Baixa District. For convenience the hotel also offers a private parking garage.

Name: Casa Santa Marinha
Description:
Casa Santa Marinha is located in Lisbon, 500 metres from the iconic S√£o Jorge Castle. Rossio is 900 metres away, while the Lisbon Cathedral is within 700 metres. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and feature a seating area. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. A a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. All units also have a kitchen, fitted with a stovetop. There is a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries in each unit. Towels are featured.

Casa Santa Marinha also includes a sun terrace.

Chiado is 1.2 km from Casa Santa Marinha, while Liberty Avenue is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from Casa Santa Marinha.

Name: Casa C'Alma
Description:
Offering a shared lounge and garden view, Casa C'Alma is situated in Lisbon, 2.7 km from Commerce Square and 1.4 km from Rossio. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4 km from the bed and breakfast and Jeronimos Monastery is 6.4 km away.

There is a private bathroom with bidet in some units, along with bathrobes, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available each morning.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Palacio Ramalhete
Description:
Set in the stylish area of Janelas Verdes, this boutique hotel is housed in an 18th-century palace. It features rooms with authentic ceramic tiles and a heated pool overlooking the courtyard.

Each spacious room of Palacio Ramalhete is decorated with antique furniture, a flat-screen TV and beautiful wooden floors. Most rooms have a view of the Tagus River. Unique details include stucco ceilings, oak walls or a  fireplace with a copper roof.

A buffet breakfast is served in the spacious common room, or on the patio in warmer months. Ramalhete also has a well-stocked bar with drinks and snacks.

Guests can relax on a designer sun lounger on the poolside deck. The hotel features an outdoor lounge area to enjoy a drink at sunset.

Rua Das Janelas Verdes Bus Stop is less than 50 metres from Palacio Ramalhete. The National Museum of Ancient Art is less than 3 minutes‚Äô walk away.

Name: Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites
Description:
Featuring a terrace, Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites is situated in the historic centre of Lisbon, at 400 meters from S√£o Jorge Castle and 650 metres from Rossio. The Martim Moniz metro station is a short 3-minute walk from the property and Chiado is 1 km away.

All units at Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites are air-conditioned and feature free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV and a living area with a dining table. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in every unit and towels are offered.

Guests can prepare their meals in the equipped kitchenette, fitted with a stovetop, a microwave, a toaster, a kettle and refrigerator. A variety of restaurants, caf√©s and supermarkets can be found in the vicinity.

There is a stop of the famous Tram 28 and Escalator to the Castle within a 3-minute walk from the property. Alfama neighbourhood is 400 meters from S√£o Jorge Apartments and the lively Bairro Alto area is 1.6 km away. The Portas do Sol and the Santa Luzia belvederes are at an 8-minute and a 10-minute walk, respectively. The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 6 km away from Sao Jorge Apartments & Suites.

Name: Whome Beato HUB Residences - Perfect for Digital Nomads & Families
Description:
Situated within 3.9 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 3.9 km of Lisbon Oceanarium in Lisbon, Whome Beato HUB Residences - Perfect for Digital Nomads & Families features accommodation with seating area. The property is around 4.5 km from Commerce Square, 4.8 km from Gare do Oriente and 4.9 km from St. George's Castle. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV with streaming services. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Rossio is 5 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 5.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Metropolitan Living Lisbon - Laranjeiras
Description:
A recently renovated apartment located in Lisbon, Metropolitan Living Lisbon - Laranjeiras features a garden. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchenette facilities, which include a fridge, kettle and a stovetop.

Luz Football Stadium is 2 km from the apartment, while Rossio is 5.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Ey Lisbon GuestHouse
Description:
Offering modern private and shared rooms in central Lisbon, a 5-minute walk from Marqu√™s do Pombal Square and its Metro Station, the Ey Lisbon GuestHouse features free WiFi access.

All the cosy rooms are bright and have modern furnishings. Dorms feature individual reading light and storage space. All have access to shared bathrooms, which come with a hairdryer and showers. Two of the rooms feature balconies with Lisbon street views.

Guests may use the shared kitchen facilities to prepare meals. The shared lounge comes with a TV and comfortable sofas.

The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is within a 13-minute drive, while lively Bairro Alto's bars are at a 2 km distance from the Ey Lisbon GuestHouse. Avenida da Liberdade is within 5 minutes' walk and is filled with high-end fashion stores and boutiques. The city's historical downtown is a 20-minute walk and has various typical caf√©s and shops. Lisbon International Airport is less than 8 km from the Ey Lisbon.

Name: Hotel Lisboa Plaza - Lisbon Heritage Collection - Avenida
Description:
Just around the corner from Liberty Avenue, this 4-star family-run hotel offers unique features like a local-style lounge with plush seating. It also features a chic terrace with views of Lisbon.

All rooms at Hotel Lisboa Plaza blend the d√©cor of Portuguese houses with modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and DVD player.

Guests can borrow a book from Lisboa Plaza‚Äôs private library and read it beside the fireplace. For those who like to stay fit, there is a well-equipped fitness centre.

In the hands of the same Portuguese family, the Caf√© Plaza Bistro offers buffet breakfast until 12:00 and light meals and snacks all day. The bar serves a variety of drinks.

Hotel Lisboa Plaza is only a 2-minute walk from Avenida Metro Station and just 1 Metro stop from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and Eduardo VII Park. It is also a 5-minute walk to Gl√≥ria Funicular/Tram, that connects to Bairro Alto.

Name: Lx Boutique Hotel
Description:
Located in the heart of the triangle between Chiado, Baixa and Cais do Sodr√© districts, Lx Boutique Hotel offers themed rooms with unique views over Lisbon and Tejo River.

All Boutique Hotel elegant rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a mini-bar, and a private bathroom. There is an iPod docking station, LCD TV and free Wi-Fi in every room.

Guest can enjoy Confraria, a trendy sushi restaurant that also serves a variety of teas, beverages and wines all day. For a typical Portuguese food experience, there are several alternatives just outside the door. Lx Boutique Hotel is 5 minutes‚Äô walk from several restaurants, bars, caf√©s and shops.

Guests can benefit from the 24-hour front desk service Lx Boutique Hotel provides. It also offers laundry and car hire services. An airport transfer shuttle is available upon request.

Historical sites and museums such as Lisbon Cathedral, Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio, Igreja de S√£o Roque and the Chiado Museum are within a 10-minute walk. Lisbon‚Äôs Portela International Airport is within a 20-minute drive away or a 40-minute metro journey.

Name: Dear Lisbon - Palace Chiado Suites
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Dear Lisbon - Palace is situated in Lisbon, 200 metres from Chiado. It is is located in a historic, protected and renovated building from the 19th century, which has the reception on the ground floor and all nine suites on the first floor.

All of the elegantly-decorated suites include a flat-screen cable TV, as well as a mini bar and a safety deposit box. Some units have a seating area where you can relax. Guests can enjoy a view over Lisbon or over S√£o Jorge Castle. All suites are equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine (with some complimentary capsules) and an electric kettle. The private bathroom includes bathrobes and slippers.

Front desk is available from 08:00 to 17:00. Breakfast is served in each of the suites, at a specific hour that guests can choose on the previous day.

The guest house also offers bike hire and car hire. Rossio is 400 metres from Dear Lisbon - Palace, while Bairro Alto is a short 3-minute walk away. At a 15-minute walk are the historic Alfama area, as well as the area surrounding S√£o Jorge Castle. The S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara Belvedere is a 5-minute walk away. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Maxime Hotel Lisbon
Description:
Formerly known as a cabaret, the Maxime is now reborn as a hotel. The place where spies and dancers from last century dwelt, is now open to guests and Lisbon‚Äôs visitors retaining all its former glory.

Always in good care by the mysterious Lady Maxime, guests will enjoy carefully decorated rooms with a variety of themes ranging from the dressing room, the stage or the bondage. Each is air conditioned and comes with a Nespresso machine, a private bathroom with Castelbel amenities, a Marshall speaker and a flat-screen TV.

The bar kept its original counter and hosts a restaurant as well. Guests can enjoy a thematic menu next to the glorious stage, under the original ceiling of the cabaret and surrounded by replicas of the original chandeliers.

Every Friday and Saturday guests can enjoy the Maxime Restaurant & Bar cabaret shows.

Hotel Maxime is just 1-minute walk from the Liberdade Avenue and metro station. Rossio Square is 700 metres away and the Chiado shopping area is a 10-minute walk away. Lisbon Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real
Description:
Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is situated less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and features a lift. The property offers allergy-free units and is located 800 metres from Rossio.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Commerce Square is 1.5 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Principe Real, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Cheese & Wine Lapa
Description:
Featuring a garden and views of inner courtyard, Cheese & Wine Lapa is a recently renovated guest house situated in Lisbon, 4.1 km from Commerce Square. It is set 4.4 km from Jeronimos Monastery and features full-day security. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

At the guest house, every unit comes with a desk. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with pancakes, fruits and juice are available.

St. George's Castle is 4.6 km from the guest house, while Rossio is 5.1 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 11 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Lisbon Colours Bairro Alto Apartments
Description:
Lisbon Colours offers modern apartments in Lisbon‚Äôs lively Bairro Alto district. Each apartment has a well-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. The property recently added brand new apartments to its offer. Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartments include a living room with a flat-screen TV and a dining area. Some open onto a terrace or a balcony with garden or river views. Large windows, soft colours, and wooden floors are part of the bright d√©cor.

Several restaurants, caf√©s, and shops are within walking distance of Lisbon Colours. Alfaia Restaurant & Wine Bar offers typical Portuguese cuisine and wines and it is a few steps away.

Bairro Alto is famous for its nightlife, cultural events, alternative fashion shops, city viewpoints, bars, cafes and restaurants.

Rossio Train and Metro Station, with links to Sintra, Bel√©m, Estoril and Cascais is a 10-minute walk away. Lisbon International Airport can be reached in 10-15 minutes by car or metro.

Name: Hotel Britania Art Deco - Lisbon Heritage Collection - Avenida
Description:
Located on a quiet street alongside Avenida da Liberdade, this 4-star hotel is stylized in genuine art d√©co and offers warmly decorated rooms with cork floors and free WiFi. Its prime location places it at just 300 metres from Avenida Metro Station, which connects with Rossio and Chiado within a short metro ride.

The elegant guest rooms of Britania have an art d√©co style and include double glazing, flat-screen TVs and CD/DVD players. They have private bathrooms with bathrobes, slippers and Molton Brown toiletries. The traditional building dates back to 1940 and was fully renovated in 2011.

Hotel Britania offers 24-hour room service as well as a convenient breakfast buffet, which is served until 12:00. Guests may also enjoy breakfast in their room, upon previous request. The hotel bar reminds guests of colonial times with its many paintings of Portugal's overseas empires.

The Botanical Garden is within close proximity, at just a 7-minute walk. The Britania Hotel is situated  7 km from Lisbon Airport, which is reachable via metro. Bairro Alto is 1.5 km away and is one the city's liveliest areas, with various shops, bars and popular eateries. The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is within 2.3 km.

Name: Vincci Alfama
Description:
Situated in Lisbon and with Miradouro da Senhora do Monte reachable within less than 1 km, Vincci Alfama features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and 700 metres from St. George's Castle.

At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options.

There is a tour desk and car rentals are available, while the business centre has an ATM machine.

Popular points of interest near Vincci Alfama include Commerce Square, Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Typical Tailor Made Flat in Central Gra√ßa
Description:
Offering quiet street views, Typical Tailor Made Flat in Central Gra√ßa is an accommodation set in Lisbon, 1.4 km from Rossio and 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is located 1.7 km from Commerce Square, 1 km from St. George's Castle and 7 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 500 metres away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Gare do Oriente is 8.2 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Typical Tailor Made Flat in Central Gra√ßa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Altis Suites Apartamentos Tur√≠sticos
Description:
The 4-star Altis Suites Apartamentos Tur√≠sticos in Lisbon‚Äôs shopping district offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is set 200 metres from the trendy shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade.

The spacious, air-conditioned apartments have a large living room, flat-screen cable TV, fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with hairdryer. Some have a private balcony. All units are modernly-equipped and include free WiFi access.

Room service is available and the Altis Grand Hotel next door offers 2 dining outlets, including the 12th floor Grill D. Fernando serving Portuguese cuisine. 3 separate bar areas are also on offer, one of which overlooking central Lisbon. Various local restaurants and eateries are available at a short 5-minute walk.

Other facilities at the Altis Grand Hotel are a business centre and hairdresser. The Altis Suites Apartamentos Tur√≠sticos ApartHotel provides a ticket service.

Chiado and Rossio are accessible within a short metro drive and are 2 of the city's most renowned historical areas. Lively Bairro Alto is 3 km away and is Lisbon's most famed nightlife district. The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is 2.9 km from the Altis. The aparthotel is a 15-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport.

Name: Almaria - Da Corte Apartments | Chiado
Description:
Located on the site of an historic Lisbon building, Da Corte Apartments features luxurious accommodation, in a setting which blends antique decorative features and modern comforts. It is primely located, at a 6-minute walk from Chiado and a 5-minute walk from Cais do Sodr√©.

The building's reception area features a unique chandelier, while the various apartments each feature smaller, but also unique, decorative pieces. Each accommodation is named after a different member of Portugal's monarchy. All units have a dining area, kitchenette and a seating area with a TV. Each also features a private bathroom with free toiletries. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the kitchenette of their accommodation. Alternatively, Lisbon's historic centre is filled with a wide range of popular restaurants and eateries, many of which are within a 5 to 10-minute walk from the property.

Trendy Bairro Alto's shops, bars and caf√©s are a 12-minute walk away, while the historic Rossio is within a 9-minute walk from Almaria - Da Corte Apartments | Chiado. Avenida da Liberdade, with its high-end shops and boutiques, is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.8 km from the property.

Name: Boemio FLH Hotels
Description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Lisbon, Boemio FLH Hotels features buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.1 km from St. George's Castle, 1.2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 7.8 km from Luz Football Stadium. Jeronimos Monastery is 8.3 km from the hotel and Lisbon Oceanarium is 9 km away.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all rooms at Boemio FLH Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a seating area. All guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

With staff speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese, advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Cal√ßada do Combro
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.1 km from Rossio, 1.8 km from St. George's Castle and 1.2 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Cal√ßada do Combro features accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Commerce Square.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.3 km from Cal√ßada do Combro, while Jeronimos Monastery is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

Name: LeL Madalena GuestHouse
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 600 metres from St. George's Castle and 600 metres from Commerce Square, LeL Madalena GuestHouse offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 600 metres from Rossio and provides full-day security. Dona Maria II National Theatre is 700 metres away and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.3 km from the guest house.

At the guest house, each unit is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some units include a private entrance. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Jeronimos Monastery is 7.3 km from the guest house, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.7 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: BessaHotel Liberdade
Description:
BessaHotel Liberdade is centrally located in Lisbon‚Äôs prestigious Avenida da Liberdade, a few minutes‚Äô from Restauradores Square. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have balconies with views of the city.

Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre and therapeutic massages upon request. The wellness area at BessaHotel Liberdade is comprised of an indoor pool, a sauna, a Turkish bath and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities.

BessaHotel Liberdade is 500 metres from Rossio and 700 metres from the commercial area of Chiado. The Restauradores Metro Station is 300 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Boho Guesthouse - Rooms & Apartments
Description:
Boho Guesthouse - Rooms & Apartments is located in Lisbon, just 280 metres from Cais do Sodr√© Train and Metro Stations. The Tagus riverside is 300 metres away while Chiado is within 400 metres.

Featuring free WiFi, each room includes access to shared bathroom facilities. The rooms include a seating area.

Guests may cook their own meals in the communal kitchen at their disposal. Alternatively, the historical centre is within a 5-minute walk and has a variety of Portuguese and international eateries.

Bairro Alto is the city‚Äôs main bar area and is just 750 metres away. Historical Rossio is 1 km away, while S√£o Jorge Castle is 1.5 km from the guest house. Lisbon‚Äôs Portela Airport is 8 km from the Boho Guesthouse - Rooms & Apartments.

Name: Chiado Trindade Apartments | Lisbon Best Apartments
Description:
Located in the heart of Lisbon Chiado district, the Chiado Trindade Apartments | Lisbon Best Apartments are made of modern air-conditioned apartments located in a refurbished building. Free WiFi access is available.

Each unit has an individual d√©cor, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen cable TV. The marble bathroom includes free toiletries and a bath or a shower.

All units have a kitchenette opening to the seating area, and some have a terrace or balcony. The units combine modern style with vintage-style furniture.

The well-known A Brasileira Caf√© with Fernando Pessoa statue is down the street, and the lively Bairro Alto is less than 5 minutes‚Äô walking from the Chiado Trindade Apartments | Lisbon Best Apartments.

Rossio Train Station is 600 metres away, and Lisbon International Airport is around 8 km from CChiado Trindade Apartments | Lisbon Best Apartments.

Name: Cativos - Alfama Center District
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Commerce Square and St. George's Castle, Cativos - Alfama Center District offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and kettle. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation offers a patio. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. This apartment also comes with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can grab a bite to eat in the in-house family-friendly restaurant, which specialises in African cuisine and also offers vegetarian, vegan and dairy-free options.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Cativos - Alfama Center District include Rossio, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: My Story Hotel Rossio
Description:
Offering a restaurant, My Story Hotel Rossio is located in Lisbon. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and bed linen.

At My Story Hotel Rossio you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage.

The hotel is in Rossio, 400 metres from Chiado and 350 metres from Liberty Avenue. Lisbon Portela Airport is 6 km away. You can enjoy city view from some of the rooms.

Name: NEW Lisbon downtown Houses-4A
Description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, NEW Lisbon downtown Houses-4A is an accommodation situated right in the heart of Lisbon, just 800 metres from St. George's Castle and 500 metres from Rossio. The apartment, set in a building dating from 2017, is 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and less than 1 km from Commerce Square. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.7 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 8.4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: The Visionaire Apartments
Description:
Set in Lisbon's historical downtown, The Visionaire Apartments features apartments, studios and suites right across from the iconic Figueira Square. Rossio is 130 metres away, while Commerce Square and the Tagus riverside are at a 10-minute walk.

All of the property's units come with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. The studios, apartments and suites include a kitchen or kitchenette and a dining area, with plenty of natural light. The units can have views over either Lisbon's streets, Figueira Square or even The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle, for some of the suites.

The equipped kitchens or kitchenettes all come fully equipped and allow guests to cook their own meals comfortably. The surrounding area is filled with a range of popular eateries, including renowned restaurants, emblematic caf√©s and classic pastry shops.

The high-end shops and boutiques of Avenida da Liberdade are at a short 5-minute walk away. Popular Chiado is within a 6-minute walk. At 1 km is Bairro Alto, one of the city's most renowned nightlife hotspots. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7.6 km from the accommodation.

Name: Duplo Charme Boutique Hotel
Description:
Set in Lisbon and with Miradouro da Senhora do Monte reachable within 1.3 km, Duplo Charme Boutique Hotel offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 1.9 km from Rossio.

A buffet, continental or halal breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.9 km from the hotel, while Commerce Square is 2.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Casa da Mariquinhas
Description:
In the Arroios district of Lisbon, close to Dona Maria II National Theatre, Casa da Mariquinhas features free WiFi and a washing machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. The property is 1.1 km from Rossio, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The spacious apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with quiet street views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Patria Hotel
Description:
Located at the central Saldanha Square, P√°tria Hotel offers rooms with air conditioning, just a 1-minute walk from the Saldanha Metro station. Lisbon's historic centre is a 10-minute metro ride away, featuring emblematic areas like Chiado, Rossio and Bairro Alto.

The hotel offers free WiFi throughout. All rooms have a clean d√©cor and are fitted with USB outlets, electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with multilingual cable channels. Featuring a private bathroom, all include a hair dryer and a safety deposit box.

Each morning guests can enjoy a continental breakfast buffet, made with local products, which is served in the breakfast room. There is also an outdoor esplanade, where guests are welcome to relax. Guests can also explore the surrounding area and discover the various restaurants in the surroundings.

The front desk is open 24/7 and can help with various queries.

P√°tria Hotel is situated a 15 minutes' walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and the Eduardo VII Park. Next to the park is the start of Avenida da Liberdade, famed for its high-end shops and boutiques. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away and is reachable via metro.

Name: LR Guest House
Description:
LR Guest House features accommodation situated 1.4 km from the centre of Lisbon and offers a bar and a shared lounge. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.1 km from Commerce Square. The guest house has family rooms.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms come with a terrace. At the guest house, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and fresh pastries are available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Eurostars Das Letras
Description:
Situated in historic Lisbon, Eurostars Das Letras offers designer rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi access. The Botanic Gardens of Lisbon are 1 km away.

Ample and offering marble and timber furnishings, each themed room has a pillow menu and luxury bathroom amenities. Although Eurostars Das Letras is centrally located, rooms are quiet and some offer panoramic views of S√£o Jorge castle.

Guests can also enjoy outdoor dining on its spacious terrace. Facilities at Das Letras Eurostars include a well-equipped fitness centre and a sauna.

The boutique hotel is less than 500 metres away from the statues of Avenida da Liberdade and less than a 5-minute walk to the Avenida Metro Station.

Bookings of 5 or more rooms and bookings of more than 6 days may be subject to special cancellation and payment conditions.

Name: FLH Principe Real Luxus Apartments
Description:
FLH Principe Real Luxus Apartments provides accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.3 km from Rossio. The apartment features family rooms.

At the apartment complex, every unit has a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.4 km from the apartment, while Commerce Square is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from FLH Principe Real Luxus Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Residencial Horizonte
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, opposite the Parque Metro station, the Residencial Horizonte Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. St. George's Castle is 3.4 km away.

The rooms at Residencial Horizonte are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. All rooms have a safety deposit box, a hairdryer, and a modern en suite bathroom.

Every morning, guests can enjoy a local and international buffet breakfast in Residencial Horizonte Hotel‚Äôs breakfast room. The bar offers refreshing drinks and light snacks.

Guests can benefit from Hotel Residencial Horizonte‚Äôs 24-hour reception. The hotel also offers laundry facilities and concierge and porter services.

The Horizonte Hotel is a short walk from Eduardo VII gardens and close to the central shopping districts of Lisbon. The Parque Metro station opposite the hotel provides access to the Benfica Stadium, the zoo, and Santa Apolonia.

Name: My Story Hotel Ouro
Description:
With a themed d√©cor based on Portuguese tiles, the charming My Story Hotel Ouro occupies an 18th century building in the heart of the historic Baixa district of Lisbon. Its outdoor esplanade is on one of Lisbon's traditional pedestrian streets.

Featuring a golden headboard, all air-conditioned rooms have a private bathroom, a Smart TV, safe and free WiFi. They also have a minibar. Communicating rooms are available upon availability. Each room has an elegant d√©cor and some feature views over the surrounding streets.

Featuring tasty dishes and a comprehensive cocktail list, the bar and restaurant at My Story Hotel Ouro is a great spot to enjoy traditional Portuguese cuisine or savour a drink. The central location of the hotel allows guests to easily explore the capital city. The reception is open 24-hours a day.

Tejo River is around 400 metres and offers the ideal setting to enjoy a drink while watching the sunset, in of Commerce Square's summer terraces. Santa Justa Lift is less than 5-minutes walking from the hotel.

Baixa/Chiado Metro Station is a few steps from My Story Hotel Ouro, providing access to most of the greater Lisbon area. The historic fa√ßade of the Rossio Train Station is within 5 minutes‚Äô walking. Lisbon International Airport is 7.6 km away and is accessible via metro.

Name: Lisbon Unique Apartments
Description:
Lisbon Unique Apartments offers 6 elegant apartments 300 meters from the Santa Apol√≥nia Transport Hub. All provide free WiFi.

Featuring a sophisticated decoration, wooden floors and in 3 of them balcony overlooking a garden or the National Pantheon, these apartments include 2 or 1 bedrooms each, a twin and a double. All the apartments have a private bathroom and a spacious living room with a flat-screen TV.

Guests staying at the Lisbon Unique Apartments can prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen available. There is a dining area available in 2 of them. In addition guests can visit the restaurants within 500 metres, in the Alfama neighbourhood and enjoy a fine wine plus a traditional Portuguese dish while listening to some Fado songs.

The shopping areas of Chiado and Rua Augusta are 2 km away and the scenic S√£o Jorge Castle is 1 km away. The lively Bairro Alto is 3 km away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km away.

Name: NH Lisboa Campo Grande
Description:
This hotel features a sauna, just across the street from Entrecampos Metro Station. It serves a breakfast buffet which includes fresh juice, preserves and gourmet coffee.

All rooms at NH Lisboa Campo Grande are fitted with large windows and offer a pillow menu. Each one has a well-stocked minibar, cable TV, free Wi-Fi and a comfortable armchair in the seating area.

Guests can relax with a local newspaper and free Wi-Fi in the lobby, or enjoy the hiking and walking trails in the surroundings. There is a gym to exercise.

Located near Campo Grande Park, NH Lisboa Campo Grande is 5 minutes‚Äô drive from Lisbon Airport. Marqu√™s de Pombal Square is less than 10 minutes‚Äô drive away.

Name: Hola Lisbon Suites
Description:
Set in Lisbon centre, 800 metres from Rossio and 800 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Hola Lisbon Suites offers accommodation with free WiFi and a terrace. The property features inner courtyard and quiet street views, and is 1.6 km from Commerce Square. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, luggage storage space and organising tours for guests.

At the guest house, units are fitted with a wardrobe. Some units are air conditioned and include a dressing room. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the guest house.

St. George's Castle is 1.9 km from the guest house, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Hola Lisbon Suites.

Name: Real Apartment by SublimeHouses
Description:
Right in the heart of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Real Apartment by SublimeHouses offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is soundproof and is located 1.9 km from Commerce Square.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and quiet street views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like hiking.

St. George's Castle is 2.9 km from Real Apartment by SublimeHouses, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Rossio Boutique Hotel
Description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Lisbon, Rossio Boutique Hotel is within 200 metres of Rossio and 100 metres of Dona Maria II National Theatre. This 4-star hotel offers an ATM and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Popular points of interest near Rossio Boutique Hotel include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Olissippo Castelo
Description:
This 4-star hotel features panoramic views of Lisbon alongside the walls of St Jorge Castle and near Martim Moniz Square. Rossio Metro Station is 600 metres away.

Olissippo Castelo provides air-conditioned rooms that feature views from private terraces. All rooms include a fully-equipped bathroom with amenities, a work desk, a bathrobe and satellite TV.

Before heading out to discover the city, guests of the Castelo can enjoy a rich breakfast in the dining room. The attentive staff can offer advice on what to see and do in the area.

Olissippo is located in the famous Bairro do Castelo, between the well-known Mouraria and Alfama quarters. It is also well situated to discover the Patron Festivities that take place every June.

Name: Geronimo Guest House Bel√©m
Description:
Featuring city views, Geronimo Guest House Bel√©m provides accommodation with an open-air bath, massage services and a garden, around 400 metres from Jeronimos Monastery. There is a private entrance at the guest house for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers a hot tub, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with river or garden views. At the guest house, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Yoga classes and fitness classes are provided at the fitness room on site. The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Commerce Square is 7.7 km from the guest house, while Rossio is 8.2 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Luxury T.M. Penthouse With a View
Description:
Right in the heart of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Commerce Square and Rossio, Luxury T.M. Penthouse With a View offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property features river and city views, and is 1.5 km from St. George's Castle. The accommodation features a lift and private check-in and check-out for guests.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 3 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.1 km from the apartment, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 10 km from Luxury T.M. Penthouse With a View, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Columbano Boutique Suites
Description:
Set in Lisbon, Columbano Boutique Suites is a recently renovated accommodation, 3.8 km from Luz Football Stadium and 4 km from Rossio. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation offers a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dishwasher, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. The units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 4.1 km from the guest house, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4.4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Portugal Boutique Hotel
Description:
Offering paid private parking (subject to availability), the 4-star Hotel Portugal features a 24-hour reception and a central location in Lisbon, 200 metres from Rossio Square. It has a bar on site and 24-hour room service.

With a large mirror with a built-in interactive TV, each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is carefully decorated and includes a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers. Free WiFi is available. Extra beds are available upon request, in the Deluxe rooms.

Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast  in the breakfast room or enjoy their breakfast in the privacy of their room, upon request. Varanda Lisboa Restaurant is located next door and features a shared passage way. It serves traditional Portuguese meals, with a panoramic city view. The newly-opened Adega Premium Winehouse Bar & Shop has an extensive wine list, as well as a d√©cor inspired by traditional wine cellars. the Adega is ideal for lovers of tasty cheeses, local chorizos and Portuguese snacks.

Lively Bairro Alto's many bars and eateries are within a 10-minute walk. Chiado is an iconic Lisbon area, filled with shops and caf√©s, at a10-minute walking distance. The popular 28 tram stops behind the hotel, offering guests the opportunity of exploring the city‚Äôs landmarks. Popular Rossio Square is 200 metres away, while Rossio Train Station is 400 metres. Lisbon's Portela International Airport is 6.5 km from Portugal Boutique Hotel.

Name: P√°teo Saudade Lofts
Description:
P√°teo Saudade Lofts offers accommodation within 1.7 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is set 400 metres from Commerce Square and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from P√°teo Saudade Lofts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: York House Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Housed in a converted Carmelite Convent, this hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Lisbon's city centre. It combines chic, contemporary furnishings with traditional, 17th-century architecture. Please note hotel is an historical building where rooms and other facilities have access only by stairs and does not feature a lift.

York House offers air-conditioned guest rooms with elegant fittings and free Wi-Fi.

When weather is nice, the picturesque garden is also available for a refreshing drink.

York House provides an airport shuttle and a car-rental service at an extra charge. The reception is available 24 hours, and the popular shopping area of Amoreiras is 2 km from the hotel.

Name: The House on the Pink Street in Lisbon
Description:
Offering river views, The House on the Pink Street in Lisbon is an accommodation located in Lisbon, 1 km from Rossio and 1.5 km from St. George's Castle. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Commerce Square.

At the aparthotel, all units have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, bathrobes and a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

The area is popular for walking tours, and bike hire and car hire are available at the aparthotel.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.2 km from The House on the Pink Street in Lisbon, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 11 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: C&O Guest House Lisbon
Description:
Offering city views, C&O Guest House Lisbon is set in the Alc√¢ntara district of Lisbon, 3 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 5.2 km from Commerce Square. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

At the bed and breakfast, all units are allergy-free. The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and with cable channels.

Rossio is 5.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 11 km from C&O Guest House Lisbon.

Name: Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel
Description:
Located 80 metres from Avenida da Liberdade, the 4-star Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is 300 meters from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square. This certified eco-hotel has a prime location in Lisbon and features Spa & Wellness area, as well as a gluten-free menu in its Mediterranean-style restaurant.

The luxurious rooms of the Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel are decorated according to the principles of Feng Shui. Flat-screen TVs, free WiFi and Nespresso machines are standard in all of the stylish guest rooms.

A temple-like atmosphere can be enjoyed at the spa, which includes wet and dry saunas, a soothing hot tub and 6 treatment rooms. For an intense workout, the Hotel also features a gym.
