Organic, locally sourced ingredients are blended in the Mediterranean dishes of its stylish restaurant. Vegan, vegetarian and lactose-free dishes are included in its extensive menu. The Mediterranean Brasserie offers a range of activities, including show-cooking, workshops and wine tasting. A cosy fireplace, retro d√©cor and a comprehensive cocktail menu are available at the Urban Bar.

The Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Eduardo VII Park and a 15-minutes' walk from historic Rossio. Chiado is 2 km away and features a multitude of traditional shops and typical caf√©s. The lively bars and eateries of Bairro Alto are within a 20-minute walk. The Hotel is 9.3 km from Lisbon International Airport, which is accessible via metro.

Name: Santana Apartment by Sublime Houses
Description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Santana Apartment by Sublime Houses is an accommodation set in the heart of Lisbon, just 400 metres from Rossio and 300 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property has quiet street views and is 1.2 km from St. George's Castle and 1.2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Commerce Square.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with river views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.9 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Santana Apartment by Sublime Houses.

Name: √Åurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company
Description:
√Åurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company is a unique 5-star property situated on the banks of the Tagus River, in a historic building in Lisbon's iconic Alfama quarter. The hotel features a permanent archaeological exhibition, as well as modern facilities, like an indoor pool, restaurant, massage room and Turkish bath.

The d√©cor features references to the cultural legacy of the hotel's building. The air-conditioned rooms all come with a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and a work desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A daily breakfast buffet is available at the property. The in house restaurant features a variety of traditional Portuguese and International dishes. Guests can also find a wide range of restaurants and eateries within a short 5-minute walk. Alfama is famed for its Fado Houses, which pair traditional Fado concerts with tasty Portuguese tapas.

A fitness centre is also featured at the property, along with a 24-hour front desk and various meeting rooms.

The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is a 15-minute uphill walk. Commerce Square is just 500 metres away, while Rossio is a 16-minute walk from √Åurea Museum by Eurostars Hotel Company. Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 8.4 km from the property.

Name: The Lisbonaire Apartments
Description:
Located in a quiet street in the heart of downtown Lisbon, a short stroll from Chiado, Bairro Alto and the Castle, it‚Äôs the ideal starting point to visit Lisbon, near the most important monuments and sights, with numerous shops, restaurants, bars and transportation.

The distinctive 1960s building was fully rebuilt, and each apartment has artwork by Portuguese designers, inspired by the visual and typographic heritage of downtown Lisbon, making the apartments unique and special.

The Lisbonaire boasts 19 studios and one bedroom apartments, with fully equipped kitchens, furnished and decorated, subject to the idea of 100% Portuguese.

Every apartment has all the must-have utilities and also high speed Wi-Fi, cable TV, Google Home assistants and USB outlets.

EQUIPMENT: Fully equipped kitchen | Full size fridge and freezer | Microwave | Oven | Cooker | Dishwasher | Washing machine | Dryer (in common area) | Toaster | Kettle | Iron and ironing board | Hair dryer | Full length mirror | Safe

COMFORT: Air conditioning | King size beds (180x200cm) or twin beds | Cotton sheets and towels | Orthopedic matresses | Room toiletries | Detergents | Basic consumables

Additionally, our guests can also use the rooftop terrace, gym, and lounge room with library, pool table and kids zone.

ACCESS: Guests have 24-hour access to The Lisbonaire Apartments with a "no key" system with their own access code.

TRANSPORTATION: The Restauradores Subway Station is at 200 meters (Blue line). The Rossio Train Station is 250 meters away. Portela Airport is 8 km from the property.

CHECK IN - CHECK OUT: Check in is at 3PM and check out at 12PM (midday). For early check ins or late check outs, the guests have easy access to a storage room.

SERVICES: Parking (extra cost) | Pet Pack (extra cost) | Baby Bundle | Frontdesk 8AM - 0AM | Daily housekeeping | Extra Bed (in some apartments with extra cost) | Breakfast Delivery (arranged in advance with our partner and with extra cost)

GROUP POLICY: Any reservation of 2 or more apartments will be considered a group with different terms and conditions. Groups reservations can only be made or approved through our reservations team, and The Lisbonaire Apartments reserves the right to cancel it otherwise. The property is not appropriate to accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Name: Downtown Lisbon Palma Suites by Homing
Description:
Set in the centre of Lisbon, 700 metres from Rossio and 600 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Downtown Lisbon Palma Suites by Homing offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is located 7.1 km from Luz Football Stadium, 8 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 8.3 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. Gare do Oriente is 8.6 km from the guest house and Pena National Palace is 31 km away.

The units are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, while selected rooms here will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Pombalino Design Apartment em BaixaChiado
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, Pombalino Design Apartment em BaixaChiado features city views and free WiFi, less than 1 km from St. George's Castle and a 6-minute walk from Rossio. The property is around 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6.7 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is 1.8 km from the city centre and 300 metres from Commerce Square.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.6 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.2 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Description:
Located less than 60 metres from Duque de Saldanha Square, the 4-star Olissippo Saldanha offers a 24-hour reception and bright, modern rooms. Saldanha Metro Station is a 4-minute walk.

Rooms at Olissippo are air-conditioned and include a flat-screen cable TV. All rooms have elevator access and feature a private bathroom, and some have a seating area with a plush sofa.

A breakfast buffet is served daily, including hot and cold items, and can also be served in the guests‚Äô rooms. A bar is available for guests wishing to relax with a drink and a chat. The restaurants next door serve international cuisine.

To explore further Lisbon and its surroundings there is a car rental service available, as well as currency exchange services. The business centre and meeting facilities on site cover guests‚Äô business needs.

Lisbon International Airport is 5.5 km from Olissippo Saldanha and is easily reached by public transports. The lively Bairro Alto district is 3.5 km, and the business and shopping district of Parque das Na√ß√µes is 8 km away.

Name: BairroSweethome
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, 800 metres from Rossio, the historic BairroSweethome provides accommodation with free WiFi and a terrace. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The apartment features family rooms.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, Dona Maria II National Theatre and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from BairroSweethome, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Sunny Green Terrace
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Rossio, Sunny Green Terrace offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. Guests can benefit from a patio and a picnic area. The apartment features facilities for disabled guests.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.4 km from the apartment, while Commerce Square is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from Sunny Green Terrace.

Name: Ferraria XVI FLH Hotels Lisboa
Description:
Attractively situated in Lisbon, Ferraria XVI FLH Hotels Lisboa features a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 600 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 1.6 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6.9 km from Jeronimos Monastery. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Ferraria XVI FLH Hotels Lisboa include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Rossio. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Casa Portuguesa Madalena
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, Casa Portuguesa Madalena provides accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. This apartment features accommodation with a patio. Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.2 km away and St. George's Castle is 600 metres from the apartment.

The apartment with a balcony and city views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Altis Prime Hotel
Description:
This modern 4-star Lisbon aparthotel is less than 10 minutes' walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal and Avenida da Liberdade. It offers self-catering suites and features a rooftop terrace with a large hot tub and panoramic city views.

Suites at the Altis Prime Hotel have parquet floors and luxury bedding. They include stylish furnishings and come equipped with cable LCD TV and a kitchenette with a toaster and Nespresso coffee machine.

Altis Prime's Lounge Caff√© is open every day and is the ideal spot for breakfast or a drink at any time.

The Altis Prime offers a 24-hour front desk service.

The Altis Prime Hotel is located just 400 metres from Marques de Pombal Station. Nearby, Avenida da Liberdade is famed for its high-end shops and boutiques. Rossio Square is just 3 metro stops away and is one of the city's most historic areas.  It is 3 km from the Castle of S√£o Jorge and 1.3 km from the lively bars of Bairro Alto. Lisbon International Airport is 7.8 km from the hotel.

Name: Cool Tailor Made 2 Bedroom Apartment
Description:
Offering city views, Cool Tailor Made 2 Bedroom Apartment is an accommodation located in Lisbon, 1.8 km from Rossio and 1.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The property is around 3.3 km from St. George's Castle, 4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6.2 km from Jeronimos Monastery. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Commerce Square is 2.7 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Luz Football Stadium is 6.6 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 10 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: Central Avenida Liberdade 3
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Central Avenida Liberdade 3 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property features quiet street views and is 1.6 km from Commerce Square and 1.3 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. There is private parking and the property features an electric vehicle charging station.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some fruits and chocolates or cookies. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 6.3 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Lisbon Domus 74 by amcf
Description:
Situated within 1.6 km of Dona Maria II National Theatre and 1.9 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte in Lisbon, Lisbon Domus 74 by amcf offers accommodation with seating area. This apartment features free private parking and a lift. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 1.7 km from Rossio.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dishwasher, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with free toiletries, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Commerce Square is 2.6 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Lisbon Domus 74 by amcf.

Name: With You Suites
Description:
In the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, close to Dona Maria II National Theatre, With You Suites features a terrace and a washing machine. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 4-minute walk from Rossio.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near With You Suites include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Vistas de Lisboa Hostel
Description:
With free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception, modern Vistas de Lisboa Hostel offers a comfortable accommodation. In central Lisbon, it is 5 minutes‚Äô walk from Figueira Square and Rossio Metro Station.

Most of the bright dormitories and rooms have a small balcony with views of Lisbon. Lockers are available for each guest, and bathrooms are shared.

There is a supermarket and lots of restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk.

The walk up the hill to S√£o Jorge Castle takes around 20 minutes and it can also be accessed by a tram that stops a 5-minute walk from Hostel Vistas de Lisboa. Within 2 minutes‚Äô walk there are bus stops, and a tram to Bel√©m, home to a tower surrounded by the Tagus River.

Located 200 metres away is Santa Justa Lift and 100 metres further are the ruins of the Carmo Convent. Rossio Train Station is 500 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Estrela
Description:
Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Estrela is set in the Estrela district of Lisbon, 3.6 km from Rossio, 3.7 km from St. George's Castle and 3.7 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. It is located 3.2 km from Commerce Square and offers a lift. The apartment also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 4.8 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Lisbon Serviced Apartments - Estrela.

Name: Corinthia Lisbon
Description:
The 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon is 150 metres from the Lisbon Zoo Metro Station and a 5-minute metro ride from trendy Avenida da Liberdade. A recent recipient of environmental awards, it features 2 restaurants and the largest spa area in Lisbon.

All of the stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon have been tastefully decorated and fitted with cable TVs, as well as free WiFi. Each has a private bathroom with free luxury toiletries.

The hotel's Soul Garden - Outdoor Restaurant and Cocktail Bar has a colourful and tranquil ambiance, serving light meals, snacks, refreshing drinks and cocktails. The hotel's main restaurant, is the Erva Restaurant and Bar, which was recently fully renovated. The restaurant is inspired by Lisbon and Portuguese gastronomy, has a relaxed atmosphere and even includes a grill bar area, for live cooking.

Guests can relax at the hotel‚Äôs large, 3000 m2 luxury spa. It offers massage therapies and beauty treatments, such as mesotherapy and facial treatments as well as an aqua circuit with swimming pools, hot tubs and a fully equipped gym.

The ample Sky Lounge is located on the 24th floor and features a 360¬∫ view over the city. Here, guests may enjoy using the business centre with free WiFi, reading daily newspapers or magazines, tasting complimentary canap√©s, as well as soft drinks, coffee and tea throughout the day.

The unit is a 15-minute Metro ride from the city‚Äôs historical downtown, featuring popular Chiado and Rossio. Lively Bairro Alto‚Äôs bars are also at a 15-minute Metro ride. The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is within 7.5 km. Lisbon‚Äôs premier shopping area, Amoreiras is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is a 9-minute drive from Corinthia Hotel Lisbon.

Name: Imperador Hotel
Description:
Imperador Hotel is located 2 minutes‚Äô walk from Pra√ßa Duque de Saldanha Square with access to Lisbon‚Äôs metro. It offers a room service and free WiFi in its business centre.

All rooms at the Imperador Hotel are air conditioned and fitted with a private bathroom with bathtub and bidet. Each room also comes with cable TV and a minibar with refreshing beverages.

Imperador Hotel can arrange car rentals for guests at its 24-hour front desk. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also provided.

Lisbon Zoo is a 10-minute drive from Imperador Hotel and Parque Eduardo VII city park is a 20-minute walk away. Lisbon centre, Rossio, can be reached with 6 metro stops.

Name: Succeed Campo Pequeno Apartments
Description:
Succeed Campo Pequeno Apartments provides accommodation within 2 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. This recently renovated apartment is located 3.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 4 km from Rossio. The apartment features family rooms.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet and a wardrobe. All units have a private bathroom and a shower, and certain units at the apartment complex have a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 4.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse
Description:
Located in the Santa Maria Maior district of Lisbon, Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse is 30 meters from Santa Justa Lift, 200 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 200 metres from Rossio.
Built in 18th century, the property is within 400 metres of Chiado and 1.1 km of Bairro Alto. The property is 1.3 km from Liberty Avenue and 2.4 km from Amoreiras.

From the balconies in the living room and in some units is possible to see the Castle and Carmo Ruins.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a shared bathroom with free toiletries, while selected rooms include a balcony.

Jeronimos Monastery is 6 km from Santa Justa Prime Guesthouse, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Alojamento Local Private Accommodation
Description:
Situated 250 metres from the Intendente Metro Station, this Alojamento is set on a private building and features 3 single rooms with balconies, 11 double bed bedrooms, and 6 triple rooms, one with 3 single beds and five with one double bed and a single bed.

All rooms at Alojamento Local Private Accommodation have wooden floors, furnishings, and a work desk. The rooms have a shared bathroom that is located in the hallway.

Guests can use Alojamento Local Private Accommodation‚Äôs shared kitchen to prepare their own meals. The kitchen comes equipped with an electric kettle, microwave, and refrigerator; stove cooking is not allowed.

The reception time starts at 2:00 p.m. and ends at 22:30 p.m. Reception staff provide guests with free city maps and guides.

Public parking is available on the street near the property, which is paid for from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. and free during the night and weekends, and the lively Avenida da Liberdade is a 15-minute walk away. Lisbon‚Äôs Portela Airport is 10 kilometres away from the property.

Name: Hotel A.S. Lisboa
Description:
This hotel is situated next to Parque da Fonte Luminosa, 50 metres from Alameda Metro Station. The warmly decorated rooms include satellite TV, and some offer Tagus River views.

The extensive buffet breakfast is served from 07:00 to 10:30 and includes several rolls and pastries, along with cold cuts, cheeses and fresh fruit. Guests of Hotel A.S. Lisboa are greeted with a welcome tea, and a bar is available to enjoy an after-dinner drink.

Each room at A.S. Lisboa includes a minibar, a safety deposit box and a modern bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer. Rooms on higher floors offer panoramic views over Lisbon.

A.S. Lisboa Hotel is 3 km away from St. George's Castle and a 6-stop ride on the metro to both the Baixa and the Park of Nations. Lisbon Portela Airport is less than 5 km away.

Name: Zuni Guest House
Description:
Well located in the Penha de Franca district of Lisbon, Zuni Guest House is set 3.6 km from Rossio, 3.7 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 4.5 km from St. George's Castle. It is located 1.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and provides a shared kitchen. Commerce Square is 4.5 km away and Lisbon Oceanarium is 6.4 km from the guest house.

With a shared bathroom, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms come with a balcony. At the guest house, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Gare do Oriente is 6.7 km from the guest house, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.3 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km from the property.

Name: Vila Queir√≥s, 6
Description:
Ideally located in the Arroios district of Lisbon, Vila Queir√≥s, 6 is located 1.5 km from Rossio, 1.5 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.3 km from Commerce Square. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property offers allergy-free units and is set 800 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.2 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Eighteen21 Houses - Casa de S√£o Paulo
Description:
Right in the centre of Lisbon, set within a short distance of Commerce Square and Rossio, Eighteen21 Houses - Casa de S√£o Paulo offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is situated 1.3 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and offers a lift. The property is soundproof and is located 1.9 km from St. George's Castle.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and river views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 10 km from Eighteen21 Houses - Casa de S√£o Paulo.

Name: Mama Shelter Lisboa
Description:
Attractively set in Lisbon, Mama Shelter Lisboa features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The property is allergy-free and is situated 1.6 km from Rossio.

The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the hotel rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

Guests at Mama Shelter Lisboa can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak German, English, French and Portuguese.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Commerce Square is 2.5 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Dear Lisbon - Gallery House
Description:
Located at 200 metres from Bairro Alto, Dear Lisbon - Gallery House is located in Lisbon, at 700 metres from Estrela Garden. The property is just 150 metres from the Portuguese Parliament and a 10-minute walk from both Santos Train Station and the riverside.

Featuring free WiFi access throughout the property, this bed and breakfast features rooms equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while certain rooms include city views. All units at Dear Lisbon - Gallery House have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The surrounding area provides a variety of alternatives for guests to taste the rich Portuguese cuisine. Many caf√©s and eateries are within a short 5-minute walk.

Speaking English, French and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. The scenic S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara Belvedere is at 1 km.

At 1.2 km is trendy Cais do Sodr√©, one of the city's most hip nightlife areas. Liberty Avenue is at a 20-minute walk and is filled with high-end shops and boutiques. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the bed and breakfast.

Name: Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade
Description:
Located on Lisbon‚Äôs main avenue, Avenida da Liberdade, this luxurious hotel is right in front of the Avenida Metro stop. It has a modern gym, a restaurant and a library. Some of the rooms have balconies and views to the posh avenue.

The rooms and junior suites at the 5-star Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade have modern d√©cor and include an LCD TV, a minibar and fresh flowers. Each bathroom has luxurious amenities and a shower.

The Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade serves a rich breakfast in the mornings. Add our Matiz restaurant and bar, where heritage meets modernity, and guests can enjoy a contemporary take on an authentic Portuguese.

The Sofitel Lisbon also offers a multilingual staff, as well as babysitting services and laundry services.

Rossio and Chiado, two of the historical downtown's most famous areas are both at a short 5-minute drive or 10-minute walking distance. The hotel is just 1 km from Sao Roque Church and 2.5 km from Sao Jorge Castle.

Name: Vincci Baixa
Description:
Located in Baixa‚Äôs centre, this 4-star hotel is 150 metres from Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio‚Äôs bus, tram and metro links. It has an elegant restaurant and a bar. The hotel's comfortable bedrooms were fully renovated in April of 2017.

The stylish rooms at the Vincci Baixa include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also have a minibar, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with amenities. Free WiFi is available.

The Com√©rcio 36 Restaurant serves a rich breakfast prepared with seasonal ingredients, including meals for celiacs. The lounge bar serves refreshing drinks and light snacks. Room service is also available.

Convenient facilities at the Vincci include laundry services and a tour desk where guests can arrange to visit local attractions.

The Baixa is surrounded by trendy bars, shops and restaurants. It is just a 5-minute walk from the historic S√© Catedral. Portela Airport is 7 km away.

Name: CASA AMORA Studio Apartments
Description:
Situated in Travessa das Amoreiras in Lisbon, right next to Amoreiras Garden, Casa Amora Studios Self-Catering Apartments is a typical building of Lisbon‚Äôs early 20th century.

Casa Amora Studios offers 4 Self-Catering Apartments, all with air-conditioned and free Wi-Fi. Each Studio pays homage to one of the great figures of Portuguese art.

Guests can start their day exploring the surrounding area, where‚Äôs also many restaurants and bars.

CASA AMORA Studio Apartments is located in one of the nicest and central districts of Lisbon, Pra√ßa das Amoreiras.

In this neighborhood, where the 18th century Aqueduct (that survived the great Lisbon earthquake of 1755) reaches and end, Casa Amora is neighbour to Water Museum (Museu da Mae de Agua) and the Vieira da Silva / Arpad Szenes museum.

Residents and visitors have easy and direct access to the neighborhoods of antique shops (Rua de Sao Bento and Rua da Escola Politecnica), historic districts (Bairro Alto and Chiado), Avenida da Liberdade and its fashion shops as well as the shopping center Amoreiras, all at walking distance.

Name: Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show
Description:
Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

Every day, a videomapping show is performed in the interior garden of the hotel. Guests can enjoy this immersive experience of light and colour.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show every room includes bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Rossio. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show.

Name: Belem Aloja
Description:
Located in Lisbon, 6.3 km from Commerce Square and 6.8 km from Rossio, Belem Aloja offers air conditioning. The property has river and garden views, and is 6.9 km from St. George's Castle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Jeronimos Monastery is 1.7 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like cycling.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 6.9 km from Belem Aloja, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 8 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Do Bairro Suites at Bairro Alto is a recently renovated building at the heart of Bairro Alto. Chiado is 300 metres from the property.

All apartments feature a seating and dining area. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. All include a kitchenette, with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower in each unit. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchenette. The surrounding area features plenty of popular restaurants and eateries.

Rossio is a 7-minute walk from the property. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Description:
Offering city views, Baixa Cozy 2BR with AC - by LU Holidays is an accommodation located in Lisbon, less than 1 km from Rossio and a 9-minute walk from St. George's Castle. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 300 metres from Commerce Square, and within 1.8 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is less than 1 km from the apartment, while Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is a 19-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from Baixa Cozy 2BR with AC - by LU Holidays, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: The ART INN Lisbon
Description:
The modern and elegant d√©cor of The ART INN Lisbon is complemented by its prime location in the Rossio, one of Lisbon‚Äôs most historical areas and is full of shops, boutiques and typical caf√©s. The Rossio Metro Station connects with most of the Lisbon area and is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a private bathroom, desk, safe, free WiFi, Nespresso machine, tea-and-coffee making facilities, a wardrobe and a flat-screen cable TV. Some rooms also feature a balcony.

The Art INN offers a Rooftop Restaurant and Bar operational every day from 5:30pm to 10:30pm.

At The ART INN Lisbon guests can enjoy a continental breakfast. A number of local restaurants are available in the vicinity of the property, most serving traditional Portuguese meals. The wine bar at the lobby offers the opportunity of a late night drink.

Bairro Alto is a 15-minute walk away and the iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is a 13-minute walk. A 5-minute drive from The ART INN Lisbon is the historical Alfama neighbourhood, which features plenty of establishments where guests can watch a Fado concert, while enjoying a glass of quality Portuguese wine and some tapas.

Lisbon International Airport is a 14-minute drive away from The ART INN Lisbon.

Description:
