The property has river and city views, and is less than 1 km from Commerce Square. The property is 600 metres from Rossio, and within 1.5 km of the city centre.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Jeronimos Monastery is 6.7 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.4 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Portugal Here I Come - Alfama
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and a 9-minute walk from St. George's Castle, Portugal Here I Come - Alfama provides accommodation with quiet street views and free WiFi. The property is around 1.3 km from Rossio, 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 7.3 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Commerce Square.

The apartment with a balcony and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Jeronimos Monastery is 8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 8.2 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Baixa Charming Apt. | Casc√£o 18
Description:
In the heart of Lisbon, set within a short distance of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Commerce Square, Baixa Charming Apt. | Casc√£o 18 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located 1.6 km from Rossio and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1 km from St. George's Castle.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from Baixa Charming Apt. | Casc√£o 18, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Lisboa Central Park Hotel Suites & Studios
Description:
Situated opposite the Eduardo VII Park, Lisboa Central Park offers free Wi-Fi and spacious rooms. The lively Avenida da Liberdade with its shops and restaurants is a short walk away.

The large rooms of Hotel Lisboa Central Park are decorated in neutral tones and warm colours. Each has air conditioning and a private bathroom with bathtub.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception and a laundry service.

The Parque Metro Station is a 2-minute walk away and offers easy access to Lisbon‚Äôs historic centre in 4 stops. Commerce Square is at 4 km and features Tagus River views as well as the iconic Augusta Street Arch. Humberto Delgado Airport is at 6.3 km and is reachable via metro.

Name: Rossio FLH Suites
Description:
Rossio FLH Suites offers accommodation in Lisbon, just steps from Rossio Square and 5-minute walk from Avenida da Liberdade. Chiado is 750 metres away, while Commerce Square is at 800 metres.

A flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered.Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Cais do Sodr√© is 1.3 km from the property and Bairro Alto is within a 12-minute walk. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 6.7 km from Rossio FLH Suites.

Name: SANA Capitol Hotel
Description:
Located in the heart of Lisbon, this modern hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square. Marqu√™s de Pombal Metro Station, offering direct access to Lisbon Airport and to the historic downtown area, is 500 metres away.

SANA Capitol Hotel features comfortable and modern Rooms with vibrant colorful bathrooms and convenient amenities.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Restaurant. The C Bar Lounge, where light meals, snacks, drinks & cocktails or simply a coffee can be enjoyed, is the ideal place for guests to socialize, meet or work with their laptop.

Convenient services at the SANA Capitol include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and room service. A shuttle service can be provided, at an extra fee and upon availability.

Eduardo VII Park is a 5-minute walk away, while the top of Avenida da Liberdade, famed for its high-end shops and boutiques, is 400 metres away.

Name: Wallis Rato
Description:
Wallis Rato offers accommodation in Lisbon, just 280 metres from the Rato Metro Station and 1 km from Avenida da Liberdade. The environmentally-friendly property has reduced energy and water consumption.

Each room or suite is tastefully decorated using ecological materials and has access to shared or private bathrooms. Linen and towels are provided. Some units have a balcony. Wallis Rato features free WiFi throughout the property.

All rooms are private and decorated with a unique touch, offering our guests a visually enchanting and diverse experience. Wallis S√£o Bento includes rooms with both private and shared bathrooms, providing options for all our guest's preferences. Regardless of your choice, we guarantee a clean and welcoming environment to make your stay memorable.

It is a 10-minute walk from the Botanical Garden. Amoreiras is 700 metres from Wallis Rato. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Charm Flats
Description:
Offering a garden, Charm Flats offers accommodation in Lisbon. Liberty Avenue is 400 metres from the property.

Accessible via stairs, each accommodation features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area and/or terrace. A microwave and coffee machine are also provided. Some units also have a kitchen, fitted with a toaster, a refrigerator, and a minibar. Each unit has a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Bed linen is available.

Rossio is 700 metres from Charm Flats, while Chiado is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Portela Airport, 6 km from the property.

Name: Comtesse Lisbonne Guest House by Homing
Description:
Well located in the Sao Domingos de Benfica district of Lisbon, Comtesse Lisbonne Guest House by Homing is situated 5.3 km from Rossio, 5.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 5.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. It is located 2 km from Luz Football Stadium and features a shared kitchen. The guest house provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

Every unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Commerce Square is 5.8 km from the guest house, while St. George's Castle is 6.5 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Casa Boma Lisboa - Modern & Luminous Apartment with Balcony - Alcantara I
Description:
Boasting accommodation with a balcony, Casa Boma Lisboa - Modern & Luminous Apartment with Balcony - Alcantara I is situated in Lisbon. The property is around 2 km from Jeronimos Monastery, 6.2 km from Commerce Square and 6.7 km from Rossio. The apartment features a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

This apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

St. George's Castle is 6.8 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 6.8 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 12 km away.

Name: P√°tio do Tijolo
Description:
P√°tio do Tijolo provides accommodation located 1.2 km from the centre of Lisbon and features a garden and a terrace. It is situated 1.5 km from Commerce Square and offers a 24-hour front desk. The guest house features family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite TV. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and some have garden views. At the guest house, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes is served for the buffet breakfast. There is a coffee shop and bar.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Hip Tailor Made Duplex Penthouse in Bairro Alto
Description:
Hip Tailor Made Duplex Penthouse in Bairro Alto is located in the Misericordia district of Lisbon, 1.6 km from St. George's Castle, less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property features river and city views, and is 700 metres from Rossio. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 1.1 km from Commerce Square.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Jeronimos Monastery is 6.6 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.4 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from Hip Tailor Made Duplex Penthouse in Bairro Alto, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: InterContinental Lisbon, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Primely located in central Lisbon, InterContinental Lisbon is a luxury 5-star hotel overlooking the famous Eduardo VII Park. It is just 500 metres from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and 700 metres from trendy Avenida da Liberdade's boutiques.

InterContinental Lisbon has chic, spacious guestrooms. Many of the rooms have panoramic views overlooking the park's green areas. All rooms have flat-screen TVs and access to satellite channels. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel‚Äôs Akla Restaurant is open daily and serves a wide range of international dishes alongside a wide selection of Portuguese specialties. The UpTown Bar is the perfect spot to enjoy a drink in a relaxing, homely environment. Local restaurants are available within a short walking distance, many serving typical Portuguese dishes.

The nearby Marques de Pombal Metro Station connects with most of the city's emblematic areas. Lively Bairro Alto is 3 km away and features a variety of popular bars, restaurants and caf√©s. Rossio and Chiado, two of the historical downtown's most famous areas are both at a short 5-minute drive. The emblematic S√£o Jorge Castle is 4 km from the hotel. Portela International Airport is 7.4 km from the InterContinental Lisbon.

Name: Casa dell'Arte Club House
Description:
Situated within less than 1 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and a 17-minute walk of Rossio, Casa dell'Arte Club House features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. With river views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The accommodation offers luggage storage space and a housekeeping service for guests.

All units at the bed and breakfast are fitted with a seating area. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and bathrobes, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms have a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Dona Maria II National Theatre, St. George's Castle and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property.

Name: Dreaming Lisbon - Trigueiros City View
Description:
In a central area of Lisbon, set within a short distance of St. George's Castle and Rossio, Dreaming Lisbon - Trigueiros City View offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a patio with river views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Commerce Square is less than 1 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.8 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Ando Living - Douradores House
Description:
Ando Living - Douradores House offers accommodation within 1.7 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is set 400 metres from Commerce Square and features a lift. It is possible for guests to sit outside and enjoy the property grounds.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, St. George's Castle and Dona Maria II National Theatre. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: Madalena by The Beautique Hotels
Description:
Boasting a bar, Madalena by The Beautique Hotels is situated in the centre of Lisbon, 400 metres from Rossio. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Madalena by The Beautique Hotels offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Rua Luciano Cordeiro Bhuiyan Family Host
Description:
Located in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.5 km from Rossio and 1.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Rua Luciano Cordeiro Bhuiyan Family Host provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. It is situated 2.3 km from Commerce Square and features a shared kitchen. Luz Football Stadium is 5.8 km from the homestay and Jeronimos Monastery is 7.3 km away.

Every unit has air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the homestay have a balcony. At the homestay, units include bed linen and towels.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.7 km from the homestay, while St. George's Castle is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from Rua Luciano Cordeiro Bhuiyan Family Host.

Name: Cozy Lisbon Gra√ßa
Description:
Cozy Lisbon Gra√ßa offers accommodation in Lisbon, 500 metres from Miradouro da Gra√ßa and 1.4 km from Rossio. The apartments are located 1.8 km from Chiado and 800 metres from Alfama. Starting in July 2018, the property will also feature a swimming pool in the garden area.

Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The kitchenette features a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. A flat-screen TV is available in all apartments.

The building has a common garden where guest can relax. The Gra√ßa neighborhood is a tranquil residential area, with supermarket, bakeries and nearby restaurants.

Liberty Avenue is 1.9 km from Cozy Lisbon Gra√ßa, while Bairro Alto is 2.5 km from the property. Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: SantoSweethome 2
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, SantoSweethome 2 features accommodation with balcony, around 1.7 km from Commerce Square. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment provides city views, a terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Rossio is 1.5 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 2.8 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Liberty Hostel Lisbon
Description:
Conveniently situated in the Santo Antonio district of Lisbon, Liberty Hostel Lisbon is located 1.6 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 2.6 km from Commerce Square and 3.2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 1.6 km from Rossio.

Guest rooms include bed linen.

St. George's Castle is 3.2 km from the hostel, while Luz Football Stadium is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 8 km from Liberty Hostel Lisbon.

Name: Alfama Loft Studio Loft Apartment w/ River View - by LU Holidays
Description:
Right in the heart of Lisbon, situated within a short distance of Commerce Square and St. George's Castle, Alfama Loft Studio Loft Apartment w/ River View - by LU Holidays offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. The property has river and city views, and is 1.2 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Rossio.

Featuring sea views, this apartment also includes a flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster, as well as 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Jeronimos Monastery is 7.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 7 km from Alfama Loft Studio Loft Apartment w/ River View - by LU Holidays, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: My Story Hotel Figueira
Description:
Set in Lisbon and with Rossio reachable within 300 metres, My Story Hotel Figueira offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. My Story Hotel Figueira provides some units with city views, and all rooms have a coffee machine. All units feature a desk.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near My Story Hotel Figueira include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: L√≠bere Lisbon Pr√≠ncipe Real
Description:
L√≠bere Lisbon Pr√≠ncipe Real features accommodation within 1.1 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 800 metres from Rossio and less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

At the apartment complex, each unit has a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Units are equipped with air conditioning, and some units at the apartment complex have a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with a seating area.

A selection of options including local specialities, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Commerce Square is 1.5 km from the apartment, while St. George's Castle is 1.9 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Corujinha Hostel
Description:
Set within 3 km of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Corujinha Hostel features rooms in Lisbon. The property is around 3 km from Liberty Avenue and 3.4 km from Amoreiras. The accommodation provides free WiFi.

Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. All guest rooms will provide guests with a toaster.

Non-stop advice is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish.

Chiado is 4.1 km from Corujinha Hostel, while Bairro Alto is 5 km from the property.

Name: EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel
Description:
BE PART OF THE EVOLUTION LISBOA TRIBE!

Located at only 10 minutes from the International Lisbon Airport, facing one of the most known landmarks of Lisbon, Duque de Saldanha Square, you will find the EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel. Part of the generation of trendy Urban Hybrid Hotels, the perfect combination of the facilities of a Hotel with a Co-working place and an entertaining After-work life.
EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel is for a new wave of mobile open-minded Business and Leisure Travelers and Visitors from the world and the local community, all with an unconventional, curious, tech-oriented, and fun spirit.

All our rooms combine above all originality and functionality as well as comfort, thoughtfully conceived and decorated, with a colorful fun vibe to inspire happiness and wellbeing.
A minimalist concept with purposeful, trendy design spaces, infused with a sense of freedom and easy-going that make our Guests feel in control at all times during their stays.

The experience starts in the open lobby floor, by picking up at the self-Check-in Kiosks your E-Key card access to your room, to the 24/7 Fitness, Pool, and Wellbeing facilities at the 9th top floor, including to the underground garage. Then continues with the all-day Grab & Go and food concepts, from breakfast to light lunch, snacks, or dinner at the easy-cool Lounge Bar & Restaurant, with indoor and outdoor terraces. For Guests and Visitors, the spacious and smart co-working floor at the hotel mezzanine offers the perfect work ambience with free WI-FI access.
After work or a day in town, EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel proposes entertaining after-work moments, with current soundtracks or live DJ‚Äôs catchy vibes - Is always time, by yourself, or between colleagues and friends, to mingle, socialize and relax, sipping signature cocktails or other delightful beverages, enhanced by a trendy groovy led lighting, from nightfall until the late evening.

Offering easy and right at the Hotel door access to transport facilities - Metro, bus, and taxi stations. Our Guests will be able to connect with most of the exciting cultural, historical city landmarks, the luxury shops, and boutiques of the main avenues, as well as the nightlife iconic spots.

EVOLUTION Lisboa Hotel invites you in an original experience for your total cool lifestyle.

Name: Hotel Real Palacio
Description:
The 5-star Hotel Real Palacio in Lisbon is close to Parque Eduardo VII and less than 5 minutes' walking from El Corte Ingles shopping centre. Luxury amenities include a sauna and hot tub.

The bright, spacious rooms at Hotel Real Palacio have free WiFi and satellite TV. They are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a minibar. Guests receive free bathroom amenities throughout their stay.

The contemporary Real Restaurant serves a rich breakfast buffet. Regional specialities can be sampled in the elegant, √† la carte restaurant and bar, Real Cozinha.

A gym is available at the on-site health club. Following a workout, guests can unwind at the facilities for a relaxing experience: sauna, jacuzzi and steam room.

The friendly staff at Real Pal√°cio's front desk can organise a car rental service.

Dinner or lunch can be enjoyed at the Real Cozinha Restaurante-Bar which specialises in traditional Portuguese food, which also features on selected days an Executive Lunch menu or a Family Brunch with children activities.

For sports lovers, the Real Sports Bar is the unmissable spot in Lisbon with its cosy and welcoming atmosphere to cheer your favourite team in good company with a range of international and craft beers to choose from, alongside sangrias and hearty food such as hamburguers, veal steak and savoury snacks ideal for sharing.

Name: Dare Lisbon House
Description:
Located in Lisbon's historic centre, Dare Lisbon House is situated at a short walk from Chiado and at a 5-minute walk from the Santa Justa Lift. It is within a renovated 18th century building, which still features many of its original features.

With an elegant d√©cor and an exclusive design, all units at the property were decorated in collaboration with local artists. All units includes free WiFi, air conditioning, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a free toiletries and shower.

The property provides guests with the necessary ingredients to prepare their own breakfast, including daily fresh items. A 24-hour front desk and a concierge service are available at the apartment.

Avenida da Liberdade is 300 metres from Dare Lisbon House. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 7 km from the property.

Name: 138 Liberdade Hotel
Description:
The 5-star 138 Liberdade Hotel has a d√©cor with contemporary art pieces, along with vintage details. The trendy property is centrally located in Lisbon's Liberdade Avenue, which is renowned for its prestigious boutiques and restaurants.

Each room or suite takes in plenty of natural light and features a white or black d√©cor with Victorian-inspired details. Each has a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The modern bathroom has a glass-walled shower and free toiletries. The rooms and suites come with views over Liberdade Avenue or Lisbon's old town area. Free WiFi is provided.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast, as well as lunch and dinner service. It features fine Portuguese and Spanish cuisine, paired with a selection of quality Iberian wines. This boutique-chic hotel also has an open deck, where guests may enjoy a refreshing cocktail from the bar while taking in the surroundings.

Chiado, the city's downtown area is a 15-minute walk and is filled with historical caf√©s and shops. Bairro Alto is Lisbon's main night life area, just a 13-minute walk away. Popular S√£o Jorge's Castle is a 20-minute walk, while Alfama is a 15-minute walk and is famed for being Lisbon's Fado district.

The nearest Metro Station is just 20 metres away from the hotel. 138 Liberdade Hotel is 7.6 km from Portela International Airport.

Name: WHome Carri√£o 31 Urban Oasis in Premium Location w/AC
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of Rossio and a 8-minute walk of Dona Maria II National Theatre in the centre of Lisbon, WHome Carri√£o 31 Urban Oasis in Premium Location w/AC provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The property features city views and is 1.6 km from Commerce Square and 1.4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dishwasher, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Every unit includes a kettle and a private bathroom, while selected rooms are equipped with a fully equipped kitchen. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

St. George's Castle is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 8 km from WHome Carri√£o 31 Urban Oasis in Premium Location w/AC, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: SantoSweethome 1
Description:
Situated within 1.7 km of Commerce Square and 1.6 km of Rossio, SantoSweethome 1 features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like cycling.

St. George's Castle is 2.8 km from SantoSweethome 1, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 10 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade
Description:
Situated on Liberdade Avenue, amidst high-end shops and boutiques, the 4-star NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade offers a seasonal rooftop pool and lawned terrace, with scenic views over Lisbon and the Tagus River. The Avenida Metro Station is conveniently just in front of the hotel.

The NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade provides spacious rooms with a modern d√©cor. Each room includes a Nespresso coffee machine, with 3 free daily capsules. All rooms and suites come with a pillow menu and are equipped with a work desk, minibar, free high-speed WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a professional hair dryer and a vanity mirror, as well as with free toiletries.

A daily buffet breakfast is served, which offers a wide range of fresh local products, as well as vegan and gluten-free options. Breakfast in the room is possible and there is also room service available. Rich local cuisine and a variety of drinks are served at the hotel‚Äôs Restaurant Do Teatro. Guests can enjoy light snacks and refreshments at the caf√© on the ground floor.

The rooftop area features a bar, where guests can enjoy a refreshing drink, while enjoying panoramic views over historic Lisbon, the river and even S√£o Jorge's Castle. There are also plenty of restaurants, pubs and shops surrounding the hotel. The hotel's lifts are panoramic, also providing city views. The hotel features meeting rooms, with a maximum capacity of 35 people, as well as a 24-hour fitness centre. One of the meeting rooms has castle views, as well as direct access to the rooftop area. A guest relations service is provided to all guests of the hotel.

NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade is located in the heart of Lisbon‚Äôs historical and commercial centre just a 12-minute walk from Bairro Alto and Chiado districts. It is 700 metres from Marques de Pombal Square, the Rossio Train Station plus the Santa Justa Lift and 20 minutes‚Äô walk from S√£o Jorge Castle. Humberto Delgado International Airport is 7 km away and is reachable via metro.

Name: Hotel DAH - Dom Afonso Henriques
Description:
Situated between Lisbon‚Äôs International Airport and the historical downtown, Hotel Dom Afonso Henriques is primely located in the Portuguese capital. The popular Chiado and Rossio are within a 10-minute drive.

The Hotel offers free WiFi and soundproofed rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Each room at the Hotel Dom Afonso Henriques is bright and elegantly furnished. All the air-conditioned rooms are heated and contain a free safety deposit box, as well as a telephone. The private bathrooms feature free toiletries.

The buffet breakfast is served in a modernly decorated room with a panoramic view of the city. Refreshing beverages, coffee and snacks are available at the 1st floor lounge. Guests wishing to discover the Portuguese gastronomy may do so in the many restaurants available in Lisbon's downtown area.

The reception desk is open 24/7 and the staff will be happy to provide you with any help you require. The hotel also features car and bicycle rental, as well as a tour desk offering advice on excursions. On-site private parking is available.

The Alameda metro station, connects directly with the city centre and is a 5-minute walk away. The Dom Afonso Henriques Hotel is 3 km away from St. George's Castle. Those wishing to try the city's nightlife may do so in lively Bairro Alto, just 6.5 km away. Avenida da Liberdade is 3.7 km away and is filled with high-end stores and boutiques.

The Hotel DAH - Dom Afonso Henriques is a 7-minute drive from Portela International Airport. An airport shuttle service is available, upon request and at an extra fee.

Name: Panoramic Living
Description:
Panoramic Living is located in Lisbon‚Äôs Parque das Na√ß√µes. The apartments and studios are 1 km from the MEO Arena and 1.2 km from Gare do Oriente transport hub.

The elegant studios and apartments are air conditioned and have a seating area with sofas and a flat-screen cable TV. Studios have a kitchenette, while apartments come with a full kitchen. Each unit has a private bathroom, with bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries.

The Panoramic Living‚Äôs guests are welcome to cook up their own culinary creations in the full kitchen or kitchenette at their disposal, which also include a handy dishwasher. Alternatively, Parque das Na√ß√µes features a variety of restaurants, eateries and bars, many within a short 5-minute walk.

Guests can walk along the long promenade of the Parque das Na√ß√µes, observing the Tagus River while passing by landmarks like the Vasco da Gama Tower, the Lisbon Casino and the Lisbon Oceanarium. Rossio is a 20-minute drive, as is Chiado in Lisbon‚Äôs historic downtown. Portela International Airport is 3 km from the Panoramic Living.

Name: Villa Baixa - Lisbon Luxury Apartments
Description:
Located at just 170 metres from Figueira Square and 300 metres from Rossio, this property is set in Lisbon's historic downtown area. Villa Baixa - Lisbon Luxury Apartments is 550 metres from Commerce Square, which overlooks the Tagus River.

Featuring free WiFi and city views, all of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, living area with flat-screen TV and a fully-equipped kitchenette. The studios and apartments are all elegantly decorated in blue and white, with wooden floors. Free toiletries from Real Saboaria are provided.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchenette, which also comes with a coffee machine. A wide range of restaurants, caf√©s and pastry shops is available within a short walk from the property.

Chiado is 600 metres from the property and features several traditional sights, like the iconic A Brasileira caf√©. The Santa Justa Lift is 210 metres from the property and provides sweeping views over the city's rooftops. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.6 km from Villa Baixa - Lisbon Luxury Apartments.

Name: Stay Home Lisbon
Description:
Stay Home Lisbon is a self-catering accommodation located in Lisbon. FreeWiFi access is available. The property is 2.4 km from Liberty Avenue and 2.8 km from Amoreiras.

Accommodation will provide you with a seating area. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a bath or shower. You can enjoy city view. Some of the properties have a sofa.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Rossio (3.3 km) and Chiado (3.6 km).Lisbon Portela Airport is located 3 km away.

Name: Window to Lisboa III
Description:
In the heart of Lisbon, set within a short distance of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Window to Lisboa III offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. It is located 1.1 km from Commerce Square and offers a 24-hour front desk. St. George's Castle is 1.6 km away and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.7 km from the apartment.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lisbon, like cycling and hiking.

Jeronimos Monastery is 6.8 km from Window to Lisboa III, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.3 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Le Premier Lisbon Suites
Description:
Le Premier Lisbon Suites has air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Lisbon, 2.4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 2.6 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre and 2.7 km from Rossio.

The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and shower.

Guests at Le Premier Lisbon Suites can enjoy a tasty breakfast served within the property.
Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

St. George's Castle is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Ribeira Market is 3.3 km from the property.

Name: Portas Do Bairro
Description:
Situated in the centre of Lisbon, Portas Do Bairro features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. It is located 700 metres from Rossio and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every unit is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, Dona Maria II National Theatre and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 9 km from Portas Do Bairro, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Gloria 10 Deluxe
Description:
Situated in the centre of Lisbon, just 700 metres from Rossio and 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, Gloria 10 Deluxe features accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is set 6.4 km from Luz Football Stadium, 7.5 km from Jeronimos Monastery and 9.1 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The bed and breakfast will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The bed and breakfast provides some units with quiet street views, and every unit has a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Commerce Square, St. George's Castle and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: SANA Malhoa Hotel
Description:
With a privileged location, between the Business district and some of Lisbon‚Äôs most iconic landmarks, SANA Malhoa Hotel offers the perfect option to all Cosmopolitan Travelers, in Business or Leisure. The Pra√ßa de Espanha metro station, the El Cortes Ingl√™s Shopping Centre and the Calouste Gulbenkian Museum are just 5-minute walk away.

All Rooms and Suites are decorated and designed in a modern style to ensure comfort and well-being, fitting complimentary Wi-Fi access amongst other features. Communicating rooms are available for families on request.

The new Mediterr√¢neo Restaurant with a tropical-colonial vibe and natural lighting serves a delightful breakfast buffet, lunch and dinner. An in-room dining experience is also available 24 hours. The stunning trendy Bar & covered Terrace with a natural hanging garden is the ideal space to work or simply relax, taking advantage of the snack menu, with classic and trendy cocktails

Before or after a busy day, Guests are invited to a blissful journey at the SAYANNA WELLNESS & SPA ‚Äì with 3 treatment rooms, relaxation room, sauna, steam room, jacuzzi and a fitness room fully equipped.

SANA Malhoa Hotel is less than 5 minutes‚Äô walk from the Pra√ßa de Espanha Metro Station. It takes less than a 15-minute drive to Lisbon Airport.

Name: Lisbon Marriott Hotel
Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and a relaxing garden area, the large 4-star Lisbon Marriott Hotel offers elegant accommodation with city views. It is a 10-minute drive from Lisbon's Humberto Delgado International Airport.

Each air-conditioned room has a d√©cor alluding to Lisbon and its history. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, a desk, floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony with either garden or Lisbon views. Each of the rooms includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

An extensive breakfast buffet is provided each morning, with some gluten-free options. Breakfast can be enjoyed in the garden in the warmer months of the year. Marriott Lisbon‚Äôs Citrus Restaurant overlooks the palm garden and serves Portuguese and Mediterranean cuisine as well as a selection of local wines. The Tapas & Tiles bar serves light meals, snacks and drinks.

Guests can relax on a poolside sun lounger and enjoy a refreshing drink from the bar. Lisbon Marriott Hotel features a fitness centre, which overlooks the lush garden. A large, well-equipped meeting space is also available, as well as the Mediterranean Ballroom, with a classical d√©cor which includes antique chandeliers. .

The Sete Rios‚Äé transports‚Äô hub is at a 5-minute drive. Avenida da Liberdade, with its high-end shops and boutiques and is 3 km from Marriott Lisbon. Lisbon's historic downtown area is within 5.5 km and is reachable via metro.

Name: Spacious Tailor Made Bairro Alto
Description:
Situated in the centre of Lisbon, just 1.5 km from Commerce Square and less than 1 km from Rossio, Spacious Tailor Made Bairro Alto features accommodation with quiet street views and free WiFi. The property is set less than 1 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 3.9 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6.8 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from St. George's Castle.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and inner courtyard views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Luz Football Stadium is 7.2 km from the apartment, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 10 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: 5 Seconds to Your Heart
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, 1.7 km from Rossio and 3.3 km from Commerce Square, 5 Seconds to Your Heart features city views and free WiFi. The property is set 3.9 km from St. George's Castle, 4 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 6 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is 1 km from the city centre and 1.6 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Luz Football Stadium is 6.8 km from 5 Seconds to Your Heart, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 10 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away.

Name: The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel
Description:
Featuring a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 1.7 km from Commerce Square. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from St. George's Castle.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer river views. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at The Editory Riverside Hotel, an Historic Hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Miradouro da Senhora do Monte is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Rossio is 2 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 8 km from the property.

Name: Lisboa 85 Suites & Apartments by RIDAN Hotels
Description:
Set within 1.2 km of Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.7 km of Dona Maria II National Theatre, Lisboa 85 Suites & Apartments by RIDAN Hotels offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Lisbon. The property is situated 2.5 km from Commerce Square, 2.7 km from St. George's Castle and 6.7 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is 1.8 km from Rossio, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a city view. The units at Lisboa 85 Suites & Apartments by RIDAN Hotels come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box.

A buffet, √† la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 7.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare do Oriente is 7.6 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 5 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Avani Avenida Liberdade Lisbon Hotel
Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the 4-star AVANI Avenida Liberdade offers comfortable rooms with a contemporary style. Featuring private parking on site, this hotel is 100 metres from the Avenida metro station and a 10-minute walk from Rossio and the Pombaline Downtown. Guests have free access to Tivoli Avenida Liberdade's Spa and outdoor pool.

Air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a coffee machine and a desk. Some rooms come with a balcony and a private bathroom with bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms include a free Handy mobile device.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning and guests may enjoy a varied menu at the on-site restaurant from the renowned chef Olivier Costa. Guests are welcome to visit the sky bar at the sister hotel Tivoli Avenida Liberdade, as well as its 2 restaurants, Seen Lisboa and Cervejaria Liberdade. The trendy Bairro Alto neighbourhood is 850 metres away and a variety of restaurants serving traditional Portuguese and international cuisine may be found within walking distance.

AVANI Avenida Liberdade is just a 10-minute walk from the D. Maria II National Theatre and the Recreios Coliseum. The picturesque Alfama neighbourhood is 2 km away and the iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is 2.2 km away. The Rossio Train Station is 900 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 8 km away.

Name: Hotel Principe Real
Description:
Located in Lisbon‚Äôs historic centre, this Boutique Hotel offers free WiFi in all rooms. There is a lobby where guests can help themselves from a 24-hour honesty bar, while enjoying a selection of books.

All non-smoking rooms have a well-stocked minibar, cosy armchair in the seating area and a bath in the en suite bathroom. Most rooms have a private balcony and some boast panoramic city views.

The hotel's breakfast is served √† la carte and includes eggs, fresh juices and cakes. The front desk can organise citywide excursions and river cruises.

Hotel Principe Real is 550 metres from Avenida metro station, right in Avenida da Liberdade shopping area. Bairro Alto‚Äôs trendy restaurants, bars and clubs are a 5-minute walk away, as well as S√£o Pedro de Alc√¢ntara belvedere.

Lisbon's Humberto Delgado Airport is 9 km away, easily accessible via metro.

Name: Iberostar Selection Lisboa
Description:
The 5-star Iberostar Selection Lisboa is located steps from the Eduardo VII Park and the Marqu√™s de Pombal Square, in the Lisbon centre. With a bar and restaurant, the property has an outdoor swimming pool and features a terrace with gardens.

With different types of rooms, guests are able to choose between rooms with views over the city or suites. Room service is available 24 hours a day, at an extra cost.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property. The hotel offers a delicious and unique variety of gastronomic products that guests can try in the Restaurant Luz and in the Boalma Bar.

Iberostar Selection Lisboa has 7 meeting rooms, some of which can be converted into 2 or 3 event areas, with a capacity for up to 250 people. Services available at an extra fee include a laundry service, 24-hour reception and private parking.

At Iberostar's SPA Sensations, guests can enjoy the Heated indoor pool, sauna, sensory shower, Turkish bath and massage services at an extra cost. The gym is free.

The famous Avenida da Liberdade is a 5-minute walk from Iberostar Selection Lisboa. Bairro Alto is just 1.2 km from the hotel and the iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is 3.5 km away. Lisbon International Airport is 10 km away and is reachable via metro.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Description:
The 7 Hotel, Suites, Studios & Apartments is located at the heart of Lisbon‚Äôs historic downtown, at a 3-minute walk from both Rossio Square and Chiado. The hotel is just a 1-minute walk from the Baixa/Chiado Metro Station.

The hotel features comfortable renovated rooms and studios, each equipped with a flat-screen cable TV. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, including free toiletries. Most rooms also have views over the street and the city. Free WiFi is provided.

Breakfast service is available in the rooms, at an extra fee. Guests of the studios are welcome to prepare light meals in the kitchenette at their disposal. Enjoying them in the small dining area. Alternatively, various Lisbon restaurants are accessible at a short 2-minute walk.

Chiado is renowned as one of Lisbon‚Äôs most iconic commercial areas. Another vaunted commercial district is the posh Avenida da Liberdade, 750 metres from 7 Hotel. The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is a 13-minute walk away. Portela International Airport is 7.5 km from The 7 Hotel, Suites, Studios & Apartments.

Name: Pestana CR7 Lisboa

Pestana Hotels and world-renowned footballer Cristiano Ronaldo‚Äôs partnership resulted in the 4-star Pestana CR7 Lisboa, located in a traditional Lisbon building, which was fully renovated. Located in the historic centre, it is a 2-minute walk from Commerce Square.

Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel. Pestana CR7 has an Art Deco-style design and features double rooms with a modern bathroom, a large flat-screen TV, air conditioning, a minibar, a wardrobe and a safe.

The restaurant portion has a selection of tasty Portuguese delicacies and tapas, all within a casual and welcoming ambiance. Breakfast is served each morning in the restaurant area.

The 24-hour front desk staff is always available to help out guests, including pertinent tips on the best spots to eat and visit in the vicinity. The CR7 CORNER bar is an ideal spot for guests to unwind at the end of the day and enjoy a drink or cocktail or their choosing.

The hotel‚Äôs prime location makes it a great base from which to explore Lisbon. Rossio Square is at a 4-minute walk, while Chiado is within a 6-minute walk from the property. Bairro Alto and its trendy bars and shops at a 10-minute walk. Avenida da Liberdade‚Äôs shops and boutiques are at a 13-minute walk. Lisbon Portela Airport is 9.1 km away from Pestana CR7 Lisboa and is reachable via metro.

Name: Le Consulat
Description:
Centrally located in Lisbon, the renovated Le Consulat is set in the Lu√≠s de Cam√µes Square and is just a few minutes‚Äô walk from the Chiado shopping area. Free WiFi is available.

Each of the Le Consulat‚Äôs rooms and suites was decorated in collaboration with the most important art galleries of Lisbon. All units are equipped with air conditioning, soundproofing and the Consulaire/Ambassadeur suites offer a fully equipped kitchenette and a dining area.

The surrounding area offers a variety of restaurants serving Portuguese and international cuisine, and the trendy nightlife neighbourhood of Bairro Alto is just a few metres away.

The Baixa-Chiado Metro Station is a 1-minute walk and the Cais do Sodr√© Train Station, connecting guests to Estoril and Cascais, is 600 metres away. Lisbon International Airport is 9 km away, easily accessible via public transportation.

Description:
Inspired by the life and work of Fernando Pessoa, Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 200 metres from Chiado. The Hotel features a restaurant with panoramic views, a SPA (for guests aged 16 and over) and fitness centre, meeting facilities and a library. Free WiFi and paid private parking are available.

Lisboa Pessoa Hotel offers a variety of rooms, including interconnecting rooms, rooms with a terrace and stunning views of Lisbon. All rooms have air conditioning, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each bathroom includes free toiletries and a walk-in shower.

The reception is available 24 hours. The hotel has free Wi-Fi.

Restaurante Mensagem provides an intimate atmosphere with eight niches with a private window and 2 terraces with views of the Portuguese capital. The products are carefully selected by Chef Manuel Ferreira and the dishes are inspired by Portuguese tradition.

Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is 200 meters from Rossio and 300 meters from Dona Maria II National Theater. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Description:
Turim Restauradores Hotel offers comfortable and affordable rooms in a prime location in the heart of Lisbon, just a few minutes‚Äô walk from Rossio Station.

All bedrooms at Turim Restauradores Hotel have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom.

Restauradores Square is a short walk from the hotel.

The Turim Restauradores Hotel's facilities include a lounge and TV room, where you can relax after a day of sightseeing. It is 1 km to the historic Tagus riverfront.

Turim Restauradores Hotel is 7 km from Lisbon Airport. An on-site car rental service is available.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views features 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Commerce Square, Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and St. George's Castle. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away.

Name: Hotel Florida
Description:
Hotel Florida is centrally located in Lisbon, a 2-minute walk from Marqu√™s de Pombal Square and its Metro Station . The uniquely decorated hotel has a vintage cinema theme throughout its rooms and common areas.

Guests can stay in rooms dedicated to Marilyn Monroe, Alfred Hitchcock or movie classics such as Casablanca. Many of the hotel's areas are decorated with quotes. Each renovated room comes with a flat-screen TV and minibar.

The bright meal room features a piano and panoramic views of Marqu√™s de Pombal Square. Next to the hotel is the Great American Disaster restaurant, a 50's themed diner. Here, guests can enjoy classic American dishes, for an extra fee.

After a workout in the fitness room, guests of Florida can enjoy a drink in the winter garden or walk down Liberdade Avenue, which has a wide range of shops, caf√©s and restaurants. The Eduardo VII Park is a 5-minute walk away. Bairro Alto is Lisbon's main bar area, just a 7-minute drive away. The Chiado and Rossio historical areas are both at a 5-minute drive. Lisbon International Airport is 7.2 km from Hotel Florida.

Description:
MeraPrime Gold is a design hotel set in Lisbon's historic downtown, at just a 3-minute walk from Commerce Square, which overlooks the Tagus River. Featuring a restaurant, which is also a boutique caf√©, the property is 200 metres from the Baixa/Chiado Metro Station.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, wardrobe as well as free WiFi, which is available throughout the property. With a private bathroom, some rooms at MeraPrime Gold also have a river view.

All of the food served at the property has a Halal Certification. A continental or √† la carte breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The hotel's Allow - License to Snack caf√© features sweets, savoury snacks and assorted delicacies, all within a a cosy atmosphere. The surrounding area features a multitude of caf√©s and eateries, where guests can taste traditional Portuguese meals and delicacies, like the well-known Pastel de Nata.

Cais do Sodr√©, a lively nightlife area, is at a 600-metre distance. The famed Bairro Alto is an 8-minute walk, while Chiado is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 9.8 km from MeraPrime Gold.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Dona Maria II National Theatre, Commerce Square and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The National Pantheon is a 10-minute walk, while The Fado Museum is within 250 metres. The iconic S√£o Jorge Castle is a 12-minute walk from the property. MYRIAD by SANA has an exceptional Michelin-starred restaurant at the top of the tower - FIFTY SECONDS, for incredible epicurean experiences; 1 lobby restaurant-bar with terrace ‚Äì RIVER LOUNGE, with one of the most trendy, charming, and unique hotel terraces on the river, to enjoy throughout the day; on the 23rd upper floor 1 sublime SAYANNA WELLNESS & SPA facing the river with 4 treatment rooms, indoor pool and fitness center.

On the Hotel mezzanine the flexible 3 LE√ìNIDAS meeting rooms with natural light for Events and Board Meetings, one of which is almost suspended over the river with a 180-degree view, and 1 unmissable Congress and Events Center - MYRIAD CRISTAL CENTER, with 2 floors and an outdoor deck area ‚Äìconnected by an aerial glass bridge to the Hotel.

MYRIAD by SANA has a privileged location, close to the entrance and exit routes, with excellent access points and transport facilities. Just 10 minutes from Lisbon International Airport by car, with train and metro stations close to the hotel. Guests can request a private VIP transfer service, upon request, prior to arrival or departure.

The Hotel surroundings combine several incredible spaces and a wide variety of shops, restaurants, and bars, all located along a stunning 5 km stretch of the Tagus riverfront.

Centrally located in Lisbon, the 4-star 1908 Lisboa Hotel is housed in a completely renovated 1908 award-winning building by architect Ad√£es Bermudes. Set in the corner of the Almirante Reis Avenue and Intendente Square, this hotel includes an ever evolving art gallery, a restaurant and a bar.

Name: Pal√°cio do Governador - Lisbon Hotel & Spa
Description:
Welcome to this palace that is your home. Here, where history stays for tomorrow, we do everything we can to honor your preference, and turn your dreams into an unforgettable journey.

STORYTELLING
Sitting at his dispatch table, in dim light so as not to completely wake up reality and time, is the Governor over the centuries that have passed and the centuries to come. Always with the Torre de Bel√©m in sight, opening the way for MAAT's new currents.

With the pose of who is promptly waiting for someone, his imponent figure is clad in a cobalt blue jacket from which the cuffs and collars, literally immaculate, metaphorically free, escape.

Over the collars hangs a smiling face. With the humility of someone who forgets the ornaments that weigh on his chest - which make him live slightly leaning forward; with the curiosity for the future and the unknown of every second and centimeter of the world to be explored - and makes him live leaning significantly forward.

It's this smile that announces what he's going to say as soon as he approaches a guest: - What an honor to have you in my home, which is also yours. And you've come at just the right time. This space of ours, where history stays for the future, is perfect for sharing an adventure. It happened to me just yesterday. Or will it happen tomorrow? But first, let's have a gin with pink Indian pepper in the garden's tranquility, as I know you like, while they prepare our sushi, which is even fresher than in the Land of the Rising Sun.

Built in the former home of the Governor of the Bel√©m Tower, exquisitely restored over Roman remains, probably dating from the 1st to 5th centuries, Pal√°cio do Governador - Lisbon Hotel & SPA is a place of all times. But this place is more than just a hotel, it is a legacy of our history that is preparing for a new stage in the future, inviting you to experience a unique present. Honoring you.

FACTS
Pal√°cio do Governador ‚Äì Lisbon Hotel & SPA has 60 rooms, all different, next to the river, in the historic centre of Bel√©m, in one of the most beautiful and emblematic areas of the capital. Surrounded by national historical monuments, it's the natural choice for those who want to be in Lisbon, close to everything, from culture to leisure and far enough away to feel tranquillity. The Bel√©m Tower is just a few steps away.

The hotel has two outdoor pools - one for adults and one for children, an area with bali beds and a poolside bar that supports the main bar.

Po Tat Restaurant - From the combination of the vibrant flavors of Pan-Asian cuisine and the adventurous spirit of 15th century Portuguese travelers came Po Tat (the name given to the Chinese tart inspired by the pastel de nata). The restaurant draws inspiration from centuries of Portuguese exploration to bring new techniques and reinvent flavors crossing Japan, China and Korea. At Po Tat tradition and innovation meet in a wave of flavours and each dish, prepared by Chef Andr√© Santos, is a culinary journey that transcends borders. You can't miss the chance to stamp this gastronomic experience in your travel passport.

Bel√©m BarTolomeu Bar ‚Äì A bar with the soul of an explorer, inspired on the explorer Bartolomeu Dias, and offering light meals in a symbiosis of three great cuisines, Asian, Portuguese and Mediterranean, with signature cocktails, where we toast to the spirit of exploration and the rich tapestry of cultures that make our world so wonderfully diverse. The menu also dazzles with the freshest flavors from the land and sea, which are a real provocation to the senses. All these flavors will transport you to another universe. The outdoor terrace is also the perfect place to enjoy a sunset with a cocktail in hand to the sound of the latest beats.

For those seeking rejuvenation, Felicit√°s Spa Governador is a 1200 sqm sanctuary with treatments aimed at promoting relaxation and revitalization. Guests and visitors can indulge in massages, facials, and therapies that combine premium products and skilled techniques, ensuring a tranquil escape from everyday stresses. Unwind with amenities such as: indoor pool with two waterfalls, caribbean shower storm, ice fountain, turkish bath, sauna, relaxation area and gym.

Pal√°cio do Governador - Lisbon Hotel & SPA is member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World‚Ñ¢ (SLH), the world's most desirable community of independent travelers and independent hotels. SLH properties are able to offer secluded and discreet options with the highest standards of luxury and guest well-being.

Name: Wal Apartments- 3 bedrooms with parking space
Description:
Situated in Lisbon with Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and Rossio nearby, Wal Apartments- 3 bedrooms with parking space features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 3.2 km from Commerce Square, 1.8 km from St. George's Castle and 6.9 km from Lisbon Oceanarium. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre.

The spacious apartment is located on the ground floor and features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchenette that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Gare do Oriente is 7.2 km from the apartment, while Luz Football Stadium is 7.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 6 km from Wal Apartments- 3 bedrooms with parking space.

Name: Vista Lusitana Apartaments
Description:
Vista Lusitana Apartaments offers accommodation within 1.1 km of the centre of Lisbon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. This apartment provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Rossio, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Commerce Square. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km from the property.

Name: Casa Adelina Abranches II
Description:
In a central area of Lisbon, located within a short distance of Rossio and Dona Maria II National Theatre, Casa Adelina Abranches II offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is around less than 1 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 1.8 km from St. George's Castle and 6.6 km from Luz Football Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.8 km from Commerce Square.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Jeronimos Monastery is 8.1 km from Casa Adelina Abranches II, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 7 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Edith Cavell10 Lisbon Guest House
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Edith Cavell10 Lisbon Guest House is an accommodation located in Lisbon, 2.8 km from Rossio and 2.9 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. It is set 1.8 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and offers a shared kitchen. The guest house features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At the guest house, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Commerce Square is 3.4 km from the guest house, while St. George's Castle is 3.6 km away. Humberto Delgado Airport is 4 km from the property.

Name: Embaixador 26: Belem Serviced Apartments
Description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Embaixador 26: Belem Serviced Apartments is set in Lisbon, 6.7 km from Commerce Square and 7.2 km from Rossio. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Jeronimos Monastery is 1 km away.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

St. George's Castle is 7.3 km from the apartment, while Dona Maria II National Theatre is 7.4 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Rostelbem Guesthouse Lisbon
Description:
Rostelbem Guesthouse Lisbon is situated conveniently in Lisbon, and offers a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is set 2.7 km from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, 3.3 km from Rossio and 3.4 km from Dona Maria II National Theatre. Commerce Square is 4 km away and St. George's Castle is 4.1 km from the hostel.

The units in the hostel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rostelbem Guesthouse Lisbon provides certain units that feature city views, and all rooms come with a shared bathroom with a shower. At the accommodation, all rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Luz Football Stadium is 6 km from Rostelbem Guesthouse Lisbon, while Lisbon Oceanarium is 7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Mouraria's Place - Blue Studio
Description:
Mouraria's Place - Blue Studio in Lisbon features accommodation with free WiFi, 700 metres from Dona Maria II National Theatre, 700 metres from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte and 1.2 km from Commerce Square. The property is situated less than 1 km from St. George's Castle, 7.4 km from Luz Football Stadium and 8.1 km from Jeronimos Monastery. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Rossio.

The apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Lisbon Oceanarium is 8.4 km from the apartment, while Gare do Oriente is 8.7 km from the property. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

Name: Apartment Lisbon Airport
Description:
Situated in Lisbon, Apartment Lisbon Airport offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. Apartment Lisbon Airport boasts views of the garden. Free private parking is available on site.

A dishwasher and an oven can be found in the kitchen and there is a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV, as well as a CD player are offered.

The nearest bus stop is 50 metres away. You can play tennis and mini-golf at the property, and bike hire is available. Nations Park is 5 km from Apartment Lisbon Airport. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing, horse riding and windsurfing. The nearest airport is Lisbon Humberto Delgado Airport, 2 km from the property.

Name: Solar dos Poetas
Description:
Ideally situated in Lisbon, Solar dos Poetas features a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The property has city views and is less than 1 km from Commerce Square and a 8-minute walk from Rossio. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Units include a private bathroom, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature a river view.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include St. George's Castle, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte. Humberto Delgado Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Mouraria Lisboa Hotel
Description:
Located in Lisbon, within 800 metres of Rossio and less than 1 km of Dona Maria II National Theatre, Mouraria Lisboa Hotel offers accommodation with a bar. Featuring a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

Each room is equipped with a TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a city view. At Mouraria Lisboa Hotel every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Commerce Square and St. George's Castle. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 6 km from Mouraria Lisboa Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
